name: AVAILABLE, Poipu Beach, NEW OeanView Deck House
summary: WIFI & NETFLIX!, BRAND NEW Ocean-view Deck House directly across the street from the Pacific Ocean and the Grand Wyndam Resort. Home on a FULL ACRE for privacy.Along with the close proximity of the OCEAN, the standout feature is the massive SUN-DECK. We can direct you to; SNORKEL WITH SEA TURTLES, photograph rare HAWAIIAN MONK SEALS (only 1,100 left), Outrigger Canoe Race, BOOGEY BOARDING & SURFING!  Spend your time lazing at the beach or up in the jungle hiking. ENJOY LIFE!!!
space: Any house on a full acre is a very rare commodity in the Poipu Beach Area on Kauai's Sunny South Side. The house offers privacy the hotels & condos can't offer. The area itself is extremely popular with visitors and thus all the hotels, resorts, condos and vacation rental homes. Our house is unique because we are situated one property from the Ocean the surrounding land is also open space that affords wonderful vistas. We welcome you to a truly private experience during your Holiday, with plenty of elbow room. A much more private experience than staying at a crowded hotel or condo. We are a completely registered rental: IAW Hawaii State Act 204 our TAT Registration Number  is advertised & displayed herein: #TA-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). Our G.E. number is #GE-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). * Note...for some unknown reason, AIRBNB won't display rental tax registration numbers.
description: WIFI & NETFLIX!, BRAND NEW Ocean-view Deck House directly across the street from the Pacific Ocean and the Grand Wyndam Resort. Home on a FULL ACRE for privacy.Along with the close proximity of the OCEAN, the standout feature is the massive SUN-DECK. Spend your time lazing at the beach or up in the jungle hiking. ENJOY LIFE!!! Any house on a full acre is a very rare commodity in the Poipu Beach Area on Kauai's Sunny South Side. The house offers privacy the hotels & condos can't offer. The area itself is extremely popular with visitors and thus all the hotels, resorts, condos and vacation rental homes. Our house is unique because we are situated one property from the Ocean the surrounding land is also open space that affords wonderful vistas. We welcome you to a truly private experience during your Holiday, with plenty of elbow room. A
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood, Poipu Beach, is one of the newest and priciest sub-divisions on Kauai. It is in a safe area and within a short walk to all kinds of things to do. Beaches, Shopping Boutiques, Restaurants, Snorkel and Surf-board rentals, Bike rentals, Pubs, and Grocery Stores,...are all a walk away. There are even more of everything a short drive away also. The best thing about where our place is in the neighborhood is...we are the closest property to the Ocean. A walk through the Grand Wyndham resort (which also has restaurants and pubs), finds you at the shoreline.   Perfect location.
notes: Our subdivision is sensitive to the well being of the rare sea birds who nest in our jungles and must make their first hazardous flights to the ocean from the nest. We don't have street lights to allow the birds every chance to safely make it to the dark ocean at night (when these nacent flights occur). The young fledgling Shearwaters leave the nest and fly till they see moonlight or starlight reflected in the ocean. They then will land and rest for the night to begin their life as a denizen of the sea. So,...the open and dark skies at the house, not only assist the Shearwaters, but make for wonderful stargazing at the property. City dwellers can reacquaint themselves with the Milky Way, the North Star, Orion (in Winter) and Scorpio (in Summer) and other clearly visible constellations & stars.  After all the best experiences are free!!!
transit: Really you don't need a car at our place. Everything you could want is a walk or quick bike ride away. However, if you want to explore the entire island we recommend a rental car. The island does have a great bus system and taxi cabs.
access: The entire $2.5 million dollar home and garden are yours for the holiday!!! Fly a kite, run through the sprinklers, Stargaze (the Milky Way is easy to see here)...Pick a papaya or gather a bunch of bananas. Conduct a Wedding ceremony or Wedding Reception... Lay out on the lawn or the sun-deck...the place is your Kauai home!!! ALOHA.
interaction: As longtime residents of Kauai...we know lots of great hikes, super snorkeling & surfing spots. We can direct you to any tour operators, including Na Pali Boat Tours, horseback riding, ATV tours and more.

host.host_about:
Kauai Resident for 30 Years.  Involved in a variety of Island Exploration over the years, including Napali Boating Tours, Hiking, Surfing, Kayaking and outings with Friends and Family.
My Husband and I love sharing our knowledge of Kauai and moreover enjoy providing a space for folks to create their own experiences and Kauai Adventures.

reviews.comments:
The hosts were amazing and very accommodating. 
The house was in a great location and it was beautifully done. I would stay there again in a second.

Chris and Reba are incredible hosts, and their place was perfect for our needs. They were incredibly flexible as a few details shifted on our end and very responsive in helping figure out creative issues that popped up as we planned a small wedding ceremony and reception in the backyard.

The location is perfect - a 5 minute drive to Poipu beach. Very quiet, wonderful views, comfortable beds and great amenities. I can't say enough great things about Chris and Reba as hosts or their beautiful home. I had the pleasure of meeting both of them to arrange a few quick details - a meeting which quickly turned into a few hours of really enjoyable chatting about life, the universe and everything.

Great hosts, wonderful home, perfect location. I can't wait to come back!
Great hosts and house. No air conditioning but the air through all of the windows is great.
The cleanliness and amenities are wonderful!
Great hosts. Very accommodating and considerate. Highly recommend them.
Spacious, clean beautiful home. Great open concept layout with a beautiful deck, porch area. Three couples, plenty of space

Fantastic location and home. Perfect for my wife, myself and our 3 teen aged sons. Bedrooms are downstairs and living area upstairs is spacious with plenty of room inside and outside on the deck to spread out. Easy walk to the beach for sunrise / sunset. Very well equipped with everything you need to cook some meals while you are there and with gear to make your outings more enjoyable. Great 5.5 mile run from the house up to Sprouting Horn and back. Definitely a place I would consider to stay my next trip out.

Me and my family of 5 stayed at Rebas home in August. It was an incredible stay! The house was more beautiful than we could have expected. It was clean, spacious, and the massive lanai just about made our trip. From watching the sunset to early morning breakfast we loved spending our time there. Reba was a wonderful host and we would definitely stay at her home again. The only thing we were missing was AC - but if you leave doors and windows open when you are home it isn't too hot. There was everything we could have ever needed provided. Thanks Reba for a wonderful vacation!
Great location. Spacious property. Lots of privacy. Host is very responsive. Made our first Airbnb experience very enjoyable.
Nice and convenient to beaches and shopping.

Reba and Chris were wonderful hosts. We had a great time staying in their beautiful and clean house. It had everything we needed and so much space. On top of all the amenities, Chris was able to tell us when was best to go on a boat trip. And we were lucky enough to even enjoy the Poipu new year firework from the deck!

Reba and Chris were impeccable hosts! We met Reba for our check in and she was so friendly. Their home is beyond all expectations. So many amenities were provided, not to mention space and cleanliness and privacy and we all left beautiful Kauai very happy thanks to them! I'd give this home ten stars if I could! Even the local chickens are friendly!

Reba and Chris were the consummate hosts. They met us and had a good chat  with them when we checked in.  The house looks exactly as in the pictures, perhaps even better and the best part is the house comes with all the utensils and bath supplies needed for your vacation.  We used the outdoor barbecue twice and had a wonderful time enjoying the view and fresh air.

We've booked airbnb several times already but this tops our list as the best one so far.

The house was just as advertised, no issues to worry about , best host ever for my group of 10 . If you want to stay in a beautiful home in Kauai right in the middle of everything with the assurance that your host will go out of their way to accommodate you look no further !!!

We stayed in the house, 2 families (4 adults and 4 kids). The house and the property are very spacious, so there is lot of space for kids to play. The location is perfect! Chris and Reba are great hosts. Our flight was late, so we did not have time to do shopping when we came.  There was some food waiting for us, so we could have a breakfast next morning. We really enjoyed our stay and appreciate their hospitality.

Reba and Chris were wonderful hosts! They were helpful from the very beginning with giving us suggestions on things to do while on our trip and giving us directions from the airport. They were also helpful in responding immediately when I had any questions for them before and during out trip. I was in kauai for a wedding and we used this beautiful home to take pictures of the groom and groomsmen as we were getting ready for the wedding. The second floor of this home is really big and open and having the space  in this home really helped the day run smoothly. I'm very grateful and thankful for Reba, Chris and there beautiful home. Aloha and Mahalo

This is a great location. Walkable to several restaurants! The layout is great with lots of space for guests. Although you are not on the beach the Mountain View‚Äôs are stunning from the huge sun deck. Our family loved the house!

Reba and Chris are incredibly lovely people and hosts. Their home is beautiful, clean, spacious, and perfectly located. It made for a great family vacation and provided us with a perfectly located home base for exploring the island. Can‚Äôt say enough about Reba and Chris‚Äôs hospitality.

Had a great visit with family, 8 of us in total.   Poipu was a great location for us since we were traveling with younger children and older parents.  We didn't do much hiking, but wanted to just enjoy the beach most days and Poipu Beach state park is just a few minutes away.  We would stay here again if traveling with a large group.

A spacious and enjoyable house for a big group. Well equipped and very well situated. Really couldn't have been better for our purposes. Huge rooms, a nice kitchen and a nice deck. All the video you need, including hundreds of indexed and alphabetized  DVDs. We had a great stay.

Thanks so much to Reba and Chris for being such fantastic hosts. They truly thought of everything for our holiday, from providing beach towels, body boards and snorkeling gear to recommending beaches an restaurants for us to try. Communication was above and beyond, very helpful. Highly recommend.

Reba and Chris 's house was perfect for our family get together .The house is spacious with quality furnishings .  Two  bedrooms can have access to their own bathroom,one room can share or use the bathroom on the main floor which was not a problem for Bryan and I. We cooked most nights, the kitchen is well equipped and we congregated on the deck in the mornings and evening to eat.
Centrally located  to all amenities and sights .
Reba and Chris were very quick to respond when the BBQ gas ran out. A lovely fun couple who know the island well and eager to share any tips.
Wonderful place- as nice as the pictures- great beach gear- beds very comfy!!

We had a wonderful stay! The house was beautiful and located near all the shops and beaches! It was wonderful to meet Chris, and he had lots of good tips for us on where to go. I would recommend this house to anyone. Fantastic!

The house was spacious with plenty of room inside and out for gathering for meals and hanging out. The beds were comfy and the location was handy to the beaches, restaurants  and shopping. The kitchen was well-equipped.  We enjoyed meeting a Chris and he and Reba were responsive to our requests.
Amazing house in a beautiful location. Wonderful hosts who provide every amenity you need for an awesome stay in Kauai. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Fabulously beautiful home that seems brand new.  Beautiful artwork and perfectly stocked kitchen to make family meals.  Our family of 7 (adult children) LOVED the space.  Great location too...walking to the beach easy.  Wish we had stayed here longer.....Owners incredibly friendly and perfect communicators.

Reba and Chris are very gracious and fascinating hosts. The paintings in the house are all by Chris and it sounds like the sculpture was a joint effort.

The three bedrooms are all downstairs. All have King or Cal King beds. The master bedroom has an en suite and another has an adjoining bathroom with a private entrance. We had two couples in the house, so we both had private baths. The third bedroom could share that bath or use the upstairs 3/4 bath. There is also a murphy bed in the living room, making the house ideal for a family get-together.

The kitchen, dining, and living rooms are all upstairs, spilling onto a very large covered deck which is perfect for entertaining, with a spectacular view of the mountains and countryside. We had two other couples over for dinner one night and eight of us were able to sit outside (or in) very comfortably. The kitchen is well stocked with most everything you need for cooking and serving.

The house is walking distance to several beaches. The house is well stocked with equipment but do bring your own beach towel.
My family had a wonderful stay! Would absolutely recommend Reba and her beautiful home!

Reba and Chris are wonderful hosts who tailor their house to your needs. We had a toddler and they made safety modifications to the staircase. Blow up beds allowed kids to sleep in comfortable proximity. The kitchen was well equipped for groups. Every beach accessory was available. We were celebrating two birthdays and our hosts surprised us with a gift and bottle of wine. Wonderful!

Reba was very helpful and had lots of great beach gear to use. The space was perfect for a larger group that was all in town for a wedding. It provided plenty of room to sleep and hang out. I would highly recommend it.
Excellent home in an excellent neighborhood. Rural feel. New house.

name: A Dorm Bed In the Best Location

Another advantage of our location is that we're only 15 min. away from most of Istanbul's famous tourist attractions(old town), we're also only a short walk from Sirkeci international train station. name: Porto.arte downtown apartment 3PAX
summary: This Porto¬¥s typical apartment, on a classical house, has recently been restored and is fully equipped (including Air Conditioning and Wifi). It was decorated to comfortably accommodate couples and travelers (up to 3 people), either on recreation or business. The atmosphere is warm and serene, with a remarkable natural light in every room. The location is privileged, in the city center, the designated "Arts District", which is a quiet pedestrian area with everything at a walk distance.
space: This is a fully equipped apartment, that comfortably hosts 3 adults. The bedroom has a double bed, and a sofa bed is also available. A functional and aesthetic balance was achieved in the living room, where a kitchenette is included. The historial details of the apartment were  preserved, such as the living room's ceiling.

The building has a private garden, in the back. I do not live at this building, but very close to it. Thus, I am able to quickly  assist the guests and also provide flexible check-in/c
neighborhood_overview: The building is located in a privileged pedestrian block of the city, which is safe and quiet. At the same time, it is close to all the major points of interest of the city, as it is located right in the city center. This is the ideal place to rest, recover and enjoy the city at its fullest. Only a few steps away, there are multiple interesting locations, from modern art galleries and antiques restoration workshops to  acknowledged restaurants. A 15 minutes walk will take you to several locations of interest such as the City Hall, Casa da M√∫sica (House of Music), Douro river banks and the romantic gardens of Pal√°cio de Cristal (Cristal Palace). All the while going through medieval streets and buildings, churches (old and new), synagogues, museums, art galleries and faculties.
notes: The apartment is cosy and homing, decorated in such a way that a harmony between the past and the indispensable functionality of modern live may coexist. The apartment is fully equipped. There was special care to providing a comfortable stay, which led to the  use of good mattresses, quality bed lining, air conditioning, Wi-Fi, large screen HD LED TV, cable TV, kitchen appliances and safe, among others. In short, everything that is a must in well living. On the exterior there is a pleasant private garden to which the guests have free access. There is also a laundry room, that guests may use.
transit: In terms of transportation, at less than 100 meters, there are multiple bus stops that can take you all around town, as well as taxis.  At a 10 minute walk, the metro system is also available.  If you have a car available, it is only a 5 minute drive to the high way that can take you to the north, south and east (Spain).
access: The building has a private garden, in the back.
interaction: I do not live at this building, but very close to it. Thus, I am able to quickly  assist the guests and also provide flexible check-in/check-out schedules.

host.host_about:
I am a citizen of Porto.
I have lived in other places and knew different cities in the world, but Porto is the place that attracts me to live the most.

My basic background is in applied mathematics, subsequently I took the option to continue the family business in the area of restoration and trade of antiques, activity that I still keep. 
Interior decoration is also an area that interests me.

I have no training on the tourism sector, so, my interpretation in this project, is to welcome and host according to the traditions of Porto, while sharing a characteristic family house and its pieces of art.

name: Mouzinho 244 Ap4 by RUA Apartments
summary: Ap4 is  located at Mouzinho da Silveira Street, in downtown, and in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage Center. This apartment is on the 2th floor  and it's an apartment full of light. For privacy windows don't allow outside visibility. It has 1 bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, a dining area and a cozy living room. whith TV cable and free wi-fi. S√£o Bento's Train Station and the Subway are just a 2 minute walk away You can see and choose  other apartments "cliking" on myprofile page.
space: The apartment has 1 bedroom with a double bed of 140, 1 bathroom,  a kitchen, a dining area and a cozy living room with a confortable seat that can becomes a double  bed of 140. The full bathroom is equipped with hair dryer and complimentary toiletries.
description: Ap4 is  located at Mouzinho da Silveira Street, in downtown, and in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage Center. This apartment is on the 2th floor  and it's an apartment full of light. For privacy windows don't allow outside visibility. It has 1 bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, a dining area and a cozy living room. whith TV cable and free wi-fi. S√£o Bento's Train Station and the Subway are just a 2 minute walk away You can see and choose  other apartments "cliking" on myprofile page. The apartment has 1 bedroom with a double bed of 140, 1 bathroom,  a kitchen, a dining area and a cozy living room with a confortable seat that can becomes a double  bed of 140. The full bathroom is equipped with hair dryer and complimentary toiletries. The building where the apartment is located , belongs to the 19th century but was completely rebuilt  in July 2016.  The building has a common laundry room with washing machines and dryers that can be used for a modest sum . Personal check-in is done till 8pm
neighborhood_overview: With a privileged location, you can visit the old city on foot , without any means of transport .In Mouzinho da Silveira Street you can find diversified traditional stores  and many handicraft products and plenty of restaurants. A few minutes walk , you will find : Aliados avenue,  Ribeira, Arts district,   Cl√©rigos tower, the Porto Cathedral , Lello bookstore, Stock exchange palace, S. Francisco Church and others. The property is 300 meters from Rua Galerias de Paris , a lively spot for nightlife with numerous bars and restaurants.  Ribeira is one of the most vibrant place in the city,It is located 200 meters from the apartement. Crossing  the bridge you can visit the famous wine cellars of Porto where wine tasting and tours are available.
notes: The building did not have an elevator , so it is not advised to reduced mobility persons. The apartment has large windows that let in plenty of light, but without visibility to the outside.
transit: S√£o Bento's Train Station and the Subway Station with a direct connection to the airport (S√£o Bento ‚Äì yellow line) are just a 2 minute walk away. Starting from the station of S√£o Bento you can visit several bordering cities of Porto, very charming like as: Braga , Guimaraes, Aveiro , etc.
access: The building where the apartment is located , belongs to the 19th century but was completely rebuilt  in July 2016.  The building has a common laundry room with washing machines and dryers that can be used for a modest sum . Personal check-in is done till 8pm. After that hour you can access the apartment by an access code that we will provide you. We can provide with extra-cost a personalized transfer from the airport to the apartment.
interaction: Sheets and towels are available at no additional cost The apartments have fully equipped kitchens , but if you prefer to eat out and taste the local cuisine , there are many dining options within walking distance ,from traditional restaurants to ones with Michelin stars.
house_rules: - check-out till 12:00 - check-in after 3 pm

Great place close to train station so it was easy to take some day trips we wanted. Hosts were quick to respond to any question. The apartment was decorated with a stylish African theme which we loved. Double windows were excellent for making  very quiet nights for sleep. Beds were nice and comfy.  Would definitely stay again.

Manuela and Madalena were fantastic hosts. Their space is lovely and centrally located to a lot of the sightseeing spots in the city. Thoughtful, attentive, and always willing to offer suggestions on what to see and do, these two were great hosts.

The location is perfect: 5 minutes walking down the street from Sao Bento station, it is the very center of Porto. The apartment itself is on the 3rd floor (and make note that there is no lift). It is fully equiped with all the necessary things including hair-dryer and coffee-machine. I should also notice the bed which is remarkably comfortable. There is no washing machine in the apartment but there is a laundry in the same house (for additional cost). Also there is no air conditioning, however there are two fans which were enough for me to feel comfortable in hot days. The design of the apartment is great too. In the house there are several similar apartments which are rented by the same hosts, and on the ground floor there is a shop where the host works daily, so  it is very easy to find her if needed. She was very hospitable and told me everything about the apartment and the neighbourhood to make my stay comfortable and interesting. There was even a printed booklet with lots of useful information on the diner table along with some snacks and port wine. I had to leave very early and it was very easy to do without meeting the host: you can just go and leave the key inside the apartment. I strongly recommend the apartment and this wonderful hosts.

Fantastic apartment, spotlessly clean, in a perfect location for accessing all the sights. Luggage storage downstairs in the owners shop outside of check-in time is a nice touch. Would definitely come back.

name: Duplex in the heart of Williamsburg
summary: Beautiful modern duplex in the heart of Williamsburg . Short walk to L Train Bedford stop . Plenty of great restaurants & nightlife within walking distance
description: Beautiful modern duplex in the heart of Williamsburg . Short walk to L Train Bedford stop . Plenty of great restaurants & nightlife within walking distance Roof deck access BBQ area with table & chairs -  Washer / Dryer I'm available 24/7 to provide assistance of any kind - I'm never too far away The apartment is situated in the middle of where you want to be in Williamsburg. Everything is within walking distance . Close proximity to Williamsburg bridge , bushwick inlet park & Mccaren Park . I recommend walking or you can rent a city bike for a few bucks The air mattress is a queen size- "SoundAsleep Dream Series Air Mattress". It is not a conventional camping air mattress. It is super comfortable and highly rated.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Antonio was incredibly responsive and thoughtful about my stay.

Antonio was very quick to answar any question we had in regards to the check in and chech out.  we actually got in very late the first day and he was very comunicative. Also, the place is very conveniently located, the apartment is spotless and well furnished with a full kitchen. I will definetly recomend.
Some things were not perfect, but only things that can easily be fixed. We left private feedback to Antonio. In general the apartment is good and the location is great.

Antonio seemed like a wonderful host when I first contacted him about renting this place.  However, once we arrived it was not quite the same; the furniture was not the same as the pictures in his listing.  I booked this place specifically because he listed it as one bedroom and one pull out couch.   I wanted the second bed since I was meeting my dad in NY.  However, I think the most suspicious part of this whole transaction was the fact that the address he provided us was different from the one in his listing.  I contacted customer support and worked with Diane and Megan.  They were kind, courteous, and responded quickly using both phone and email to contact me.  After their investigation, they agreed that Antonio misrepresented his listing and I was refunded the whole amount.  I have really had some great experiences with rentals from Airbnb but I will always remember to save all communication, pictures, and information from the host in case there is ever a problem like this again.

Great location and a lovely space!
We had a great time staying at Antonio's place. 
Extra plus for early check in and late check out :)
A un bon airbnb
Antonio was responsive and helpful when needed - though we haven't missed anything. Great location, very nice place.

A nice and spacious apartment in a very convenient location. Fully equipped and extremely clean. Antonio was very kind and always available. The only negative point was a quite noisy heating fan especially in the bedroom (the host has been now informed and he's going to investigate)

This was me and my girlfriends first time in New York and we loved staying at Antonio's spot. It's a really nice cozy house and is in a great location! Numerous bars, restaurants and shopping stores with in walking distance and the neighborhood is safe. Literally a 5 minute walk to the L train and in total probably 15-20 minutes to get into Manhattan. On top of having a nice home, Antonio is also an awesome host! He has great street knowledge of New York and his recommendations were always spot on. Our flight coming in and going out of New York were late and he was really flexible with us checking in and out. If you are going to New York, you MUST stay at this Airbnb and you will not regret it. Trust me.

This was a fabulous place to visit.  The location was excellent and the neighborhood was great.  In fact it was so enticing we ended up spending most of our time in Brooklyn.  Antonio was a great host and the house was a pleasure to stay in.  I'd gladly stay there again given the chance.

Antonio‚Äôs place is well located, minutes away by subway to Manhattan, in a good neighbourhood to experience the renaissance of Brooklyn in all of its funky coolness. It‚Äôs a restful relief from the heaving crowds of Midtown.  The space is well appointed with top of the line kitchen fittings, s/s appliances, spotless bathroom and a super comfy huge bed. There‚Äôs also an inflatable mattress that developed a leak the first night regrettably.

Antonio was always super responsive and helpful. You won‚Äôt be disappointed with your stay.

name: Spacious & Cosy 1BR apt in Gramercy with balcony!
summary: My place is located in Gramercy, the most elegant neighborhood of downtown manhattan. Very close to the 6,N,Q,R trains Gramercy park, Madison Square park, Flatiron building, Union Square and East Village.  I've put a lot of effort to make it cosy. You‚Äôll love its style, the private outdoors space, the location, the ambiance and the neighborhood.  I recently bought a piano, feel free to play and practice during your stay.

The building is in the heart of downtown Manhattan, just minutes from upscale shopping, world class restaurants, museums, galleries etc.  The apartment has: - A queen size beds - Huge corner sofa - Equipped kitchen (coffee machine, stove/oven, kettle, cookware) - ACs and central heating - 55" 3D TV with Roku/Netflix/Amazon/Hulu & a  - Playstation 4 - Wifi - Piano

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Just turned 33, male, working for a major record label in Marketing. I am originally Greek and moved in NYC four years ago. 
I guess I'm kind-of normal, very social, I LOVE music (I play the piano) and traveling. I am clean, quiet when needed, loud when out with friends and respectful. I am straight, gay friendly and you can be whatever you like. I'm cool :)

reviews.comments: My family and I stayed here for 8 nights. Although we did not get a chance to meet Manos, he went above and beyond! He made sure we got the keys, kept great communication to make sure we were ok, and was an overall awesome host! The pictures are accurate, the place nice and quiet. The bed was very comfortable, air conditioners worked well and there is an elevator.  His place is also centrally located, so it made seeing NYC super easy. If/when we are in NY we hope we can stay there again. Thank you so much Manos, you were a perfect host!!!
Manos was a wonderful host. His apartment was excellent and in a lovely neighborhood. Within walking distance to everything I needed. I highly recommend this apartment.

Manos's apartment overall is pretty satisfying. It describes exactly the same as it is on Airbnb page. The room is clean and cozy. The location is convenient to everywhere. A lot good rating restaurants are nearby. We spent a great time here. The host responds quickly and always asked us if we need anything or whether we are good. I would suggest to stay here if you are coming with 2-3 people.

Manos is a great host! Always easy to get in touch of and made sure everything was going well. The place is perfect! Good size apartment / Plenty of space! The balcony is a big bonus! The location itself is prime. A very relaxed part of Manhattan. A short walk to many different venues and definitely a lot of good places to eat. Would definitely recommend this place to everyone!

Manos is a great host. He was available whenever you needed him. The apartment is perfectly how he describes it and it is easy to get anywhere from there. Me and my friend stayed there for nearly 3 weeks and our stay was amazing. I would definitely want to stay there aging in my next visit.
Really nice place! I'm lucky to have found this room on Airbnb - great value and perfect location. Manos was easy to talk to and set things up well for my stay.

Manos is a perfect host and his place is just as on the pictures. The location is also top notch, just a few minutes walk from Flatiron building and well within the walking distance from most of Manhattan landmark.
You will be wowed.  Look no further. An amazing host.

Fantastic host. Very accommodating. Helps you settle in and check out. Always available for any question you have. 

The flat is as described. Large couch, with huge TV with Roku and PS4!Shower has good pressure though not the best. Water is hot. Oven working perfect. No microwave. Fridge with freezer. Balcony is a huge plus for smokers. A lot of closet space to hang your stuff.  
Central heating, so warm flat in winter. However when its warm outside can get too warm inside. 

Large Elevator available in the building. 

Closest subway station is 23rd street madison garden. Around 7-10 minutes  walk. Green line subway is closer, around 5 minutes walk.

All in all, best stay could have wished for!
Perfect place! Couldn't of asked for better and would love to stay again next time I'm in New York.

Manos' place is just as pictured and described. We enjoyed the area, especially Madison Square Park and we were able to make the sleeping arrangements work with 2 adults and 2 little kids. It was very quiet at night. Overall, a great trip.

I stayed at Gianni‚Äôs apartment for 32 days, and  I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better home away from home! 
The place was very accurate; cozy and beautifully furnished.  Kitchen and bathroom were totally clean, which was of high importance to me. 
Not only were all kitchen appliances existent - from toaster, to food processor - but also of good quality. 
The location and building are both extremely safe. I felt at ease at any time of the day. 
Another advantage is that the apartment is within a short walking distance to subway stations, Madison park , Empire State, clothing stores, restaurants, pharmacies, and organic health food stores! 
As for the host, Gianni has a truly kind character. Even though I had arrived a little late to the apartment on my first day, he was understanding and made me feel comfortable. Furthermore, he took the time to show me around the neighborhood.  He was also very responsive and willing to help at any time, literally! Once I was locked out of the apartment at 11 pm, I reached out to him and he came for help a few minutes later. 
It was a wonderful stay, and I highly recommend this home.

amezing

We stayed in Manos' place for 10 nights. 

The apartment was great and it quickly felt like home. It has everything you need - equipped kitchen, nice living room with a TV + media like Netflix. 
In 5-10 minutes you can get into a subway, and if you come back a little late, the neighborhood is safe and quiet.

We did have some issues during our stay, obviously, but Manos was very communicative and responsive and helped with everything. For example, the elevator didn't work. We also had to check in very early and check out very late, but Manos suggested many helpful options for us - which we were very satisfied with.

This was our first time on Airbnb, and like we told Manos, that was definitely a positive experience on our side.

we highly recommend Manos' place!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Dear Kylie, you are an amazing host! Good communication, we get the key without any problems and the apartment was as described. The location is a good start n order to discover Manhattan and the Central Park.

Kylie's place is small but big enough for a couple to comfortably stay in. Although located in a relatively quiet corner of town, it's just under a 10 minute walk to the Lincoln Center subway station, which made it a good base camp for exploring Manhattan. Our only complaint was that a lot of the host's personal belongings remained in the apartment, which made the stay feel a little more crowded and uncomfortable than it otherwise would of. This was a relatively minor issue, and one which I'm sure will be easily remedied for future guests.

Kylie's place is pretty good overall. Kylie is very communicative and accommodating. The apartment is well kept and everything that is in the listing is there. Some of Kylie's stuff is there, but she hides it in such a manner that you barely notice it while you are there. There is a train station near by that can take you to Time Square and downtown. There are also some pretty good restaurants and a Duane Read near by which is very convenient.

If you're looking for a great place to stay in NYC for a trip, I'd recommend staying in Kylie's apartment! The location was the perfect spot for our Memorial Day weekend trip. The place was clean and very quiet and in a great spot. We were so lucky we found this apartment!
Great place for a great price in a great location. Kylie is very accommodating and helped make our stay as enjoyable as possible!

amazing host! don't expect luxury but you'll have everything you need. Kylie's place is a typical small Manhattan appt but she decorated it to make it pleasent to stay in. you won't get much natural light but that's the standard in Manhattan. Kylie was always responsive and kind. I highly recommend staying at her place!

Amazing location, great building near Lincoln Center, Broadway, Central Park, and more! Apartment is cozy and spacious (by NYC standards). Excellent host and you‚Äôll find everything you need here. Hope to stay there again next year!

Ubicado a 10min de la Casa de la M√∫sica, donde la oferta cultural es amplia, y del Mercado del Bom Sucesso (opci√≥n ideal para picar algo cerca del apartamento aunque no la √∫nica). 
Al centro normalmente √≠bamos andando (alrededor de 20min) pero otra opci√≥n es coger el metro desde el centro y andar los √∫ltimos minutos; el trayecto que realizamos fue: De Sao Bento>Trindade> Casa da Musica (Carolina Michaelis tambi√©n est√° cerca).

La opci√≥n m√°s corta para ir andando (o eso nos parece) es Dr Carlos Cal Brandao (e ir callejeando) aunque tambi√©n se puede ir hacia la Rotonda de Boavista y bajar hacia Jardins do Palacio de Cristal (buena opci√≥n para ver atardecer).

Margarida es una persona atenta y siempre dispuesta a ayudar; Oporto una ciudad hermosa llena de rincones en los que perderse. Lamentablemente, es dif√≠cil llevarse una imagen positiva despu√©s de que te roben. El d√≠a antes de nuestra partida encontramos la luna del coche rota, y todo lo que hab√≠a de valor, sustra√≠do. Es una pr√°ctica habitual, no fue una excepci√≥n. La consiguiente desesperaci√≥n, al estar "abandonados" en otro pa√≠s, s√≥lo la conoce quien la padece. Adem√°s, no hab√≠amos aparcado en una zona  conflictiva, sino en un barrio residencial, muy cerca del apartamento. 
Lo verdaderamente problem√°tico no es el robo en s√≠, sino el hecho, ante la perspectiva de un largo viaje para volver a casa, de no tener ayuda posible: que el seguro no responda, no tener internet en el tel√©fono, etc√©tera, hecho que probablemente constituya un incentivo para los ladrones, pues es obvio que act√∫an desde el rencor.
Si Margarida dispone el aparcamiento trasero a la casa todo ser√° m√°s seguro. No le recomiendo a nadie dejar el coche en la calle.
Es recomendable tambi√©n, controlar los precios de las tarifas de datos, ya que la Wi-Fi que nos fue brindada solo funcion√≥ el primer d√≠a, y se hace muy necesaria estando de viaje. 
Por otro lado, es dif√≠cil llegar a entender para un espa√±ol (que tenemos fama de fiesteros y gritones) como es posible que en una zona residencial todas las noches se re√∫na gente en una plaza a beber y hablar hasta las cuatro o cinco de la ma√±ana. El caso es que como la visita ha sido en agosto y el calor era insoportable, ten√≠amos que tener las ventanas abiertas y era muy dif√≠cil dormir, pues la gente no ten√≠a ninguna consideraci√≥n ni civismo en este aspecto.
Esto no pretende ser una cr√≠tica destructiva; quiz√° tuvimos mala suerte, y aunque creo que hay aspectos a mejorar, el apartamento es una  buena oportunidad para conocer la ciudad, sobre todo por su relaci√≥n calidad-precio y porque Margarida responde siempre con una sonrisa. Aun teniendo en cuenta los aspectos se√±alados, estoy seguro de que con el tiempo el recuerdo ser√° bueno.

Die Wohnung hat einen Balkon zum gem√ºtlich drau√üen sitzen. 

Das Bett ist so wie in der Beschreibung - ca. 135 x 180. Es muss daher ein bisschen gekuschelt werden. Die Kissen sind auch etwas zu klein f√ºr meinen Geschmack. 

Die Wohnung ist mit wenig Gehminuten an eine Metro angebunden mit der man sehr gut in die Innenstadt kommt. Etwa 15-20 min. Von dort kann man Alles erkundigen und auch schnell mal nach Matosinhos zum Baden fahren.

Alles in Allem eine sehr gut Alternativ zu einem Hotel. Es mangelt an nichts und die Wohnung ist sehr freundlich. Es sind auch einige B√ºcher und Magazine √ºber Porto vorhanden um sich ein wenig einzulesen.

Die Gastgeberin selbst ist sehr nett. Wir haben sie zwar nicht pers√∂nlich getroffen aber sie hat uns weiter geholfen falls wir fragen hatten. 
Am Tag der Ankunft hat ein Freund von ihr auf uns gewartet und uns denn Schl√ºssel gegeben. Unser Flieger hatte Versp√§tung und wir hatten Probleme mit dem METRO Ticket (Tipp: Ticket wenn m√∂glich schon vor Reiseantritt kaufen Porto-Karte oder Andante Karte), aber das war Alles kein Problem.
Margarida is a great and kind host. The apartment was good for a short trip and big enough. Fully recommendable!

Margarida nos ofreci√≥ todo tipo de informaci√≥n sobre la ciudad y adem√°s nos recibi√≥ personalmente. El apartamento es lo que se ofrece, a 20min del centro caminando, no se hace muy largo, nosotros no hemos necesitado otro transporte para movernos por la ciudad. Muy recomendable

Appartement qui permet de d√©couvrir une autre partie de Porto, proche de la Casa da M√∫sica qui est un b√¢timent exceptionnel. Un peu de marche pour rejoindre le centre ancien, mais en m√©tro tout se fait tr√®s rapidement. Je conseil ce logement.
The flat is clean and spacious. It is located next to a metro station and next to the shops . Margarida is very reactive and gives us some good adresses.
Appartement bien situ√©, pas loin du m√©tro, parfait le pour visiter porto !

Tout d'abord merci √† Margarida pour son accueil. 
Celle-ci nous a communiqu√© avant notre arriv√©e comment se rendre √† l'appartement ainsi que les lieux √† visiter √† Porto (monuments, magasins, restaurants, vues etc etc). 

Concernant l'appartement, il correspond au descriptif et est tr√®s propre. Il est situ√© √† 20-25 Minutes de l'hyper Centre et 30-35 Minutes des quais (du pont Luis). L'appartement est aux pieds des transports en commun (m√©tro et bus) qui vous emm√®neront directement en centre ville. 

Le point n√©gatif de l'appartement son isolation (comme tous les logements au portugal quasiment). 

Je recommande donc cet appartement pour un s√©jour √† Porto. 

Cl√©ment

Good location, 20 minutes to the center. Quiet area. Spacious apartment. Free parking near the house. From the window of the neighboring house meets a black, mustachioed, cute dog :) Say hello to him! Thank you!
good‚ù§Ô∏è
Perfect stay! Would definitely recommend and would stay here again. Lovely host

Margarida is a nice host and the flat is well located (tram, restaurant).
Definetly a good and simple accomondation.

Gostei muito da minha hospedagem em Porto. O apartamento, al√©m de extremamente limpo e organizado, √© cheiroso! H√° tudo o que a gente precisa. Quando eu cheguei, estava chovendo e tinha at√© guarda-chuva e capa de chuva √† disposi√ß√£o. Achei muito bem equipado. Margarida √© gentil, responde a todas as mensagens com efici√™ncia! Recomendo!
Appartement tr√®s bien situ√©. il est lumineux et tr√®s propre. Margarita nous a renseign√© et fourni plein d'informations tr√®s utiles.
nice and clean place
Great place, host is very hospitable, location very good (just off the touristic buzz, but close enough to the centre).
Un appartement tr√®s bien plac√© et bien arrang√©. Tr√®s propre. La hote √©tait superbe. Tout s‚Äôest bien pass√©.

Check-in molto flessibile, casa pulita e con tutto il necessario asciugacapelli e asciugamani compresi. La casa si trova a 20/25 minuti a piedi dal centro ed ha anche due fermate della metro nelle vicinanze per raggiungere tutte le parti della citt√†.
I have never booked via Airbnb so I was a little nervous.. The pictures were exactly as it looked, flat was cleaned.. All stuff (toilet paper, towels etc) was available.. I can recommend!
Margarida is a great host and very kind, her apartment is perfect for a Porto visit. Really good location, I enjoyed my stay there and recommend her place!

5/5 communication, flexible check in and very friendly host. Most amenities I've had in an AirBnB so far, from toiletries to cleaning products and coffee/tea as well as multiple towels  and pillows per person.
Great little place and good value, highly recommended!

name: Penthouse with stunning 600 sq ft roof terrace
summary: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: Beautiful views over Hollywood Park - balcony in the apartment as well as 600 sq ft roof terrace.  Contemporary but warm and stylish furnishings.  Roof terrace has dining area with barbecue and sitting area with sofas and armchairs.
description: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Beautiful views over Hollywood Park - balcony in the apartment as well as 600 sq ft roof terrace.  Contemporary but warm and stylish furnishings.  Roof terrace has dining area with barbecue and sitting area with sofas and armchairs. You are welcome to use the whole space as your own when you are my guest. I am happy to give you dining tips in the neighborhood and always free to have a coffee. My corner of Sheung Wan combines the old and new in HK - lots of wonderful restaurants, cafes and bars.  Art galleries and antique shops, quirky clothing and designer shops too. Very easy to get taxis outside the flat and the no. 26 bus is right across the street.  5-10 minute to the MTR and a 15-20 minute walk into Central.
neighborhood_overview: My corner of Sheung Wan combines the old and new in HK - lots of wonderful restaurants, cafes and bars.  Art galleries and antique shops, quirky clothing and designer shops too.
transit: Very easy to get taxis outside the flat and the no. 26 bus is right across the street.  5-10 minute to the MTR and a 15-20 minute walk into Central.
access: You are welcome to use the whole space as your own when you are my guest.
interaction: I am happy to give you dining tips in the neighborhood and always free to have a coffee.
house_rules: No smoking inside the flat as there is a balcony and roof terrace. No more than 2 guests. No loud music on the roof terrace after 11 pm as the police will attend. No parties.

host.host_about: Ex investment banker, headhunter and now tech start up entrepreneur.  Multi lingual and well travelled.  Loves HK, enjoys cooking and good food, passionate about martial arts, hiking and long evenings with great friends especially when there is music!

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Barbara was a most gracious and generous host.  She went out of her way to make me feel comfortable and (in effect) have a home away from home.  Her apartment is nothing short of amazing.  It is a great size for Hong Kong, incredibly comfortable, spotlessly clean and elegantly furnished.  The apartment is an an oasis from the hustle & bustle of Hong Kong.  It is perfectly situated on Hollywood Road, in the thick of a great selection of restaurants & bars and parks and is walking distance to Central & SOHO.  The apartment is open and airy, filled with natural light and is perfect for the business person that needs space to work out of or just to have a breather from the Hong Kong pace (a real luxury for Hong Kong).  The rooftop garden is a real bonus.  What a wonderful and unique experience.  I highly recommend this to any business person and discerning traveller.  I hope to return there soon.  Thanks Barbara! :-)
Luxurious and spacious penthouse in a trendy neighborhood; the pics really don't do it justice. Smooth communication and check-in. Would definitely recommend. Thank you for a great stay!

Barbara's place is fantastic and she is a wonderful host! We stayed for 10 days and felt at home as soon as we walked through the door. Really enjoyed the neighborhood - it was fairly quiet at night, but just a few blocks to walk to the shops and restaurants along Hollywood Road (the art/artisan shops at PMQ were our favorite). The kitchen is well equipped and there are two grocery markets within a few minutes walk (one Chinese-style and one English-style), so it was easy to make breakfast each morning, open up the balcony doors, and listen to the birds chirping in the park across the street. Barbara was very helpful with suggestions on dinner places - she gave us 6 suggestions within a 5 minute walk; we made it to 5 and had a great meal each time. The Sheung Wan area is very convenient to Central and it's easy to pick up taxis, trams, and the MTR within a few blocks of the apartment to get anywhere in the city. We'd definitely book Barbara's place again if we return to Hong Kong.

A very beautifully furnished space in a very trendy area roughly equidistant from Sai Ying Pun and Sheung Wan MTRs. Lots of cool cafes, restaurants and bars surround the flat. Check-in was easy and communication with Barbara was fast and effective. The doorman (particularly a charming gentleman by the name of Albert) gave tips to travelling around the area and it was always a nice feeling to see a familiar face when returning to the apartment. Will definitely stay in this space again if I get the chance!

AMAZING - the Penthouse in real life is 10x better then the images, PLUS the rooftop is so amazing and has such an amazing view it's all to your self with enough furniture to have 8 friends up there ( though I was by myself ) 

The community is amazing there's a MUST go to coffee shop right next door ( I forget the name ) 

Wifi is great 

Bed was super comfy 

Barbara is super helpful and I couldn't recommend the place enough, was worth every penny!
A real gem, beautiful apartment, well located we loved staying here. Barbara is a great host and was super helpful. Would highly recommend.

We really enjoyed our stay at Barbara's house. It was very clean and Barbara has a great taste of designing the house. The kitchen, bathroom, dining area, all of those are very well decorated. The location is very convenient, and it was a great experience exploring this side of the Hong Kong island. There was a great combination of modern and histories.

Barbara‚Äôs place is wonderful and perfect, it‚Äôs very comfortable and have a great design, totally same with the photos who shown. 
And the place really bring us a cozy home feeling when our staying, and the environment is quiet and peace, and also nearby the convenience store. 
The location is convenience too, if you‚Äôre familiar with the tramway, it‚Äôs so much easy to roam around the central.

A wonderful location and a beautiful studio nest to come home to, what more could one ask! You can find endless places to explore within walking distance, and a range of simple cafes to hip restaurants. So different from staying in the usual hotels. Highly recommended for the discerning Airbnbist.

Amazing apartment in the most stylish central area of hong kong. It is close to all the shops and restaurants that you need on your holiday and even for your longer term business trip. Highly recommend.

An absolutely wonderful place to stay while exploring Hong Kong.  Beautiful apartment, clean, wonderful views and open spaces...a rarity in HK.  Kitchen was well appointed, bed was comfortable, shower spacious and washing machine/dryer a nice plus for longer stay.  Doormen are sweet and always there to help.  

The location is great with a 5 minute walk to the two closest metro stops (we used Sai Ying Pun A1 mostly) and a few grocery stores.  This area provides a lot of atmosphere with many small Chinese stores and a couple temples nearby.   Cute cafe for morning coffee on ground level of building.  Hollywood Park across the street.  Antique stores just down the street and nightlife of LKF and SoHo are within walking distance but far enough away to not disturb your sleep.

Barbara was very responsive and easy to communicate with.  She made suggestions on a few restaurants too.  A perfect place to call home during our stay.  We will be back on our next visit to HK!

Barbara went out of her way to make our trip special. Because we arrived late on a Sunday, she took the extra step of asking what did she could have waiting, and she also made excellent recommendations regarding local restaurants and bars. The space was lovely and the neighborhood is a perfect mix of old and new. I loved the balcony and roof, and enjoyed waking  up to the activity across the street at the park each morning. There is also an interesting small temple perhaps a block or so away. The walk to the MTR is perhaps 10 minutes, and there is plenty of access to shops and food. I highly recommend this space for anyone visiting Hong Kong!

I‚Äôm always too lazy to write reviews but this trip has really changed my view towards HK (housing and residents etc)! I was on a hectic blitz like business trip and booked this apt very late at night after exhausting myself at work. Despite such a crazily short notice Barbara immediately arranged a key for me to get in without any complaints. The 24hr doorman is always so nice. I didn‚Äôt have a chance to wander around but as far as I know restaurants, convenient stores or even hospital are all downstairs and IFC (the usual working place) is just 5-10min taxi away. I‚Äôve had some terrible experience staying at Airbnb HK previously and switched back to the boring 5 star hotel mode since then. But I would now defo place Barbara‚Äôs apt as my top choice whenever I travel to HK. I would sincerely recommend it to anyone who wants to have a down-to-earth experience in HK esp those on business trips. Last word, the pano view is amazingly refreshing - you‚Äôll know what I‚Äôm talking about if you are familiar with the HK housing conditions ;p

Barbara's apartment is in the perfect postion on HK Island , close to an MTR, not far from the ferries ( an easy walking distance) lots of good cafes and restaurants in the area and grocery shops if you want to self cater. Being on Hollywood Road it is also close to lots of popular tourist (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a very stylish, beautiful apartment but also very practical and extremely comfortable. It had everything you could possibly need during your stay and was spotlessly clean. The roof terrace and balcony are a real bonus too. It overlooks a beautiful little park and the area is very quiet at night. Barbara was a very helpful host, easy to contact and quick to respond to any queries. The concierges were also very curteous, friendly and helpful ( especially Albert!) I really hpe we can use Barbara's aprtment on our next visit to HK!!
My second time staying here. Barbara prepared some super delicious fish congee for me. Love this place so much!

Wonderful AirBnB with a beautiful view over the treetops of the park next door. Very spacious and comfortable with lots of natural light. Perfect location on Hollywood Road, walking distance to SoHo and the Sheung Wan or SYP MTR. The 24/7 front desk is super helpful and friendly, and Barbara is a wonderful host!

Barbara is a lovely person!
She gave us a lot of tips about HK which made our trip awesome.
The apartment is amazing, clean with geat view and location, walking distance to everything.
We highly recommend this space for anyone visiting Hong Kong!

Really, a great apt to base yourself - agree with all previous reviews. Comfortable and stylish apt. We liked the neighbourhood for its restaurants & cafes.  In walking distance - but just far enough away - from the craziness of Central.

Amazing place. It‚Äôs more beautiful than pictures. The big balcony has a great view of Hon Kong buildings .  The apartment is good designed. A lot of Chinese paintings and photos. Bathroom is made from marble, elegant. The kitchen has everything you need. The bed is very soft. And most thankfully, there is 24h guard, help us a lot.

Barbara‚Äôs place is perfect in every way - location, comfort, and style.  We had a wonderful stay and enjoyed meeting Barbara.

The place is great, was exactly what we were looking for! Location is also great and Barbara is so quick and helpful in her replies. Thanks for all your help with the booking Barbara, we‚Äôll be back and booking again soon! :)

This is a lovely flat in an excellent location. The property is as described and perhaps even better in real life. The flat is beautifully decorated and finished. It‚Äôs also very safe with a 24 hour concierge. Lovely location , close to everything
Good location. Nice building and overall place. Totally recommend!!
We simply loved our stay at Barbara‚Äòs place. It‚Äôs very homely, stylish, centrally located with lots to discover just in walking distance. Barbara is a very responsive and helpful host.
It offers a big rooftop which is a great place to enjoy the night view of Sheung Wan. And the location is perfect. You can easily find some fine restaurants nearby.

We had a great time staying in Barbara's place.  The apartment is well located with easy walking to the ferry, the central train station, lots of shops/restaurants and other sites.  The place is well designed and clean. There is a small park across the street and a cafe downstairs.   Barbara was very responsive and pleasant to work with.  The front desk staff in the lobby were also very nice.

Barbara‚Äôs place was great. She was very quick to answer any questions that I had. I arrived late but she was there to greet me and have a drink with me. It was a great place to stay on Hong Kong Island
Perfect location, both doorman are extremely helpful and speak perfect English. Just like being at home
Beautiful flat in the best neighborhood in HK. Thank you Barbara!

We loved staying in Barbara‚Äôs penthouse. It is stylishly furnishes with a beautiful outlook over the park - in a brilliant location. Located in an eclectic neighbourhood, the penthouse is within walking distance to restaurants, coffee shops, bars, public transport and lots of attractions on Hong Kong island.

The apartment is clean, spacious and the roof top is an amazing space to watch the lights of Hong Kong - whilst enjoying a wine. 

We worked during the day from the apartment - and it was extremely spacious - so much so both of us did not feel like we were on top of one another.

Barbara is an exceptional host - quick to respond, providing lots of recommendations for local places to eat and visit. Her doorman was also very polite and helpful.

A great place - highly recommended. We hope to stay here in the future.

reviews.comments:
This was a great listing and an amazing place to stay. Sofia's place is clean, well decorated and just the right amount of space for 2-4 people. The space felt cozy and we loved it. We were only a bit disappointed that we found out at the last minute that there was no AC (as listed) but Sofia was very understanding and compensated us based on our experience. 

Sofia herself is a great host who is very attentive right from the first moment we wanted the place. She kept in touch by email and text and even checked in with us daily. The instructions she left were clear and she was available to help when we needed anything. The neighbourhood was nice and quiet as well. 

I would definitely stay at this listing again!

Sofia's place was exactly as advertised. It was really clean and her directions were very clear. Sofia kept in contact with us to make sure everything was ok. Her restaurant recommendations were good as well. I would definitely stay at Sofia's place again. I really liked her condo and the neighborhood. The building was very quiet and we enjoyed staying there. 

Thanks again for everything Sofia!
The apartment is great, clean, modern, easy to find, and with all the amenities we needed

We had a beautiful stay. The pictures represent the apartment perfectly. Sofia is a sweetheart and was a pleasure to deal with. The apartment is conveniently located near the highway & the metro. Will definitely try to stay here next time we're in town!
Un logement parfait. Tr√®s propre et tr√®s  tranquille. On se  sent comme chez soi. On retournera, si les dates sont disponibles. Le contact avec Sofia a √©t√© facile.

Place was exactly as advertised. Just outside downtown Montreal and a quick drive into the heart of it. Owner was more than helpful, was available to answer any questions we had for the entirety of our trip. Would highly recommend staying here if you are looking for somewhere close to downtown without paying downtown prices.
Good

Honestly, this is one of the best airbnb experiences I've had so far! Sofia's place is really close to public transit, and she lives in a nice quiet neighbourhood. Although I didn't get to meet her, she made sure everything was ready and easy for us. Check-in was a breeze. I'd definitely try to stay here again whenever I plan another trip to montreal!
Tres beau sejour

Clean place, good owner. :)
Spacious apartment.

Sofia has a cozy apartment in a quiet place in Montreal. It is perfect to relax, and it is very easy to go downtown or other places from there. the kitchen is complete, the washing and drying machines are very modern and efficient. We had a wonderful time in Montreal, and hope to get back soon!

My mom and I loved staying at Sofia's place during our trip to Montreal. Her place was clean, quiet, and well equipped for a very comfortable stay. Parking behind the building was so convenient. My mom had to work from home for a couple of days, and the living room made a great home office as well. Definite recommend for a peaceful retreat in Montreal that's still reasonably close to downtown.

Die im obersten Geschoss gelegene Unterkunft hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Sie war mit allen Annehmlichkeiten einschlie√ülich einer Vielzahl von Lebensmitteln ausgestattet. Parkm√∂glichkeit besteht hinter dem Haus. Die Wohnung ist √ºber ein Treppenhaus erreichbar. F√ºr den ersten und letzten Zugang muss die Au√üentreppe benutzt werden. Zur n√§chsten Metrostation sind es 7-8 Minuten (Preis f√ºr Hin- und R√ºckfahrt 6 Dollar pro Person).

I had an amazing experience, Sofia directions was very clear and precise. 

Thank you

We had a great stay at Sofia's place! Photos are accurate. One private parking spot behind the apartment was very convenient.  It's one the third floor with no elevate, which was no problem for us. 

There is no air conditioning, but in the middle of June with the window cracked open and the fan on, it wasn't a real issue.

It's about a 10 minute walk to the subway, depending how fast you walk. We took the subway every day and  got very used to the walk. There aren't many things to do in the area, but with the subway so close, it didn't really matter to us.

At first glance, the neighborhood appeared a little sketchy and run-down, but we never had an issue. It's a very quiet neighborhood with quiet residents who seem to keep to themselves. And the interior of the apartment is very welcoming and well furnished.

All in all, we had a great time and would stay again! Montreal is a beautiful, relaxed city and I recommend it!

Sofia's place is money worth for it's value. Although it's not located in a very good neighbourhood but this is the place where close to downtown and easy access to any where. Sofia is a good host, she prepare her place like a home for family traveler and give very clear instruction and everything are accurate.

Appartement tr√®s bien situ√©, proche d'un metro et cartier tranquille. Sofia √©tait facilement a rejoindre en cas de probleme. Le condo √©tait impeccable, tr√®s beau s√©jour, je le recommande sans h√©siter!
Great location, close to downtown and the Metro.  Nice quiet neighbourhood and the unit is as described.  Great value when visiting Montreal.
Great two bedroom place close to the metro with off street parking.  Easy check in/out.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
100% recommended

The appartement is really lovely. There is enough space for 3 to 4 people and it offers everything you need. The parking lot behind the Building is an advantage. With Uber it took 10 minutes to get downtown. We would stay there again.
Very clean and cute place! Comfortable and felt like home! I would recommend!
Sofia's place was clean, tidy and looks just like it did in the photos! She made it easy to check in and out and parking on site was convenient. Location was great too!
Excellent house. Great house. Very organized host communication wise. Would definitely come back!

This apartment is way more lovely & cozy than what you see in pictures. Sofia is such an amazing host she made our stay a home-coming experience. It is close to all public services yet very tranquille at all time. THE best stay we have ever had :)

Sofia‚Äôs place was great, exactly as described, nice and clean and Sofia was so quick to answer and helpful with any questions, would recommend to anyone and definitely stay at her place again! Million thanks!
Great apartment. Host very quick to answet any question. Very clean apartment.
I had a great stay at Sofia‚Äôs. Didn‚Äôt run into any issues.

It was my first time coming to Montreal and Sofia was a great host. She was very responsive and helpful. Her condo is really clean and there are plenty of street parking. She also has a parking spot in the back but I did not use it because it is easier to park in the street. One minor complaint that I did have is that you can smell cigarette in the bathroom. It is probably from the neighbors smoking. I did let her know and hopefully this issue can be addressed in the future. We just left the bathroom vent on and it seem to help. The location is decent and about 10-15 minutes from Downtown. Overall I had a great stay and would recommend it.

Copacabana, little Princess of the sea ... One of the most important neighborhoods in the history of the city. It has a vast network of services for tourists and visitors.
neighborhood_overview: Copacabana, little Princess of the sea ... One of the most important neighborhoods in the history of the city. It has a vast network of services for tourists and visitors.  The neighborhood never sleeps.  Because it is a tourist neighborhood, policing is reinforced, and the transport network is optimized. There are many choices of restaurants, supermarkets, bakeries, and bars.  The beach has kiosks that work until dawn, as well as the bars with live music. The area that the apartment is located has 2 bakeries and 3 markets in a two-block radius. Ease of access to amazing.
transit: Near the Cantagalo subway station and bus stops, as well as taxi stands, on the street.
access: The apartment will be fully available to you.
interaction: We can communicate by phone, (Hidden by Airbnb) to answer questions or give advice.

host.host_about: We live in Kent, WA, USA.

reviews.comments: Condo was as pictured. Nice to have a washer and dryer. Convenient location for day trip to kayak/snorkel Kealakekua Bay or to head into Kona town. Walking distance to groceries. Lovely lanai for sunsets.

Diese Unterkunft war sehr sauber und das Condo war modern ausgestattet. Die Lage war phantastisch.
Man konnte aus der zweiten Etage das Meer sehen. Wir haben jeden Morgen auf der Veranda gefruehstueckt.
Die Anlage war sehr gepflegt und der Gemeinschaftspool sehr sauber.
Die Lage war sehr gut, waren aber schon mal im Sheraton in der Naehe, kannten also die Gegend.Keine 3 Minuten mit dem Auto zum Supermarkt.
Es war sehr ruhig, man konnte sich wirklich erholen.

Place was bigger than expected, very airy, had the feeling of living outside (a plus) kitchen, appliances and dishes had a slight mildew smell understandable since place is pretty open. Dishwasher isn't the best, felt better washing our own dishes (didn't mind). Certain areas of the condo I felt needed better vacuuming job before we got there since shoes were not allowed in the condo, (personal preference) and we were walking around barefoot. Screen doors weren't very secure surprised they kept as much bugs out as it did :) view from both balconies was amazing, surrounding property is beautiful. Was nice to see previous tenants leaving odd items behind for use, so as we, left couple floating noodles, sunblock, aloe, and few non perishable items.. Also nice convenient was extra beach/towels.

Nice little condo in a pretty resort area.  Great view and updated kitchen with nice furniture.  Nice little updated resort pool.  Downsides: No bathtub, one tiny awkward shower, no air conditioning, very early 10 am checkout and late check in at 4 pm, Realtor lock box on door, cleaning crew arrived at 9:55 am while we were leaving from our stay.
Great view, good value,nice location
