Great location and very convenient. Feel like home and the host is quite nice!

name: Chic City Pad with Leafy Outlook
summary: Recently renovated and truly spacious studio apartment in the heart of Potts Point. Within walking distance to some of Sydney's best attractions and an easy 8 min walk to Kings Cross Train Station. Beautifully renovated and appointed, you will have access to free Wi-Fi, the new kitchen with cooking facilities, washer & dryer and the building's stunning pool!  The space works for solo adventurers and business travellers, with the comfortable queen sized bed making it perfect for couples.
space: My studio apartment is beautifully renovated and spacious, with a super comfortable queen sized wall bed, making it perfect for a relaxing stay in Sydney. There is a full sized kitchen with cooking facilities, if you feel liked a home cooked meal and coin operated clothes washing and drying facilities on every floor of the building.  Access to the apartment is hassle free, through the gorgeous new entry foyer and up the newly refurbished lifts. The apartment has free wireless internet and a HD TV, with access to online movie rental services, if you feel like staying in. I know you will love the space and the city views from the large windows, as I have endeavoured to see to every detail, to make your trip and stay as comfortable and convenient as possible.
description: Recently renovated and truly spacious studio apartment in the heart of Potts Point. Within walking distance to some of Sydney's best attractions and an easy 8 min walk to Kings Cross Train Station. Beautifully renovated and appointed, you will have access to free Wi-Fi, the new kitchen with cooking facilities, washer & dryer and the building's stunning pool!  The space works for solo adventurers and business travellers, with the comfortable queen sized bed making it perfect for couples. My studio apartment is beautifully renovated and spacious, with a super comfortable queen sized wall bed, making it perfect for a relaxing stay in Sydney. There is a full sized kitchen with cooking facilities, if you feel liked a home cooked meal and coin operated clothes washing and drying facilities on every floor of the building.  Access to the apartment is hassle free, through the gorgeous new entry foyer and up the newly refurbished lifts. The apartment has free wireless internet and a HD TV, with
neighborhood_overview: Potts Point is one of Sydney's premier suburbs. Its tree lined streets, beautiful old apartment blocks and easy access to Sydney CBD, Royal Botanical Gardens, Woolloomooloo Wharf, Circular Quay and all of Sydney's best attractions, make it one the most desirable places to live and visit in Sydney. You'll love the local cafe and restaurant scene and the gorgeous boutique shopping that is literarily on your doorstep. A perfect place to base yourself for your stay in Sydney.
transit: Kings Cross Station is an 8 min walk straight down Macleay and Victoria Streets, where you can directly access all of Sydney and the Airport. Potts Point is a popular suburb close the CDB, so there is also a multitude of bus services on your doorstep and there is never a shortage of taxis.
access: You will have full access to all the facitilities of the apartment, such as kitchen, bathroom, laundry, wireless internet etc.  The building also features a swimming pool, which you are welcome to use at your leisure.
interaction: I will be available 24hrs each day during your stay, just phone or email me. I will also most likely be there to check you in and show you around the apartment when you arrive in Sydney.

host.host_about: Hi I'm Vickie! I am an avid traveller who loves my city and Airbnb allows me to share it with you and!!! I truly enjoy meeting new people and look forward to welcoming you to my beautiful city.

reviews.comments:
Spend a great 2 nights at Vickie's studio. Well decorated, had everything we need and surprisingly spacious. It was my first time in Sydney, so the location was just perfect; many good cafes and restaurants near by.

Vickie is an amazing host, she made sure we were comfortable and well adjusted. Great person to communicate with.

Merci Victoria pour votre charmant accueil, votre appartement est charmant dans un quartier anim√© avec des caf√©s et restaurants √† proximit√©. 15 mn √† pied de CBD et de l'op√©ra de Sydney. La vue de l'appartement est d√©gag√©e et tr√®s bien expos√©.
Merci pour vos messages de compassion suite aux attentants de Nice. Je vous recommande cette adresse.
Fabienne

What a fabulous Studio in the centre of Potts Point. I was lucky enough to be one of the first to stay here. Everything is lovely, fresh and new. It's quiet, but at the same time has everything on the doorstep. Vickie is a wonderful host and made sure I was comfortable.

Vickie was a lovely host and did everything she could to help and make our stay enjoyable. The apartment is in an excellent position - close to restaurants and cafes as well as walking distance from the city. The apartment itself is great with a very comfortable bed and has everything you need.

Vickie is an amazing host with a beautiful apartment. Location is incredible- right by lovely restaurants and bars, and only a quick ride into the city. The apartment itself was gorgeous- so clean, light and airy. Queen bed is super comfortable as well. I highly recommend this apartment, and would love to stay here again. Perfect Airbnb experience.

The apartment was exactly like the photos, brand new and very clean.
The bed was a fold out from the wall, very comfy and the pillow and blankets were amazing.
Perfect apartment! Great local restaurants and supermarket across the road. Perfect and professional communication from the host. Well done. I will stay here for business again.

Great location! A very nice area with lots of bars, shops and restaurants close by and a nice stroll to the city. Clean, modern and comfortable apartment. Very friendly and helpful hosts who were great at communicating and made us feel very welcome. We would definitely stay there again!

The studio was clean and nicely furnish. The sofa and bed are comfortable, and the apartment has a ledge by the window with chairs to people-watch in the day. It has everything necessary for a short term and long term stay. There is a big TV with chromecast that was so useful when my partner and I simply hung in the apartment after a day of exploring.

Victoria was prompt in responses and prepare materials abt the area and the facilities that were very useful. Check-in process was very easy. 

Highly recommended, and will be very happy to be hosted by her again when I visit Sydney.
Apartments is small but it is nice and well located. The street is good and plenty of good restaurants and just 5min walking to king cross station

We really enjoyed our stay at Victoria's place. It was a beautiful apartment in a fantastic location; close to all shops and amenities. Kings cross is only a short walk away but most days we walked through the beautiful botanic gardens to Central Quays. 
We really appreciated being able to stay until after lunch on our leaving day. The apartment was beautifully clean and although cosy had everything we needed.
Vickie was an excellent host and responded to any queries very promptly despite being away at the time.
I would definitely stay at this apartment again if visiting Sydney.

We stayed at Vickie's apartment for five nights and we enjoyed it a lot. The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures and it's well-equipped, beautiful and cozy (the bed is especially comfortable). 
Victoria was very friendly and easy to communicate with. When we had issues with the wifi, she immediately came over and sorted everything out, although it was already 8 or 8.30 in the evening. She also gave us a lot of information about restaurants, bars and sights in the area. All of her recommendations were really good too!
We had an amazing time in Sydney, thanks to our great host Vickie and her lovely apartment. We can definitely recommend this place! :)

Victoria √® un Host perfetto. Ci siamo sentiti molto spesso per cordinare il viaggio. La casa √® molto vicina al centro molto pulita e graziosa.  Se dovessi tornare a Sydney sicuramente sceglier√≤ nuovamente questo appartamento.

Vickie is The perfect host. She is very nice and polite. The apartment was cute and clean. The location of the flat is good and Vickie gives you recommendations of were to have good meals next to it. We would definetly come back there if we ever came to Sydney again!

Victoria's Chic City Pad was an an excellent stay!! She made my friend and I feel really welcomed from the start! She communicated clearly about the arrival time and gave us great advice about the city. She also checked in regularly to ensure we were enjoying our stay. The neighbourhood is very posh, a less than 30 minute walk from the Opera House and Harbour Bridge, as well as the Botanical Gardens. It was easy to find from Kings Cross train station and we loved the modern feel and look of the flat.
Great apartment close to everything. Vickie was really easy to communicate with on our arrival and knowledgable of the area too! highly reccomend.
The apartment was amazing. Perfect location. So comfortable and had everything we needed. Victoria was communicative and attentive. Would love to come back.
Awesome location and great host. Flexible with arrival and departure needs too. Thanks for a great stay Vickie!

Victoria was super quick to respond to all questions, the location is amazing, great area for cafes and bars, also very central to close to the train so it's very to get around.  Lovely and clean space, it was a pleasure to stay

Check in was very easy. Victoria was there to meet me, explained the area, where everything was and was very helpful in letting me check out later. It was a great stay, definitely recommend the space for any solo travellers and the area for anyone who is looking for great food, and a nice relaxing atmosphere.

Victoria's apartment was perfect for exploring Sydney for the weekend. It's comfortable, well equipped and super convenient to everything Potts Point has to offer. Victoria was a great host too, meeting me on check in and showing me where everything was in the apartment. I'll be back if I need to stay in the area again :)

Victoria's place saved me from a terrible previous Air b&b experience I was in. It was extremely clean, comfortable, quiet, and relaxing. She was more than helpful when I arrived and had great pointers on what to do in the area. I wish I could've stayed longer! Highly recommend her place.
Victoria was a very welcoming host. Her place is excellently located

Loved staying in this apartment! Perfect location to walk / jog down to Botanical gardens & Sydney Opera House & Sydney Harbour Bridge! Which we did Worthing 1hour of checking in! Lovely secure building with nice friendly reception staff. Check in was easy- Vickie's communication was so great- although she couldn't make it when we checked in- she sent her lovely son who showed us all we needed to know! The apartment itself has a nifty pull down (wall) bed which is super comfortable - more than initially expected! 

The apartment has perfect use of the space- lots of natural light and natural decor- nice and fresh! 

Perfect size for a short 3day break in Sydney! Beware of the shower- quite a puzzle to regulate the hot and cold when having a shower... 
Overall a great stay- highly recommend!

Perfect host! Vickie was so helpful and full of great recommendations. 
The location is perfect! Such a lovely area! 
Great coffee across the road at Bottega Del Vino (and that's coming from a melbourner).
Across the road from Woolworths, lovely bookshop down the road and great restaurants on your doorstep! 
The apartment is small but full of light! 
Perfect for two people. 
Will be staying back here if ever in Sydney again.

Vickie was an absolute lovely host!  She rushed to clean the studio and get us in as early as possible and was an absolutely amazing communicator.  She helped with any and all questions even while staying at other locations throughout Sydney.  I highly recommend her studio as she is prompt and a joy to be around!
The apartment is lovely and the area is simply perfect. A fantastic walk through the Botanical Gardens to Sydney's CBD. Loads of great restaurants, bars and cafes on your doorstep.
The apartment is in a great location in Potts Point.  There are many restaurants, cafes, and markets right outside the door.  We really enjoyed our time!
Victoria was a very gracious and friendly host! The apartment was clean and as described. She gave us a lot of great recommendations for the area, as well.

Victoria was at the studio apt to greet us, show us where everything was and to give us advice on finding our way around Sydney. She was very pleasant and helpful.  The apt was very clean, had all we needed and was easily accessible to the CBD, the Opera House and harbour. Lots of restaurants, cafes, shops close by plus a food market right across the street.   A very nice and secure building.

A great experience staying at Victoria's place in Potts Point! Cozy place with great views.. we loved looking out the windows at the comings and goings of the street below. Also very centrally located, it was easy getting anywhere! Everything you need is available at the apartment and with Woolies just across the street, it was easy getting anything else you need too. Victoria is very responsive, and a pleasure to communicate with. Thanks for the great stay Vickie!

Cozy place to stay for a few days. We had a minor issue in the apartment and Victoria was quick to respond and provided a quick fix. The location is  walking distance to the botanical garden with access to grocery store across the street and good restaurants along the street.  Would stay again if we return for a visit in the future.

Vickie is a great host! Such a lovely and helping women, we had a wonderful time at the apartment.
I can totally recommend Vickies Apartment for a trip to Sydney and would definitely stay there again, if I get a chance to.
The apartment looks just like on the pictures, you will find everything nice and clean. The kitchen is perfect for having breakfast and little snacks at the apartment, but you can cook there as well.
The train station is within walking distance. However we mostly walked into the city as you can walk by the water and see the main attractions (opera house, Harbour Bridge). It's a nice walk of about 20min.

Victoria has been an amazing host. Her place is fully equipped with everything, cozy, great location and most importantly clean! Will definitely stay at Victoria's again when we visit Sydney!

Great location, snug and clean apartment with a very comfy bed. Close to the train station, beautiful walks nearby and heaps of cafes and restaurants on the surrounding streets. Loved our stay here at Victoria‚Äôs!
Great Studio for relaxing and unwinding. Everything good that‚Äôs local is right at your doorstep.

The studio apartment was what we expected and exactly enough for two people, the bathroom though was kinda small. The television was connected to Chrome Cast so I enjoyed that. The location was near the bus stop and a 10-15 minute walk from the train station which is King's Cross. If you're a tourist, you'll probably want to walk around the city center, which is Town Hall (two stops from King's Cross Station). It is very convenient.

Victoria's place is ideally situated.  It has absolutely everything you may need and the supermarket and shops along the road are super handy!  Victoria is great at maintaining communication and is very accommodating.  We had a super stay and wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.  Be sure to check out the local market at the square with the fountain if you are there on a Saturday.

My sister and I had a wonderful stay at Victoria's place! It was in a quiet area that was a quick walk or Uber ride to wherever we were headed. The place was clean and check in was easy. We we're able to make breakfast each morning with the provided amenities. The apartment was perfect for our 3 day stay.
Long story short, with no doubt a five star place. Great location, quiet, clean, store literally across the street... perfect. Will be back!

Diese Unterkunft k√∂nnen wir nur bestens empfehlen
Sch√∂nes Appartement in einer sehr guten Lage, drumherum sind viele Restaurants und Caf√©s mit gutem Essen

Vickie went absolutely above and beyond to make our stay as perfect as possible - offering early check in and also offering us to leave our luggage in the apartment after check out so we could continue to explore Sydney!

The apartment itself is simple, in a great location and included everything that was needed for a comfortable, enjoyable stay. The addition of the chocolates, Sydney travel tips as well as local eateries etc was great. 

Would definitely recommend this apartment and will be back to stay when we next go to Sydney.

Vickie‚Äôs apartment is exactly as the photos show! It is a fantastic place. Big room and really good sunlight coming into the apartment. The bed was comfortable and I liked that the showers had really hot water! There is a woolsworth just opposite the apartment! Will not hesitate staying at this place again when I‚Äôm in Sydney!
Highly recommended! Convenient location, beautiful place, hospitable host!
A well-located and very clean flat ‚Äî would stay here again!

AMAZING! The apartment made my trip to Sydney- such a chic space in an awesome neighborhood. Am already planning my trip back!

This is a lovely little apartment in a great area.  Benefits are being close to Kings Cross train station so you can train straight from the airport changing at Central. You can walk into the city through the gardens.  Having a supermarket across the road is great too. Highly recommend this place.
Great location, really clean, funky apartment. Good for one or two travellers. Generous supplies and easy communication. Highly recommended!
really good location in Potts point close to everything. Host suggestions  were great and was really helpful. I'd recommend this apartment had all the essentials. small and cosy.
We had a really good time, the apartment is as great as advertised. Perfect place to discover Sydney, by foot and public transport.
Great little apartment, amazing location
Thanks a lot for a very pleasant stay at your apartment! We enjoyed it and recommed it! Also you are an amazing friendly host!
A great place to stay in Sydney.

Victoria's apartment was perfect for us.  We enjoyed the area for its cleanliness, restaurants and caf√©s.  The convenience to the train after a busy day to come "home" was very nice.   An easy walk to central city was our daily preference. 

Victoria's apartment is well equipped and clean.   Everyday we were pleased to wake up there.  We would definitely return to Victoria's Chic City Pad with leafy outlook.

Thanks Victoria for offering  your apartment to others, especially to us!!
 Bruce and Alston Johnson 
from Virginia, USA
Great location!

Nice little place for a short Stay, food for breakfast including coffee was provided and the area is great as you have nice cafes and Restaurants close.

El apartamento de Victoria es genial! La ubicaci√≥n es excelente, muy cerca del centro y de la estaci√≥n King Cross. El barrio es bell√≠simo! Estaba super completo, con todo lo que podr√≠a necesitar, tanto en la cocina como en el ba√±o..... muy recomendable!!!! Lo volver√≠a a elegir!!

Amazing apartment in a lovely part of Sydney. The apartment has everything you need during your stay and more. Victoria was a fantastic host and I wouldn't hesitate to stay again. A 20 minute walk via the botanical gardens to the opera house, makes it ideal for exploring the city!

We had a great stay at Vickie‚Äôs apartment. The location is central and there are plenty of nice places to eat and also a supermarket across the road. Vickie was very helpful in messages as unfortunately we didn‚Äôt get a chance to meet. I would definitely stay again!

This apartment was perfect. Its a great location with easy access to transport around Sydney and most places are within walking distance. The local area surrounding the apartment is very nice, with lots of restaurants, bars and shops.

The apartment was very clean and ideal for us as a couple. Check in was straight forward with good communication from Vickie. Would happily stay here again.
Excellent location, walking distance to the Opera house, plenty of restaurants around. The Airbnb unit is very nice, clean and comfortable for 2 in a very secure apartment building
Great place to stay if you plan on staying a night or two. A little farther than I expected to the opera house. Had to Uber
Great place to stay at!

This was a wonderful stay; the location could not be more convenient and trendy. Vicki provided excellent local recommendations, which was helpful due to the sheer volume of cafes and restaurants within walking distance. The room was comfortable and clean, and Vicki went well above and beyond to save me when I'd locked important personal items inside the room after checkout (I don't want every guest taking advantage of her emergency hospitality, but I can't thank her enough)!
A great apartment ideal location, very clean and everything perfect
Exceeded expectations!
This is a perfect place to explore Sydney from, and Vickie is an excellent host!

Couldn‚Äôt be a better location. There‚Äôs a food store across the street to stock up and you could spend a month just exploring in walking distance.  The laundry down the hall was very nice to have or you can use a laundry mat across the street.  I‚Äôd seek out this very spot if I return to Sydney.

I did not have the opportunity to meet Vickie, but everything was clearly and quickly communicated. The apartment is beautifully and functionally decorated, with everything present you could need. The internet is fast and reliable, the kitchen well-equipped. I slept very well in the bed, with a choice of pillow hardness. The place is perfectly located, not far from restaurants, and a very lovely 30' stroll through the impressive botanical gardens to the Opera House. Highly recommended place to stay!

Great location with choices for everything you might need (cafes, restaurants, supermarket, transport (bus, rail to CBD), within easy reach.  For walkers, wending your way down to Woolloomooloo, Mrs Macquarie's Chair & Botanical Gardens is a treat.  Vickie's city pad is a comfortable, tidy, pleasant retreat with a lovely view.  The immediate surroundings are excellent, as is the building in which the apartment is situated.

Our stay in Sydney in Victoria's apartment was great. It is nicely and conveniently located in the beautiful Elizabeth Bay area. Public transport can be reached easily and even a walk to the Opera House is easily possible. The apartment is small but equipped with everything that two people need. Even breakfast and coffee was there. We would stay here again!
Perfect base for exploring the city and very well equipped.

The actual unit is in a great location and we enjoyed the walk to the Royal Botanical gardens and Sydney Opera House.  There is also a nice coffee spot down the street.  Unfortunately, in the listing, it says there is free street parking and we could not find any free street parking.  Upon arrival I called the host about the free street parking and she said there was not any.  We would have to park in the paid garage next to the premises, which would be $30-40 per night.  Or drive into another neighborhood (not close) to maybe find street parking.  We were staying 3 nights so that could be up to $90.  I would have figured out a different place or other parking arrangements if I knew ahead of time.  Later she messaged and said that the free street parking is limited by time.  I feel that is quite unfair to say free street parking if it is only for 1 hour or so.  So if you are traveling with a car, this is something to consider.

Victoria's studio apartment is a compact space that is thoughtfully outfitted. The location is great with plenty of amenities within easy walking distance and an easy bus connection to the CBD. Simple meals can be cooked in the kitchen on the hot plate and microwave, however even that can be tricky as there is no extra counter space to do prep or hold hot items other than on the hot plate. Victoria was very accommodating and attentive in her communications.
Amazing location, nice cozy apartment !
good location, nice & clean apartment plus if you need anything Victoria is super fast in answering, would stay here again :)

Very clean, lift very useful, many extras (milk, juice, coffee, etc., pamphlets to discover the city), host very quick to answer our questions, well decorated, 30 minute walk from opera house. Would recommend
A fab apartment in a great location. The view from the big window is lovely and great for people watching. The cafe at Elizabeth Bay Marina is a must for breakfast. Victoria was a great host.

What a great apartment and host. 
Vickie made our stay amazing, a very lovely person.
The place was very modern and clean. At arrival Vickie welcomed us with som
good info about the area and Sydney, and some sweets.
Apartments location was really good, and a lot of great restaurants.
We can't wait to revisit and stay at this great place again.
Love Max and Daniella.

Saubere Unterkunft mit perfekter Lage um Sydney zu erkunden. Die Sehensw√ºrdigkeiten sind fu√ül√§ufig erreichbar.
Das Apartment ist klein aber v√∂llig ausreichend f√ºr 2 Personen und gut ausgestattet. Wir w√ºrden uns wieder f√ºr dieses Apartment entscheiden.

Victoria‚Äôs place is amazing! Great location with a short walk into the CBD, clean and tidy, tips about the local area and much more. Would recommend to anyone!

I arranged this Airbnb for my parents to come visit Sydney and Victoria was more than happy to help them with instructions and personal requests! Will definitely stay again. My parents thought the place was beautiful and were so excited they kept sending me photos of their stay! Well done Victoria! Thank you so much.
Well located and comfortable place. Generous host. Clear communication. Comfortable bed and pillows. Great shower. All good! Highly recommended.

Fabulous location with wonderful restaurants in walking distance.    

It was also an easy walk into the city taking only about 20 minutes.  In addition, the hop on hop off bus picks up just down the street.   

Victoria provided excellent communication throughout our booking process as well as the check in process.
Compact and well located. A great place for a short stay in Sydney.

Victoria‚Äôs place was spacious enough for two people and very clean studio. Its location was pretty good. She helped me and responded very quickly whenever I needed her. There is public coin washing machine and dryer on the same floor ($3 each) Everything was quite pleasant and safe.

Great stay, just what we wanted right in the center and super friendly. Thank you

Malgr√© une arriv√©e tres tardive Katharina est rest√©e disponible pour nous accueillir. Le logement est tr√®s bien : bonne situation, propre et agr√©able. Nous reviendrons sans h√©sitation

Well situated near the main tourist area, but on a side street and the room and balcony face a quiet interior courtyard.  Kitchen and bath are well equipped. We loved it and recommend it

Kateryna's place is perfectly clean and comfortable and a great location- around 3 mins walk to la rambla. We were dissapointed however by the fact that we did not really get a double bed but rather 2 single beds pushed together. I think its also important to note that when we stayed there Kateryna was not living in the flat herself but her mother was. There was also a distinctive smell of cigarette smoke throughout the flat however we managed to keep this out of our room by having the door shut at all times. Overall our stay in Barcelona was fantastic however I feel that for the price we paid the above issues were not really acceptable.  If these could be fixed I would be happy to stay here again as the flat was in a good location and kept clean.

Even though our trip was planned last minute, Kateryna made sure we arrived comfortably. She was also very helpful and fast to respond to anything we needed. The location was central and walking distance to everything.
Eine echt super und freundliche Gastgeberin. Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber und mit der Kommunikation hat alles super geklappt. Ich freue mich auf das n√§chste mal. LG Dennis

Very central location, but was quiet overall and felt safe walking around. Kateryna's mom stays in one bedroom and is very quiet and pleasant. The second and third room is rented out. There were times when the apartment smelled like cigarettes but was likely because the patio doors were open, and neighbours smoke on their patio. We closed the doors when we left the apartment and did not have that issue again. Would recommend!

Great Location to explore Barca, the appartment is a 1-2 min walk off the Rambla and the next Metro Station. 
Late check-in went very smooth, Kateryna even got out of bed to let us in shortly before midnight. 
Otherwise we did not feel too comfortable, most of time there were other people in the appartment rooms, not really knowing if they were family members or other guests?
Would definitely go there again !!
Adoramos tudo! A gentileza dos anfitrioes, a limpeza, a localizacao.... perfeito pra n√≥s!!! Nos sentimos em casa
Stay was wonderful. Great location close to Rambla and the Metro very convenient!

Excelente lugar, ubicado a dos cuadras de La Rambla y lleno de tiendas, bares, restaurantes y muy cerca al barrio G√≥tico. Departamento muy c√°lido con excelente ducha. La comunicaci√≥n y el trato con las anfitrionas tambi√©n! Lo recomendamos!
Excelente ubicaci√≥n junto a La Rambla. La habitaci√≥n era amplia. El ba√±o y la cocina compartidos muy limpios. Lugar muy recomendable!

Kateryna's place was really wonderful. Such great hospitality; she provided us with everything we needed as well as offered coffee and muffins. The apartment was very warm (during the winter) which was nice, and the place was very clean as well. When you first get to the building, it looks a bit sketchy, but don't be worried, her apartment is really well kept up. And of course the location is super central, steps from La Ramblas. Would recommend.
Host eccellente.....da provare

Passez outre l'aspect de l'entr√©e et de la cage d'escalier d√©labr√©s : l'appartement est tr√®s bien, parfaitement situ√©. On y dort super au calme alors qu'il est si proche de l'animation.
Kateryna  accueille avec le sourire et laisse √† disposition tout ce qu'il faut pour √™tre comme chez soi au c≈ìur de Barcelone.
very nice and very good
Host was welcoming and insightful on local amenities and tourist attractions. Very neat, clean and spacious accommodation. Perfect location. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience.
Great Host and amazing Location .
That was nice to stay at her flat!

Super Lage, die Zimmer sind okay, Kommunikation etwas schwierig(au√üer man spricht russisch) und die Ausstattung der K√ºche ist etwas sperrlich.
Will man jedoch nur einen sauberen Platz, in super Lage zum schlafen, ist diese Unterkunft nur zu empfehlen.

We selected this apartment as it is close to the metro and Rambla, the popular tourist street. However, we were surprised that the description did not say that there are 50 steps in a poorly lighted staircase to the apartment. Kateryna‚Äôs mother Nadia, greeted us and lives in the apartment. They rent out another bedroom and had several guest during our 8 night stay. Our bedroom had a comfortable bed but was not air conditioned and quite hot even in September. It had a small hanger for clothes which was inadequate. There was a strong smell of cooking from other apartments. Nadia is also a smoker which was bothersome as we don‚Äôt smoke. It was very difficult to adjust the temperature of the water, especially in the shower.  Even taking a short 1 minute shower, the water went from boiling hot to freezing cold since the water heater is too small or malfunctioning. The listing included use of the kitchen, but Nadia appeared not too happy that we cooked some meals there. There is a washing machine in the kitchen and after the 3rd night, we asked Nadia if we could use it. She agreed to it. The other guest also used the washing machine. After the 6th night, we needed to wash another load. When the washing machine was in the spin cycle, Nadia came into the kitchen with very angry words and stopped it. There is no excuse for this behavior and it left us with a very bad impression.
Really close to the attractions, and the host was super cooperative and kind, the house was very clean and Barcelona is just greattttttt!

I would not recommend this apartment. It is cheap, but the quality is poor. Small room, horrible bed (when you want to sleep don't use the bed). The pictures in the ad are nicer than then reality. Don't go.

Buena ubicaci√≥n, no hay ascensor y hay mucha grada. A uno lo confunde que dice Primero! Y no cree que es el primer piso pero esta mas de cincuenta gradas arriba. Si no eres muy exigente, si no llevas mucho equipaje y gozas de buena salud, aprovecha la excelente ubicaci√≥n

Alex y Nadya son muy amables. La comunicacion fue buena y reactiva.
Piso muy bien ubiquado, centrico, cerca de las Ramblas. Habitaciones para alquilar, piso tranquilo, no ruido de la calle. Con todo que necesitamos (supermercados, transportes, bars...) Yo recomando! Gracias Nadya y Alex.

Despite the entrance of the building which looks very old and the 50 steps of stairs, the appart is good, clean and calm. It is also very well located. Nadiya and Alex were kind and good welcoming. During my stay, the two other rooms were occupied by other tourists, they were kind as well, there had been no problem. One thing to enhance, it is regarding a problem of warm water in the shower, I hope that this will be fixed asap so visitors in winter will not be obliged to finish their shower with cold water.
Thanks Nadiya and Alex and God bless your daughter.
Nadya is amazing host. The place is cozy and super clean. The location also is super nice,5 minutes walk to la Rambla. Definitely going to come back and more than once!)
Una habitaci√≥n sombr√≠a, sin nada de luz exterior, el balc√≥n da hacia una pared, las gradas del edificio est√°n muy sucias y deprimentes, ma√±a comunicaci√≥n con los anfitriones,

Clean and nice place. Good beds and a nice shower. Location is perfectly close to a metro station and the Main Street in Barcelona. Owners Nadiya and Alex are very friendly and flexible. We would recommend staying here.

name: Clarence House Apartment 1
summary: My place is fantastic for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.
space: Clarence House Apartment in the heart of the stunning metro, showcasing the city's highlights (including the Harbour Bridge and the Sydney Opera House).  The unit is situated on Level 1 of Clarence house in Clarence Street  Other features are: Combined lounge & dining area with Air Conditioning An open plan kitchen  A fully appointed modern bathroom A double-sized bedroom with 1 x queen bed, plus built in robe  Lounge area 1 x double sofa bed  This is a vibrant and cosmopolitan area with plenty to do and see.  Attractions include: The Australian Museum: The Australian Art Gallery: Sydney Opera House: Botanical Gardens: Hyde Park: War Memorial: Sydney Fish Markets: The Rocks: Luna Park: Sydney Harbour and Harbour Islands: Bondi and Harbour Beaches: The Aquarium: Taronga Zoo: VMax and the Ferry to Many. Don‚Äôt forget the Sydney Festival and The Bridge Climb. Keen shoppers will enjoy a variety of shopping experiences from weekend markets to High End Designer Outlets. Bedding 1 x Queen bed

Clarence House Apartment in the heart of the stunning metro, showcasing the city's highlights (including the Harbour Bridge and the Sydney Opera House).  The unit is situated on Level 1 of Clarence house in Clarence Street  Other features are: Combined lounge & dining area with Air Conditioning An open plan kitchen  A fully appointed modern bathroom A double-sized bedroom with 1 x queen bed, plus built in robe  Lounge area 1 x double sofa bed  This is a vibrant and cosmopolitan area with plenty to do and see.  Attractions include: The Australian Museum: The Australian Art Gallery: Sydney Opera House: Botanical Gardens: Hyde Park: War Memorial: Sydney Fish Markets: The Rocks: Luna Park: Sydney Harbour and Harbour Islands: Bondi and Harbour Beaches: The Aquarium: Taronga Zoo: VMax and the Ferry to Many. Don‚Äôt forget the Sydney Festival and The Bridge Climb. Keen shoppers will enjoy a variety of shopping experien
neighborhood_overview: This is a vibrant and cosmopolitan area with plenty to do and see.  Attractions include: The Australian Museum: The Australian Art Gallery: Sydney Opera House: Botanical Gardens: Hyde Park: War Memorial: Sydney Fish Markets: The Rocks: Luna Park: Sydney Harbour and Harbour Islands: Bondi and Harbour Beaches: The Aquarium: Taronga Zoo: V Max and the Ferry to Many. Don‚Äôt forget the Sydney Festival and The Bridge Climb. Keen shoppers will enjoy a variety of shopping experiences from weekend markets to High End Designer Outlets.
notes: Small convenience store right across from the building. All long weekends are a minimum 3 night stay, all public holidays are charged at the Weekend Tariff and Easter is a minimum 4 night stay. We have a one week minimum stay with any New Year's Eve booking.
transit: The apartment is a 5 minute walk to Wynyard railway station and then a 3 minute train ride to the city centre. There are also local buses, light rail, Taxi's & Uber available.
access: There are 1 set of keys available which are picked up via the lock box at the front door so those in your party can come and go easily during your stay. Ground level entry for easy access with suitcases, groceries etc and a lift to the 1st floor.
interaction: We won't be around to interact with you, however Joanne does live locally and is on hand if required. We will be available to help with check-in, check-out and any questions you have during your stay.
house_rules: Standard Terms and Conditions of Temporary Holiday Accommodation: Note: Variances can be agreed on but only by arrangement with the owner in writing. Deposit of 50% non-refundable is required to secure the booking. Payment of the rental deposit constitutes the clients acceptance of these Terms and Conditions. Balance of the rental amount must be received in full 28 days prior to occupancy. If not the owner has the right to cancel the booking and attempt to re let it.  Cancellation if caused by the client, money paid is not refundable unless the house is re-let for the entire period. If it a refund is made due to the property being re-let then a $100 cancellation fee will apply.  The owners will make every effort to ensure the property is available as booked.  However the owners reserve the right to make alterations to bookings due to unforeseen circumstances. To maintain a good standard for our guests we require certain conditions to be complied with. We appreciate most will respect ou

host.host_about:
Joanne ‚Äì I‚Äôve always loved to travel and even though my three boys now keep me closer to my home in Sydney‚Äôs Inner West, I take every opportunity to enjoy family holidays in apartments and houses booked online throughout Australia and New Zealand.

Ali ‚Äì I‚Äôve been living in the Blue Mountains since 1993, so I could be called a local! This means I have a wealth of knowledge about this amazing part of Australia that I have decided to call home. It also means that I have the opportunity to stay in some of the most beautiful and unique houses in the world.

reviews.comments: Joanna and Ali's place is nicely located in the CBD and close to anything you need. The home is neatly kept and well presented. My interstate guest enjoyed the stay and any issue that came up was quickly looked after.
El apartamento es amplio y est√° muy bien ubicado ya que est√° en el centro, adem√°s tiene una parada de tren a 3 minutos caminando.
Really nice apartment with an excellent location in Sydney, I totally recommend it! Also Joanne and Ali are really nice, as they solved all my questions really fast.

Location was excellent and perfect for the places I had to visit during my stay.  Apartment was clean and tidy with sufficient amenities.  7 Eleven across the road was convenient and Commonwealth bank on the corner was handy.  Couple of small issues but sorted with the Hosts.

A lovely little apartment! Comfy bed and everything that we needed for our stay in Sydney. This isn't flash - staying here is about location, not amenities. Super close (walking distance) to everything you might want to visit. Some slight issues with the shower and a little cramped - this is a place for two people for a couple of days maximum! We didn't meet Joanne and Ali but they were great arranging flexible options for our stay.

Very good location!
I just thought the place had an old smell that irritated my allergic nose. :( But may be just me...

The apartment is in a great location. It  does not have wifi and as I was spending two week for work it was an inconvenience so do bare this in mind. I tried to contact the hosts about this and did not get a reply from them. After an issue a week later to do with cleanliness Rob their property manager did reply to me and was very kind in offering me a meal for free for the inconvenience and got a cleaner to come in. 
A nice apartment on the whole which  just needs some TLC.

It's a convenient one bedroom apt for one person, if you don't need wifi (which is rare and unbelievable), neither a long and relaxing hot bath (there's prob with hot water, I kept it low to avoid running out of hot water at the end of my shower), nor a quiet sleep in the morning (massive noise in the neighborhood due to tram construction). This apt is all about location in the city.

The place was spacious and comfortable but the best part about it is the location. It's in the center of town, making all the major destinations easily accessible. In addition, Ali and Joanne were very accommodating with our early check in. The amenities, however, were lacking. We were hoping to shower after our long flight but there were no bath towels when we arrived. I texted Ali and the towels were delivered while we were out for lunch. There was only one tube of shampoo and conditioner provided that were clearly taken from hotels. There was a bar of soap for bathing and it had obviously been used before. The previous things I can deal with, but for our 5 night stay for 2 people, there was only one and a half rolls of toilet paper. I texted Ali for toilet paper, shampoo, and soap twice, but received no response.

I loved the apartment, but it needs to be better stocked.
The host was very helpful, and all went smoothly.
We stayed here for a family of four. Fantastic location! Hot water pressure could have been stronger but otherwise it's fantastic accomodation for a short weekend away.
Great location,  clean and hosts very friendly.

Communication with the hosts was great and immediate. The apartment is very centrally located and within walking distance of all galleries, shops etc. Perfect for a couple or two friends happy to share a room.

Great place, central and quiet. The actual building is quite old, but the apartment itself is fine. Internet is provided in the form of a 4G dongle. All the cook wear was very useable. The hot water pressure is low, like some of the other guests have mentioned but overall useable.

The location is great, for both business travellers and tourists.
The place is easy to find, great location, very close to westfield and supermarket coles. But there is no shampoo and shower gel in the apartment.

This cozy apartment had everything we needed for our new years holiday in Sydney. All the main touristic spots are literally walking distance (Darling Harbour, Circular Quay, Sydney Town Hall, main shopping centres). When we needed to use the train, Wynyard Station was just a couple of blocks away. Savings time and money with this prime location was definitely a bonus.
The flat feels bigger than in the pictures. The building feels old but once you get inside the flat everything is well kept. The main bed and the sofa bed were comfy and with white crisp linens. Had plenty bath and face towels. Did not find a problem with the hot water pressure as previously stated (might have been fixed). There are washing and drying machines in perfect working condition. The bedroom has a ceiling fan that was enough to sleep, there were a couple of pretty hot nights outside but we only needed to turn on the aircon for a couple of hours and the entire flat would cool off. The kitchen has everything needed to prepare all meals.
Dealing with the host was also a pleasant experience. All the information requested was given in a straightforward manner without delay. 
Overall, a great experience! Highly recommended

The apartment is nice and perfect for city stays. 

My disappointment came when my 70yr old parents we kept awake all night from major reconstruction. Bins are also collected at 130am from outside the apartment. We were not told this was happening.

My mum recleaned on moving in. The dust on top of units and cupboard and under the bed was terrible. Expect a light clean and sheet change on arrival

My parents left 4 nights early and i moved onto my couch. 

No response when feedback was given after stay. 

I would recommend the apartment when Sydney tram works is complete in 2018.

My stay got of to a bumpy start as the room had not been prepare for my arrival, I assume there was a communication issue between the cleaner and the owner, but the owners rectified the problems the following day, and also offered $60 to cover a couple of meals for the inconvenience .

overall my stay was good and description and pictures where accurate, location was great, 5 mins walk to wynyard station,15 mins  to darling harbour & 3mins to woolies.
I may stay again and would ask for confirmation on the room been ready  before my arrival.

A great one week holiday in Sydney for 1st time ....... certainly not the last time, would come again to stay and will recommend to others! Very comfortable and well equipped should you wish to make your own break, lunch to dinner.
Great place to stay in. Clean and well equipped overall. Very near to darling harbour and to nearest train station.

Nous avons pass√© 4 jours √† Sydney, et le s√©jour dans l'appartement de Joanne et Ali, tr√®s bien situ√© au centre-ville, nous a permis de visiter la ville en nous d√©pla√ßant souvent √† pieds. 
L'appartement est confortable et bien √©quip√©, et 3-4 personnes peuvent y s√©journer avec plaisir.

You can't beat this location. We stayed for almost a week and walked or took a very convenient train everywhere that we cared to go. The size of the apartment was adequate and comfortable but not terribly large. It was reasonably clean and put together but not luxurious. The hosts were very kind to allow us to check in several hours early and we never actually meet anyone in person as the key was conveniently in a lock box. Overall it was consistent with the description and our expectations. I would recommend this for others particularly given the convenient location.
Excelente ubicaci√≥n. C√≥modo apartamento y de f√°cil alquiler..
Good
Nice and tidy place right in the heart of the Sydney CBD. Great access to all things in the city.
Very good!
Very good!
Very central location. The place is not big, but cosy for 2 people. Host is a bit hard to reach, but the check-in is easy enough.

The apartament is very good. It is very close bars, restaurant and metro station. It is perfect for a couple. The apartment does not receive much sunligh. But this is not a problem. I and my girlfriend recomend the Joanne apartament. Everthing is good.
Excellent location

The apartment was central and nicely set out.  The sofa bed is a click clack and not very comfortable.  The air con didn't work and therefore the apartment was stuffy as we felt we couldn't safely leave the window open.
We would stay again due to the convenience for the city.

We had a great time! Location is perfect, walking distance to Circular Quay, to the train, bus stops,shopping and the supermarket 3 min away! Apartment had everything we needed: equipped kitchen, washer, dryer... very comfortable place! Would definetly recommend it!
Great location.
great location and value

This compact apartment is well located in the CBD for walking down to the quay/Opera House/Park. It is a little tired and shabby. It is fine as a base but not so good if you need spend much time there. The windows look out onto the wall of the neighbouring building and the noise from the street and the garbage collectors goes on into the night.
Good location with near most tourist spots in CBD. Just few mins walk to QVB,Darling Harbour...etc. Easy check in and stylish decoration. I will stay again if I come again.

Good central accommodation near train and bus . Bed is soft but slept well. Good for a few nights in city, I stayed for business and it was great with lunge and kitchen for breakfast etc or dinner if you wanted. I ate at local eateries nearby. Easy to book, 
Great for 1 or 2 travelers, easy entry, secure building . I would stay again. So convenient . Thank u Ali.
Well kept apartment in a great central location. Hosts made stay easy.

Location was great. Perfect to walk to just about all the sights. The unit was small  but had all you would require for a shot stay. Having a washing machine and dryer was a plus. My only negative was the oven was dirty and the floor could have done with a good wash.
Despite the building being quite old, the apartment was very tidy and well looked after.
Amazing home right in the city. Can‚Äôt beat the experience and atmosphere by Joanne/Ali‚Äôs place! Had a lot of fun with my friends
Best Location and the Suite is Spacious  ‚ù§Ô∏è

The apartment is very well located! You can walk to the shopping centers, the Sydney Opera or the Harbour Bridge! The kitchen has everything you need!
We had a good time at Clearance House!
Perfect, problem free stay.

The location of this apartment is great - close walking distance to Sydney‚Äôs main attractions and anything else in the CBD. There is a Woolworth Express right around the corner to stock up on whatever you would like for food, snacks, or sundries. Very convenient.

The apartment windows look into an alley where it is noisy early from garbage trucks, vehicles, and other maintenance. The hosts informed us about this.

We had issues checking in as the apartment was not cleaned, which got resolved. That said, we never received confirmation from the host or property manager, after specifically inquiring to both, if the bed linens were laundered after the previous guest left or the bed was just made with the same linens.

A few comments about the apartment. The mattress is less than acceptable IMO.  It is lumpy and springy and we could get a good sleep the 4 nights we stayed. Hard to believe this has not been replaced. So, while the apartment is functional as described, it is in need of TLC and better property management attention. The bath and kitchen amenities seem mostly to be leftovers from other guests and there are just some things worn out such as the shower head that does not stay in place making it difficult to shower. 

Communication with the host was very responsive during the  booking stage but once confirmed and money paid ... and when issues occurred, they were, well let‚Äôs just say, less than responsive.

Personally, despite the location and premium this apartment should command in the CBD, the value IMO is EXTREMELY low for what they charge when considering all the other factors outlined above and more that I communicated to the hosts directly. I have offered suggestions to the host directly and constructively for them to improve based on above and other details ... however, I have not received a response of course.

That said, you will love CBD ... a visit to Baxter‚Äôs Inn is a must (you will  understand when you finally find it and immerse yourself with the locals for a drink - there is no food). We had amazing dinners at Bistro Papillon (steps from the apartment) and at Bambini. A visit to QVB (Queen Victoria Building), Strand and area is a shopper‚Äôs haven and both are a must do. Special mention to the ladies at Cue (a ladies fashion shop ... fine Aussie designs). When (not if) you go to the Opera House, be sure to walk through the Botanical Gardens. Lots to explore and enjoy in Sydney.

I sure wish our experience at ‚ÄúClarence House Apartment‚Äù was not the last accommodation image we had on an otherwise impeccable 24 day experience of Australia.

Michael

The apartment was in a great location and near restaurants, bars, grocery stores and transport. The self check in and check out process was simple. The place was clean and spacious as per the photos. I'd recommend this apartment to anyone and will stay here again.
Awesome location! Super accomodating hosts and a relaxing decor, made for a great mini break.
Super endroit bien plac√©

name: Contemporary Remodeled Ocean View Villa in Kapalua
summary: Experience the Kapalua  lifestyle by staying at our tropical, spacious and contemporary remodeled townhouse style villa. Our romantic retreat is situated in a quiet and well appointed cul de sac at the top of The Ridge at Kapalua. Enjoy imposing direct views of both the Pacific Ocean and the internationally famous Kapalua Bay golf course. Please note these nightly rates include the 14.4% hawaii tax.
space: What makes this condo unique from most of the condos in Kapalua and at the Ridge villas , is that this is a town house style corner unit situated on 2 floors , meaning living area , kitchen and then bedroom upstairs all share the breathtaking ocean views of Kapalua bay .
