Situated on a tree-lined, Brownstone block our comfortable, airy, spacious, well-lit, perfectly located apartment is the ideal compliment to your city stay. We are one block from Prospect Park in the very heart of Park Slope with NYC just minutes away.  900 sq.ft. Open space Large living room (morning/afternoon light) Large Bedroom (afternoon/evening light) Depressed dining area (with reclaimed wood dining table from mid-century Northern Virginian farm) 800+ text library Prewar building Fully equipped Galley kitchen Great light (8 windows: 2 floor to ceiling, 5 large, 1 bath) Lots of plants Cross breeze through apt, if Zephyrus allows Ample closet space T.V. is plug and play ready (HDMI cable provided; USB compatible) Queen size air-mattress, if sleeping m
neighborhood_overview: Park Slope. It's beautiful here.
transit: The 2&3 are three blocks away. The B&Q are four blocks away.
access: The entire apartment is yours for the entirety of your stay.
interaction: by text and email
house_rules: Don't trash the place Keep it cool Have a good time Relax Feel free to eat what's ever in the fridge If you kill it fill it Try not to kill the plants Key exchange worked out at initial meet Theres an introductory email heading your way

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Spent four years living abroad
PhD candidate at the CUNY Graduate Center in English Literature
Service industry employee
I have crashed on more couches than I care to remember
Eight years on and off in NYC, have always lived in Brooklyn, Borough proud
Books
Tunes
Travel

reviews.comments: The reservation was canceled 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Location,Location, Location. This apt is in the best location near the heart of pretty Park Slope. Easy access to restaurants, stores, and the subway  nicely furnished and well maintained  we felt very comfortable and safe here and would highly recommend it.

This is a fabulous apartment in an ideal location.  Daniel was super easy to coordinate with and very accommodating, and the place is very clean, quiet, and comfortable.  We would go back and stay again sometime for sure!

Great host, perfect and safe location. Easy access to public transportation. Within 25 minutes in Manhattan. Shops, groceries and restaurants around the corner, great to experience Brooklyn. Clean apartment, comfortable. We missed an airco but we had a great stay overall!

this is a beautiful apartment in an outstanding location in park slope. very clean and spacious and a book-lovers paradise. Comfortable bed and in the back of the building making it a very fantastic escape from busy Park Slope. Daniel made it very easy to check in and out and was very responsive - would definitely recommend the place!

Daniel's apartment simply is outstanding. The location is perfect! close to 3 subway lines, Manhattan is a couple of minutes away! The neighbourhood  is also great if you want to stay around for brunch or dinner. the bed is comfortable bed, the place is super clean and the building is lovely. Daniel made it very easy for us to check in and I would not only come back but  definitely recommend it!
Fantastic location and what a great cozy stylish decor - Loved it!

Daniel was a fantastic host.  He was easy to communicate with via emails and texts, accommodating with the timing of our arrival and the place was super clean and inviting.  The flat was just as described - bright and cheery and in a perfect location for exploring Brooklyn and Manhattan.  Love the Tea Lounge down the street.

Super s√©jour chez Daniel!
Communication avec notre h√¥te fluide et efficace.
L'appartement correspond en tous points √† la description faite: il est situ√© dans un charmant quartier pr√®s du magnifique Prospect parc.
L'int√©rieur est tr√®s confortable pour une famille de quatre et la d√©coration  soign√©e.
Il est tr√®s bien desservi par plusieurs lignes de m√©tro.
√Ä recommander sans aucune h√©sitation!

Nice, roomy apartment in a lovely section of Park Slope, close to both the 2, 3 and the Q, R, so just a breeze to get in and out of Manhattan, if you had a reason to leave Park Slope. Excellent selection of books, if he would let you stay for two months you could hunker down and read all of Proust.

Daniel's listing was accurate.  He was available if we needed help. The key pick up was easy, and allowed us to arrive late.  
The apartment was clean.  The bed was comfortable. There were places to put our stuff-  we were attending a wedding and had to hang up our clothes.    The other bed was an air mattress which looked like a bed and was very firm and comfortable too.  
The neighborhood is convenient- right near Prospect Park. LOTS of places to have a good cup of coffee near bye.  
He has wonderful library of mostly fiction which he has alphabetized! Perfect for us.

Daniels place is amazing, it is exactly as he states. Very easy to get to, Subways aren't that far at all and you have Atlantic Ave up the road, so it is very convenient. Subway to Manhattan doesn't take that long at all, very easy. Many food places around,  movies are just down the road if you want a quiet night. We were there for 8 days and were out most of the time. Couch and bed are very very cosy, shower is awesome! Laudromat just down the road and the employees are very helpful as well, we went and it was jammed pack. I definately recommend this place, felt very safe walking around at night.

The host Daniel was great
Very helpful and made it all easy 
Place was spacious for NY and very clean.
Safe neighborhood as well

A great apartment, very comfortable, and convenient to multiple subway lines. The place was clean and tidy, and arrangements with Daniel were easy and problem-free. Loved the giant bookcase, which had many of my favorite novels and works of literature--made the apartment feel like home for a former grad student like me.
Highly recommended.

Great apartment in prime Park Slope location. Easy access to City, but also great to explore what Park Slope has to offer - Prospect Park, amazing restaurants, Barclays Center, quaint streets, and..... As an added plus, the kitchen has everything you need and more - perfect for cooking all meals.
I had a great stay. The location was perfect, near the park and shopping. The bed was soooo comfy and the apartment was so clean.

This was my first experience with Airbnb, and it couldn't have been better. The apartment was just as described in the listing: clean, sunny, cheery, well-appointed. My husband and I stayed with our adult twin daughters - they said the inflatable mattress provided for them to sleep on was very comfy. The location is really great. We enjoyed running in Prospect Park in the morning; easy day trips to Manhattan during the day via subway; great bars and restaurants in Park Slope at night. 
Thanks for hosting us! We hope to return sometime!
Nice apartment in a friendly and very cozy neighborhood. Daniel vas easy to comunicate with, and there were no problems. 10 out of 10.

Daniel's place was just as described. Great location located very close to Grand Army Plaza and Prospect Park. Very charming neighborhood, close to good restaurants and markets- and of course the trains. Daniel was responsive and accommodating. We would definitely recommend his place- really large by NYC standards. Great weekend, great time!

Daniel's apartment was just as advertised. We're a family of 3 with a 5 year old and it was perfectly comfortable. The size was bigger than most we've found in NYC for the same price range. The bed was very comfortable. Perfect for the end of a long day of walking. Park Slope is beautiful and Prospect Park is only a couple of blocks away. We would definitely recommend it.

This is a fantastic spot -- great location, great apartment, very comfortable place to spend an hour, a day, or a week... or more! The apartment is *exactly* as the photos depict. The kitchen has pretty much everything you need for mornings and beyond, though with all the cafes and cute restaurants in Park Slope, you might not use it much! Daniel was responsive and helpful in all my queries. I felt very at home here and wouldn't hesitate to return, or recommend to anyone else!

Daniel's place in Park Slope is a great space and a great location.  A big place by NY standards, very clean, very well stocked.  A very comfortable bed.  Great water pressure in the shower.  Perfect kitchen for preparing any meals if you decide not to go out, although there are so many great restaurants in the area.  Very nice eating area, too.  Daniel was very easy to communicate with he addressed any questions/issues immediately.  Easy check-in and check-out.  Very close to everything; subways to manhattan, Prospect Park right up the street, markets a block away, great bakeries, coffee shops, restaurants all close by.  A great place to spend the week in Brooklyn.
Great apartment. Very clean, interesting decor and very comfortable. Thank you :)
Awesome place to land! Such a sweet spot, convenient location and responsive, easy going host. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Daniel was very nice and responsive.  He explained clearly how to get in and out of the apartment and answered all our questions.  The apartment was very clean and nicely maintained.
Daniel's place has the best location ever and the apartment is awesome! Very comfortable bed and air mattress. Great shower and lots of excellent books!

Was able to pick up key at a convenient time for us which was great. Location was wonderful and the apt. had great space!  A lesson for me however.......check the details as I'm sure it's listed......but no cable and no a/c was tough!!!  Really hot couple days outside and in!
All in all, I'd find this apt again.....perhaps a different time of year though.

We thought everything was just splendid with our Airbnb stay in Park Slope. The set up (get in/get out) was easy. The apartment was really nice with lots of space and sunshine. Daniel was helpful and responsive plus he had a great book collection. His neighborhood was great, too. It was very close to the beautiful and wild Prospect Park and restaurants where five minutes after setting out we were eating really delicious, interesting food. We would stay here again for sure, and hope to.
Perfect location.  Loved your apartment and the location. You made it very easy for us the get the keys. Apartment was immaculate. Thanks.

My stay at Daniel's place could not have been better! It was spacious, clean, and comfortable. This is also a prime location within Park Slope. I say this after 10 days in Daniel's apartment, and stays at three other places in Park Slope. Don't hesitate!

Daniel's apartment is lovely and perfect for a weekend getaway. Check in was easy and seamless. The apartment is clean, in a quiet neighborhood and conveniently located. We would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Brooklyn/NY!

Fantastic place, clean, quiet (especially for NYC).

OUTSTANDING location, I couldn't imagine better.  Everything is nearby, and open late.  24 hour convenience stores and diners on your doorstep, 15 minutes into Manhattan.  Safe, quiet, fun 'hood.

Daniel was great!!  Super helpful when needed, chill.

This was our best Park Slope airbandb experience yet! Daniel made us feel very welcome. His instructions were clear and it was very easy to get in touch with him. The apartment was exactly as presented by the photos, which means FANTASTIC! The neighborhood was great and he even went above and beyond by providing good weather! The kitchen was very well equipped and the bed was unusually comfortable. Daniel's book collection was amazing. We were surprised how many of the titles we'd read [which made us feel very educated!]. I would unequivocally recommend staying here for the true Park Slope experience.

This is the second time we rented Daniel's apartment. The apartment itself is great--bright, airy, and well-equipped--and conveniently located in North Park Slope near several subway lines. Daniel was communicative and responsive, and the key handoff on both ends went smoothly.

This is an ideal place to stay in Brooklyn - conveniently located next to everything (Prospect Park, tons of restaurants, etc). Communication with the host was seamless. I would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to friends and family.

We had a great time at Daniel's apartment (despite the heat). He installed an a/c unit to ensure that we were comfortable in the evenings, and it made a real difference. We would definitely stay again!

Daniel's apartment was clean and convenient. The check in and check out process was seamless. Lots of clean towels and he even let us borrow his air mattress. AC worked fine in the bedroom--fans kept the rest of the apartment cool. Thank you for a great place in one of my favorite neighborhoods.
We felt very welcome. The flat was clean and comfortable. Location was perfect for our needs. It was a very hot weekend and the bedroom air conditioner was much appreciated.
Great flat, well located, and fantastic host!

We absolutely loved it.  It was comfortable, quiet, perfectly situated near food, coffee and other shopping, and frankly, if I were to move to NYC, it would be RIGHT HERE.   We slept well, it was easy in and out, like I said it was quiet, and the home was decorated in such a cool, fun way with some vintage, some eclectic, and some modern.  

We are already anxious to stay again!
My parents had a great stay at Daniel's apartment. Everything was as described and very comfortable. Great location.
Everything was fine
Great location for park slope - loved the place , wife wanted to move in permanently

The apartment was sunny, warm, comfortable & clean and in a perfect location in Brooklyn. It's also quiet. The area is extremely desirable - a family and health conscious neighbourhood with gorgeous Prospect Park just a few minutes walk away. But you can find everything you need there.  Easy to get all over Brooklyn and to Manhattan. Daniel's communication was always extremely prompt and spot on. He was super flexible and happy to help at all times. Could not recommend this apartment and Daniel as a host enough. Thanks for a fabulous stay. Would definitely book again.

Daniel's apt is impeccably decorated, spacious, and in a great location in Brooklyn. We loved that the subway and a great coffee shop were only a couple blocks away. We arrived on an unusually hot day, unfortunately before his AC was installed, so it was particularly warm and we found it difficult to sleep. The open windows provided a nice cross breeze, but it also meant dealing with the noise from outside.
Great! Clean. Airy. Exactly what it purports to be. Daniel was a very good communicator before and while we were his guests.
Could not have asked for a better place. Amazing interior, location, and communication. A great option.

The space was exactly as described in the Airbnb lising.  The apartment wa clean and neat.  No hassle at check-in. This space is locatedin a great neighborhood for walking with lots of small shops and restaurants nearby.

Daniel's place is clean, cozy and quiet. It's a quick walk to many of the subway lines so you can explore any part of the city easily. He has a fantastic collection of books, and I wanted nothing more than to stay for another week and keep reading. I made a quick stop at the book store around the corner before our flight instead!
Great place and location. Daniel was also very nice.

Our criteria for this trip; close to our daughter's place - an elevator as Dave would be six weeks out from receiving a new hip - room to move in.  With all of the above met we were pleased to be in a home which was pristine, lots of light, decorated beautifully and personal mementos.  Having a Britta water pitcher, a tea kettle and a clothes basket were welcomed additions. 

Daniel gave detailed instructions for letting ourselves into his home.  We were familiar with the area spending most of our time with our daughter and family so did not need to ask any questions about activities.  I did have two off the wall questions which were answered quickly.
Great location! And very cute. Comfy bed. Clean.
Quiet, clean and well-appointed space in excellent Park Slope location.

Daniel‚Äôs place is very cozy and welcoming. It is very well located and was perfect for my parents to stay near us over Christmas. 
The apartment is very well equipped and Daniel was always quick to respond to any question they may have. He was also very flexible around our check in and check out time. It‚Äôs a short walk to all stores and subway lines.

Very charming apartment in an excellent location. Very close to Prospect Park and to a large variety of restaurants, gourmet markets, wine shops and trendy coffee shops. Easy access to 2 and 3 subway trains that can bring you to lower Manhattan in 15 minutes. Great to see the Botanical Garden, the Brooklyn Museum and BAM. The bed is very comfortable and the kitchen and appliances are very functional. Daniel is very prompt in communicating. The apartment is quiet, although not extremely sunny, as it faces the courtyard. This was our fourth experience with Airbnb‚Äôs in Brooklyn and we would look forward to return to it, if available.
The apartment is amazing- comfortable, great location, great communication. Daniel is the best host. We would stay here every time if we could.
Great location very close to the Grand Army subway stop.

name: Elegance and Peace in Potts Point
summary: My beautifully renovated Art Deco studio apartment is in the heart of Kings Cross, yet so peaceful and quiet. New bathroom and modern kitchen, in the Art Deco tradition, are stunning to be in. A Sleeping Duck queen bed which is absolutely fabulous, 4G unlimited wifi, high quality washer/dryer and dishwasher. Fully self contained!
space: Meticulously restored studio with attention to detail. Australian Blackbutt solid timber floors, classy and comfortable. One floor up from street level in a 1930's three story building with views of the harbour from the common area roof top. Totally self contained with all new appliances, Meile dishwasher and cooktop, and Bosch combo washer/dryer. Fully equipped kitchen. Sleeping Duck new queen bed. Tastefully renovated Art Deco bathroom with large shower/bath. Samsung smart TV and 4g high speed wifi with unlimited internet. It's simply beautiful! The space is dreamy to be in. I know you will love it!
description: My beautifully renovated Art Deco studio apartment is in the heart of Kings Cross, yet so peaceful and quiet. New bathroom and modern kitchen, in the Art Deco tradition, are stunning to be in. A Sleeping Duck queen bed which is absolutely fabulous, 4G unlimited wifi, high quality washer/dryer and dishwasher. Fully self contained! Meticulously restored studio with attention to detail. Australian Blackbutt solid timber floors, classy and comfortable. One floor up from street level in a 1930's three story building with views of the harbour from the common area roof top. Totally self contained with all new appliances, Meile dishwasher and cooktop, and Bosch combo washer/dryer. Fully equipped kitchen. Sleeping Duck new queen bed. Tastefully renovated Art Deco bathroom with large shower/bath. Samsung smart TV and 4g high speed wifi with unlimited internet. It's simply beautiful! The space is dreamy to be in. I know you will love it! A safe, security building located only 100 steps level acce
neighborhood_overview: This spacious studio has good neighbours. When you walk out of the building there is a bright, tree lined cul de sac which leads you directly to the heart of everything great in Sydney! I adore this place! And the common area roof have clothes hanging space and a nice view of the surrounding buildings and the harbour.
notes: Sleeping here is divine, and the space is especially peaceful to be in. There are no views as it looks into the light well, but it is airy and quiet. There is roof access for hanging clothes if you wish with a view of Sydney harbour. I have a floor fan to move the air in general as well as a whisper quiet Hunter ceiling fan over the bed. Then in winter I have a small but toasty heater. It does not really get too cold or that hot.
transit: Super convenient location with level access to buses and the train only meters away. And of course the ever available taxi.
access: A safe, security building located only 100 steps level access from Kings Cross fountain. You have access to everything in the apartment. There is also a roof top laundry and drying area with a nice view of the Harbor. Woolworths grocery store is across the street with a bus stop to central station and the City in front. Minutes from Wilson Parking Station and 200 meters to the Kings Cross train station. Minutes to Harbourside parks ... Beare Park and Rushcutters Bay park to name a few.
interaction: Either I or my partner Don will meet you with the keys and show you the apartment and how to use the appliances. Please ask us any questions about the area and we are not far away if you need anything.
house_rules: Please enter and leave the building quietly. This is a non smoking home. Be respectful of my home with care and consideration. Please take your trash out to the bins in front of the building and leave my place as you found it!

host.host_location: Elizabeth Bay, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: I love Sydney and all her natural beauty.  I immigrated here many years ago and still get excited every time I step out the door. I know this city well and can help you with information and tips. Bird watching and snorkelling are high on my list of things to do. I also love hosting people and making sure they feel at home in my home. Mi casa es su casa.

reviews.comments:
Mariana was a great host.She was kind,warm, and always helpful.
I had a great 3 month stay at Mariana's (Website hidden by Airbnb) location,it was clean,well equipped,everything was well prepared.And clean big bathtub,I was enjoyed every bath time.
The studio apartment was exactly what I needed. It was quiet, and had a very comfy new bed. Thank you Mariana for your assistance and the flowers throughout the apartment made it so homely.

Mariana's place is great!  It's in a fantastic location off Macleay Street with lots of cafes and restaurants on the doorstep as well as easy access to the City via train at KingsX and buses.  It also is an easy walk down to Rushcutters Bay park and the water if you're looking for a bit of peace and tranquility. The apartment itself is very quiet  at the back of the buildings and well away from the buzz of Macleay St.  It has also been brilliantly and neatly designed by Mariana with a great bathroom and kitchen with high quality appliances and a really comfortable bed as well as lots of nice  Art Deco touches.  Mariana is a fantastic host - really open and friendly,  and generously invited us to use anything in the kitchen and bathroom cupboards.  We would highly recommend Mariana's apartment and Mariana as a host - and would definitely stay here again.
Great central location of the apartment. It's perfect for two people for a few nights. It's truly a studio but Mariana has done a great job putting all the basics in.

Well decorated studio apartment great for couples or single travelers. The apartment is newer and has a great efficiency kitchen with all appliances you need in addition to a nice bathroom.

The view looks into an inner space in between apartments and you can see into the neighbors kitchen, but nothing new if you have stayed in big city airbnbs.

The apartment did not have A/C at the time of stay, I would recommend this place as long as it's cooler outside or more fans were brought in.

The location is phenomenal. Lots of restaurants and a few coffee shops nearby with easy access to Kings Cross Station for your metro needs.

Great stay overall!
Great find in a charming building. The apartment is well appointed and the communication and service was fantastic. Will definitely stay again!

Beautiful apartment, very central location (I walked to the city one day) in fabulous Potts Point. The apartment had everything I needed (including a bathtub!) and the host was delightful. Highly recommended and I would definitely come back here.

the apartment is perfectly located. It is located within walking distance of the city center. public transport is also very close to the apartment. everything that was needed was a in the equipment flat. everything was very well organized. I would heartily recommend!
Beautiful place close to everything, quiet and clean with very nice touches and a super comfortable bed. Really enjoyed our stay!

Mariana is a fantastic host. She is very friendly and it was very easy to communicate with her.  We love her (Website hidden by Airbnb) is  well equipped and very clean.  There were many cafes nearby and King Cross Stn was a short walk away. We highly recommend this apartment.

What a terrific little place to stay. Its freshly renovated and homely. The location is excellent with some of Sydney's best restaurants literally around the corner. Also easy access for Uber pick ups etc. Thanks so much for hosting us Mariana, it was lovely to meet you.

The boutique apartment is nice, got everything in it, like cooking stuff and washing machine.  Maybe a bit stuffed during summer cos not quite convenient to open windows in the living room, but it‚Äôs around 20+ degrees during our stay, so it‚Äôs ok for us. The apt is on 1/F, so need to walk few steps with your luggage. Mariana is very nice and helpful as well.
Although it was only for two nights, I had a wonderful time at Mariana's apartment. It is a beautifully renovated room, very clean and the location is great. Definitely recommend it!

This is a great place to stay for a couple visiting Sydney. It is not large but very well equipped with high quality fittings and furnished to a high standard. Kings Cross station is within easy walking distance as are plenty of good eateries and a supermarket.
Mariana was a fabulous host, very easy to contact. Brilliant location beautifully laid out apartment!

Mariana is such a great host..welcomes and bids goodbye to her guest personally. She responds quickly and has created a comfortable & beautiful abode for guest. Her flat is close to Kings cross station, bus stops and hop on/off stop. Close to grocery, market, restaurants and bars...including ice cream shops :). Her apartment is very reflective of Sydney...its a combination of a sense of culture & vintage with the comforts of whats new & functional. I LOVE the fact that we come home to a very comfy bed and bath tub + epsom salt after a very tiring touristy walking day. :)
Lovely location, very well appointed homely feel and great value.

We loved our stay here in Pott's Point! It is walking distance to King's Cross station and very accessible to the city center. Mariana's apartment is clean, well-equipped, and elegant. Best for couples as it might be a little tight for a family!
Great little completely self-contained studio.

Mariana's apartment is centrally located, done up to a high standard (she installed a Miele dishwasher and induction hob) and is exactly as described in the description. The kitchen is also well equipped should you need to cook. It's clean, convenient and comfortable. Public transport is all within a few minutes walk which is always great. Check-in went smoothly too and we would like to thank Mariana for the wonderful stay. We wouldn't hesitate to recommend her apartment to other guests and would return to stay there during our next visit to Sydney.
Great location, wee but very comfortable and well equipped. Lovely and quiet and so handy to all transport, supermarkets and eating places. Loved it.

Mariana was an amazing host. She let me check in very early due to my red-eye flight and she also let me check out very late due to my late evening flight home. The place was beautiful, spotlessly clean and is in a prime Potts point / Elizabeth Bay location. Thank you so much for making my stay in Sydney so enjoyable.

Mariana's place is in a beautiful and central location. The botanical garden and art museum are only about a 15-20 min walk away. There is a grocery store down the street and lots of good restaurants close by. It is a great option for a solo traveller or a couple who want to explore this amazing city!
An absolutely delightful apartment. It's cosy, but the attention to detail and renovation make it a lovely place to hang out in! Highly recommended :)
Good place to stay in a great neighborhood. Clean flat that was well-presented by the photographs.

Stayed here for a short business trip to Sydney. A very cosy apartment, very clean and as described. The bed is super comfortable and the fittings and fixtures are excellent (great shower). I love the location as its so close to Kings Cross and to central Sydney itself. Lots of places to eat, supermarket just down the road and the apartment building is quiet and well maintained. If you have a car, you just need some forward planning and research as parking can be an issue. It only took me one night to find the right spots along the streets though, and there is a pay as you go car park nearby. All in all, a great place to stay and will certainly be on my list for any future trips.

Cozy studio that is very clean and comfortable.  Location is *fantastic* -- we walked to everything we wanted to see in Sydney and there is easy access to groceries/food, if you prefer to eat in.

Mariana and Don are amazing hosts-- they were accessible for anything we needed and very easy to communicate with ahead of time.

One blip: the neighboring apartment was very loud in the middle of the night (twice), but we let Mariana know and I suspect any issue will be resolved.
Lovely host with great communication. Clean, comfortable and central apartment.

Mariana's place is an absolute gem. Yes it's compact, but it's perfect for a solo traveller or a couple. The furnishings are gorgeous and beautifully arranged, the bed is super-comfy, the kitchen is thoughtfully designed with all the amenities you could hope for, and the shower is to die for. The location is excellent too, on a quiet cul-de-sac with lots of good places to eat and drink within an easy walk, and close to public transport for venturing further. Mariana is also an amazing host - I had sprained my ankle a few days before I arrived, and she brought me crutches to use during me stay! From communications before through check-in and during my stay, she was always responsive and helpful. Highly recommended! I'd love to stay again next time I'm in Sydney.
Mariana was so accommodating with our late flight arrival. Great, clean and perfectly located studio. Perfect for the weekend away. Quiet and really comfy bed. Thanks Mariana!
Great location close to everything but in quiet street. Everything is walkable from there. Fantastic neighborhood, very nice apartment, extremely clean. Would come back anytime. Highly recommended!
It was a really nice stay, great location

Great place to stay, conveniently located, a home away from home. We appreciate all the extra touches that Mariana did to make us feel even more welcome. Now that we've found her place we hope to return.
Perfect place to stay in Sydney.  Lovely apt with all you need and a great value.  Mariana's delightful!
Good place to stay and close to CBD, Mariana's is great host and very friendly.
No views BUT perfect for single or couple who want to get out and about and come back to comfort and quiet. All the facilities cleverly included even basic food supplies included and great bathroom.

Marianna's flat was absolutely beautifully finished to a high standard with some lovely Art Deco pieces. The bathroom was exceptionally done and the kitchen is small but had everything packed in - very impressive. The bed was SO a comfy too. 
Location is perfect to see all the sights and there are a great selection of quality restaurants and cafes close by. 
Marianna was an excellent host and very accommodating - made you feel right at home. 
This is a great base for your trip to Sydney so I would not hesitate to recommend it.

The apartment is lovely. Everything was thoughtfully provided. I had good wifi, a well equipped kitchen to make brekkie, and lots of hot water for a bath at the end of the day. Great location - easy to catch public transport (bus 311 or walk 7 mins to Kings Cross station), but the off street parking around the area was mainly 1 hour so it might be tricky if you have a car. Lots of restaurants nearby, Hayes theatre round the corner and small weekend market (Saturday is better). I felt safe walking around even at night as there were plenty of people eating at the restaurants nearby. The apartment is on first floor so you need to be able to carry your bags up a flight of stairs. It only had filtered light as it faced another building so you have to turn the lights on all day long and was noisy when I was staying due to the construction next door. It would not be a place to stay in, ie, if you were planning to be resting indoors during the day time hours. I recommend this place for someone active who is going to be out and about all day. as it quietens down by evening and that's when the apartment is at its best.
Beautifully furnished apartment that indeed has a lot of personal charm in what is my favourite neighbourhood in Sydney -- Mariana was a lovely host and provided me with a warm welcome.

Mariana's studio is a place where you feel like home. My parents spent 1 month here in Sydney and just loved her studio. New appliances, very clean, great bed and shower... really close to shops, restaurants and train station. Thank you very much, Mariana!
Great apartment, clean, tidy and very comfortable. Fantastic location and very close to the CBD.
The place is close to bus stop and  train station. Room is nice and clean. the bed is very confortable. Host is very friendly and easy to contact.

Our stay was fantastic! Great and fun neighbourhood with a grocery store just one block away (great for when you want to cook your own food) but also lots of restaurants to choose from (even farmers market on the weekend). The accommodation was spotless and perfect for two people!
Great location for exploring Sydney. Good value. Mariana is a great host and the little touches made a big difference. The block is a bit noisy so ear plugs are useful! Very comfortable apartment.

This was my first Airbnb experience and the bar HAS to have been set very high.  Mariana's place is in a lovely neighborhood, close to public transportation, shopping and a great back-street walk to Circular Quay is very do-able.  Mariana's flat is spotless, quiet and safe - a warm and welcoming host.  I couldn't have been happier and hope to be able to return!

Perfect accommodation in one of the best locations. We feel very lucky to have come across such a beautiful spot like this one and at such a decent price. My husband and I always stay in Potts Point/Elizabeth Bay when in Sydney but always spend more money than we'd like on accommodation. Mariana's spot will definitely be our go-to for future trips: it has everything you need and was incredibly clean. The bed was so comfortable and my husband couldn't stop commenting on how great the shower was! "That was one of the best showers I've ever had. I think it's the shower heads. We need to look into shower heads like these..." 

For those who have never been to Sydney, the accommodation is close by Kings Cross station which will take you anywhere you need to go in the city, but there are TONS of great coffee shops and wine bars right outside your front door. Elizabeth Bay is beautiful, a short walk away, which is worth a visit. Perfect place to sit with your morning coffee. My husband and I had a great time.

Checking in was seamless. Mariana was the perfect host and very kind. She let us know about something we left behind which was sentimental and made plans to get it back to us. This thoughtful gesture proves what a caring host she is! We can't recommend this place enough!

My best friend and I stayed here for three nights over the weekend and absolutely adored this Art Deco apartment. It was clean and beautiful. The location is outstanding, close to markets, theatre and shops as well as a 5 min walk to the station. Mariana greeted us and was lovely. Already have recommended this place to family and friends.

Elizabeth Bay is a pretty and convenient location. Mariana‚Äôs flat is small but has everything one could need and has been recently redecorated. It was also surprisingly quiet. Some of the best restaurants in Sydney are nearby. If you like to run the Domain and Botanical Gardens are close, as is the Boy Charlton pool. Harbour beaches, Circular Quay, and the CBD are a bus or short train ride away. Highly recommended.
A great wee place in Pitts Point, walking distance to Cirrular Quay, the Botanical Gardens and lots of great cafes and resturants, the kings cross tube is also only 5 minutes walk away. Just perfect

We stayed here a few nights in December. The apartment is really well designed with modern appliances and everything you need for short or long stay. The place is very quiet but still in an incredibly central location. Mariana was very quick in her communication and obliging in her hospitality. Highly recommended.
Great place to stay. Location close to transportation, restaurants and a grocery across the street. Very quiet. Amenities were excellent and able to cook and do laundry

Mariana's place is convenient to everything and centrally located with only few mins walk from KC's station. The apartment is same as desceibed as beautifully Art decorated. The place is fabously clean!!! Love my stay in Sydney as well as this adorable airBnB. Thanks for the beautiful hydrangea in the apartment too. I would defintiely recommend to frds who visit Sydney! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è 

Though I havent met Mariana in person, her partner Don has given me warm greetings and show me everything in the apartment. Plus, they are fine with my late checkin time, which I am very appreaciated!!!‚ù§Ô∏è

Great place to stay! Close to the Royal Botanical Gardens and Circular Quay. 
The appartment is as shown in the pictures, you‚Äòll have everything you need. 
Unfortunately, there‚Äòs no aircon, only a fan. So it might get pretty hot in the appartment.

The apartment is beautiful, clean and equipped with all comforts. Mariana is kind and she always meets the needs.
I had a really great time here!
Good location , comfortable yet stylish

Un tr√®s joli appartement, propre et tr√®s bien √©quip√©. Une situation id√©ale non loin √† pied du Botanic garden et de Circular Quay et au coeur d'un agr√©able quartier o√π l'on trouve beaucoup de bars et restaurants. Je recommande vivement.

This was the second time at Mariana's place. My parents stayed there for 4 weeks in Sep/2017 and the place was so confortable and clean, and Mariana was such a nice host that I've booked her place for my in laws for 2 weeks. Thanks again, Mariana! Hope to book your beautiful studio again as soon as we know family or Friends are coming to visit!

Mariana's flat was in the perfect location for me to walk to everything. Cute neighborhood with lots of shopping, eateries, and services. The flat has been completely remodeled using high-quality materials. It's quite a small space, very efficient, perfect for a solo traveler like myself. It could accommodate two people, although the kitchen would fit only (Email hidden by Airbnb) fy bed with quality linens, nice bathroom with big tub, everything was new and spotlessly clean. It's a walk-up so you need to navigate two flights of stairs which was no problem for me.

Mariana‚Äôs place is stylish and is very well equipped with lots of thoughtful touches. It had everything we needed for our stay. Don was there to meet us when we arrived and was very helpful in showing us the studio. The location is fantastic and given the central location, there is no noise from the nearby restaurants and bars. The atrium architecture of the building means that sound travels and we found the neighbours opposite to be a bit loud at times. Having said that we very much enjoyed our stay and wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to book again if we were back in Sydney.

This compact apartment had all we needed, including an extremely comfortable bed, great shower with plenty of hot water, lovely art deco furnishings and all you needed to cook up a meal if you wished. Locally there are many good restaurants, a train station and a supermarket all within easy walking distance.

Mariana is a lovely host, easy to get a hold of and happy to help out if you need anything. Having never been to Sydney before I wasn‚Äôt sure what was a good area to stay in. I was so happy with the location - Woolworths just across the road, 30 mins walk to circular quay, lots of lovely restaurants and cafes and I didn‚Äôt feel worried walking around at night alone so can‚Äôt ask for better! 
The flat was lovely. Really clean and tidy with a heater and fans so easy to keep warm or cool depending on the weather. Fantastic rain shower as well! 
I stayed here for a little over a month and the only thing I missed was having an oven. There‚Äôs a microwave and hobs so easy to manage without. 
Mariana had fly screens in place to keep the room ventilated which was lovely but it was very noisy the first night where we could hear the next door neighbours conversations and music! No problem to take some of them down and no problems with noise once we could close the windows. 
The internet did drop in and out a little in the evenings but always sorted itself out so again not really a problem. 
All in all it is a really lovely flat where I felt safe and comfortable in a new city on the other side of the world! Mariana was a great host and I wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to stay again.

Cosey little apartment, so close to anything you want or need!! For a little space it has everything, incredibly well done - could have slept in the dream bed all weekend and not gone out and been happy!! All it‚Äôs missing is a view but you step outside and your in the heart of Potts Point - perfect!!
Close to public transport, in a pretty hip neighborhood, very stylish place, great amenities, very nice shower. Also, Mariana is an excellent host! Five stars!
Mariana‚Äôs place was great. In a good location and well setup with a great little kitchen and bathroom both beautifuly renovated. A great place to stay when visiting Sydney.
Really well positioned, cozy, clean and comfortable apartment. Mariana and Don are friendly, helpful and communication was excellent. Would definitely stay again.

It is just a perfect place to stay for your trip at the right location. 
You can enjoy the cafe, restaurant and Saturday market around, all perfect & lovely. 
It is also very strategically located for travelling around by train, bus & on foot. 
Just relax and enjoy ~~
This apartment is perfectly located and has everything to make a stay comfortable. I loved my time here.
The location is excellent. Central to great dining, Kings Cross, and the train. It is perfect for two people as your home base while exploring Sydney. The washer/dryer was a huge perk!

A cute little studio in the heart of Elizabeth Bay - close to transport, and a wide array of delicious food options. Mariana is a great host, who has included small touches (eg powerboard next to bed so you can charge multiple devices at once) which make the studio even more comfortable. Amazing bath/shower!

Mariana is the perfect host! Her place is in the ideal location, good surrondings and walking distance to most attractions. She was always kind and helped make our stay as pleasent as possible. I would definetely stay here again. Recommend!
Great little apartment in an excellent location. Mariana was efficient and friendly. Great!

Mariana‚Äôs place is a neat efficiency apartment located at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac in a good neighborhood, only a mile from the Opera House and Circular Quay.  There is a supermarket, a pharmacy, at least three restaurants, a convenience store, a coffee and juice shop,  a hop on hop off Bigbus stop, and a regular city transit bus stop within 150 meters of the front door.
it is also within walking distance to Kings Cross where you can catch the train.  we loved the location.  
Mariana is a nice host.  Communication is excellent and she works to provide a nice stay for her guests.  
I recommend this place for couples or for individuals.

Mariana's place is a charming Art Deco studio apartment with a lovely mix of restored original features alongside modern, quality comforts. The bed was very comfortable, and the bathroom and kitchen both clean and well equipped.  The apartment is situated in a fantastic location; surrounded by shops, cafes and walks with Kings Cross Station a short walk away. I would highly recommended Mariana's apartment, and would definitely stay again.
Very clean room in a convenient location. Thanks for the tips on how to get to the quay!
Great host very attentive!  Beautiful clean apartment
Very nice air B and B.  Would recommend
Lovely, cozy space in a beautiful area, close to bars, restaurants, cafes, public transport and gorgeous parks and views. Mariana is a very helpful and friendly host.

I loved staying at Mariana‚Äôs apartment! Perfect location, the bed was SO comfortable, and all of the amenities you would ever need are there! Communication was super fast and easy! I would definitely stay here again. Thanks Mariana!
Beautifully renovated Art Deco apartment in great location. Very clean. Would stay here again.

A great place to stay - lovely tidy clean and well appointed apartment. Easy walking distance to great food and shopping. Mariana was really helpful and prompt in replying.  I highly recommend staying here.

I use Airbnb a lot (6-8 times a year for the last 3-4 years) and staying at Marian‚Äôs was easily one of my top 3 Airbnb experiences. 

The apartment has been renovated to completely maximize the space, and the bathroom is honestly a luxury experience (deep soaking tub with both rain and handle shower heads). 

Another delightful aspect of the apartment was the bed and bedding. Ive found that most Airbnb‚Äôs make a minimal effort in this department, but I had one of the best weeks of sleep of my life in that bed. So much so that I actually wrote down the name of the bedding and asked Mariana where she got the mattress in hopes of replicating the set up in my home. 

Finally, Mariana struck the perfect balance of being available and helpful but respecting my privacy as a guest. 

It truly was an exceptional experience. Strongly recommend!

Awesome apartment with everything needed.  The apartment is nicely decorated, very comfortable bed, well equipped kitchen and a nice shower.  Great neighborhood and great location for exploring Sydney.

Mariana, the host, was very responsive and helpful during my stay.   I highly recommend Mariana's apartment.

This place is in a great location, affordable for a stay in the city. We enjoyed the cleanliness and the amazing shower/bath combo. Also appreciated having a wash/dry machine for our clothes. We would stay again
Excellent amenities, communication and location. Has everything you need with amazing cafes and restaurants less than 5 mins away. Loved the style of the place too! Thanks Mariana!
Very thoughtfully provisioned studio and obviously a great location.  Couldn‚Äôt fault it.

Mariana was a lovely host, met me with the keys and took the time to show me around the unit and how everything worked. The unit was sparklingly clean, the kitchen and bathroom are really nicely renovated and set out well. Although i stayed during a heat wave the fans kept me very comfortable. I‚Äôd definitely stay again.

This place is AWESOME. It's small, but perfectly formed and has everything you need for a great stay. The location is absolutely perfect and close to all the best shops/restaurants/cafe's that Potts Point has to offer. Mariana is a fantastic host, very quick to respond and gave a great quality check in. I cannot recommend this place highly enough.
Fint och trevligt boende i ett lugnt omr√•de.

Mariana's apartment is wonderful. Not only for it's location, really close to many of the most important amenities of Sydney but also for the great job that Mariana did with it. It has absolutely everything that you can imagine or you may need. The design is wonderful and beautiful and all the appliances are brand new and the best quality.
We would definitely go back and stay there again and again.

Mariana is an excellent host. She will communicate almost everything you need to know about the apartment when you check in. I especially appreciated the road maps and travel guides in the apartment. I knew I had found a truly Airbnb wonderful host when she recommended I take an "apple cider vinegar and baking soda" bath after my long 24-hour flight from Germany. The bath was nice!
I chose this accomodation for cook and it had been fully equipped for cooking. I also felt cozy atmosphere and comfortable.

name: Artsy 3BR in Plateau by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the modern architectural details, beautifully exposed brick walls, and stunning fully-equipped kitchen. Located in Le Plateau, known for its assortment of delicious restaurants and relaxed cafes.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials‚Äîeverything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the modern architectural details, beautifully exposed brick walls, and stunning fully-equipped kitchen. Located in Le Plateau, known for its assortment of delicious restaurants and relaxed cafes. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials‚Äîeverything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we‚Äôll leave you to enjoy your stay. Le Plateau has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Icehouse or Big in Japan for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Le Centre Eaton de Montr√©al on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the bus at Des Pins/Saint-Laurent station. For an authentic Montreal experience, skip downto
neighborhood_overview: Le Plateau has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Icehouse or Big in Japan for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Le Centre Eaton de Montr√©al on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the bus at Des Pins/Saint-Laurent station. For an authentic Montreal experience, skip downtown and hang out with the locals in Le Plateau. Nestled at the foot of Mont Royal, Le Plateau is the epicenter of entertainment and culture in this diverse city. Day or night, the streets of Saint Denis, Mont Royal Ave, and Saint Laurent Boulevard come alive with residents and tourists alike. Eat your way through a variety of restaurants, and adventure through countless shops, caf√©s, and bars. Save some time to explore Saint Laurent Boulevard, where you'll find all sorts of unique urban art installations on every turn, thanks to the annual Montreal Mural Festival.
notes: This Sonder has seasonal air conditioning available from June 1st to September 30th. Air conditioning units are removed in the off-season. This Sonder is a 2nd floor walk-up with stair access only, and no elevator. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Drivers can find free and paid street parking nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we‚Äôll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.host_about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.comments: Overall a good experience. This unit is in a great location and the perfect home base for me and my friends during our stay. We were a bit surprised by the level of noise and on the streets at nice (the windows are not very thick)

This place was an amazing find! We were in awe from the moment we walked into the apartment! Location was fantastic, all the amenities and the service we received from flatbook throughout our stay was top notch! 

We were aware that there was no AC but when we arrived we were so happy to see a small unit set up for us! It was a pleasant surprise and they had many fans for us to use as well. 

All the guests had a wonderful experience, 5 stars!!
Great place, best bang for your buck anywhere near this neighbourhood for sure.
The place was beautiful and clean
Looks nice on surface but over busy street w/minimum in amenities, and comfort

Appartement spacieux et  joliment d√©cor√© situ√© dans un quartier cosmopolite et anim√©, bars et restos sympas √† proximit√© imm√©diate. 
Bon √† savoir: Beaucoup d'animation dans la rue tard le soir les vendredi et Samedi soirs
The condo was beautiful and very comfortable. The location was perfect walking distance to little restaurants, shops and bars. Overall the stay was great and I had a wonderful time in Montreal.
Very nice stay!
Great place.   Super spacious and well equipped. In a great neighborhood.

We had a great stay in the Sonder flat. It was perfectly located for us in the center of nightlife, great food and bars. As a large group of 6 the flat was a nice size and we slept very well at night. The only drawbacks for us was the lack of kitchen staples (most rental homes include ample sugar, salt, olive oil bottles, etc) and some issues with electricity (the only way to turn on bedroom lights was via turning on the living room light as well and there was lacking useable sockets in the bedrooms). Otherwise, we had a great time and would definitely return with larger groups again.
Awesome area for going out with a lot of cool small restaurants

Great location, coffee across the street and pretty much anything else you need was walking distance. Furniture and floors were cheap, some parts of the floor were broken. The apartment overall was quite sterile and dark.  Not super cozy but served its purpose as a place to sleep and shower.

An amazing place to stay in Montreal! It was a clean, and stylish apartment that offered some great amenities.  However, the best part of the whole apartment is its location. We were close to so many great restaurants, and activities. This apartment is an easy recommendation.
Amazing location, and great value for a spot in montreal

The apartment is big, well located, near good restaurants in Le Plateau. Some parts of the floor were broken and the floor of the kitchen and bathroom were sticking. We asked for an extra cleaning and the concierge in a few minutes answered our message, but unfortunately, even with an extra cleaning the floor was sticking yet. The best part of the apartment is the location.
AMAZING LOCATION. Clean and stylish space. Super fun - best Airbnb I‚Äôve ever stayed at.

Great location, comfortable amenities, but what you don‚Äôt see (or hear) in the add are: music from the downstairs retail store, noise from the upstairs renters, one bedroom with no windows, outlets, or ventilation, a TV with no cable or antenna access, and street noise. It‚Äôs a great rental if you plan to be out and about in Montreal.

This is a great place to rent in the heart of the night life. My friends and I really enjoyed the location and the space was beautiful. It looks even bigger in person than the photos! Thanks for the stay! Would totally stay here again

Great place, very clean and Wilson is a superb host.

This is our first experience to book an accommodation with Airbnb and it's fantastic! Best location for anyone who wants the easiest access to all types of transportation for work or for leisure. As for parents like us travelling with an elderly and two active young children, Wilson's apartment is the best to meet our needs. Not only it is so clean and safe for kids, its convenient location allows us to return for nap and rest when kids are tired between our busy holiday schedules. Wilson is so approachable and very thoughtful in many details.
Clean linens, towels, kitchenware, clothes washing powder, indoor storable clothes liner, refills of every consumable daily essential items eg toilet papers, tissues etc.
There are some stairs upon entry into lobby/lift of the building but it is a very common feature in Hong Kong. You can open the French-door-type glass doors fully before you enter with big luggages. The building guards/administrators on duty are very friendly too.
Surprisingly, it's so quiet and comfortable to sleep, considering its prime location in one of the busiest parts of Hong Kong. Eating, shopping, sightseeing...all within walking distance or so easy for additional transportation when preferred.
Thank you for making our stay in Hong Kong so memorable.
Strongly recommended!

We didn't meet Wilson but he made things easy the day before checking in Wilson had sent me a email with all the info I needed to get into his place which was awesome. The location was great it was close to the MTR/public transportation, restaurants, market, etc... The only con to the location is that it was a little hard to get a taxi because coming out of the building cars are not allowed to stop in that area so you would have to walk a bit when taking/coming from a taxi. This has nothing to do with wilson but I thought I would mention it anyways the elevator in this building is extremely slow. The apartment was decent, it didn't wow me or anything but as expected places in HK are small. For a group of 9 it was a bit tight but that didn't bother us since we were out most of the time. The apartment looks pretty much like the pictures there is one thing I would like to say is I wish Wilson would have taken pictures of the second bathroom to his place kus it was tiny. I'm a really tiny girl and even I had a hard time in there. So that probably would have changed my mind on picking his place to stay because we were really looking for a 2 bathroom place. I mean yes the small restroom is considered as 1 but it was so tiny that we didnt even use the shower in it kus it  was tiny but oh wells. Overall our stay was fine but I did feel like the floors could have been a bit more clean.

Wilson's place was a great find, conveniently located near the Causeway Bay MTR station as well.  It was a bargain considering how many people we were able to fit in an apartment given HK real estate.

Wilson's place is very convenient. A lot of good places to go to nearby. It was easy communicating with him as well. The place is a little pricy but overall a great stay. We had pleasant time in HK :)

Incredibly convenient location near subway, bus and tram stops. Everything you could possibly want or need is nearby. I was particularly impressed with the universal adaptor plugs built into every outlet in the bedrooms. The building itself was built in the 1960s and is run-down on the outside and in the hallways, but Wilson's apartment is clean, modern and very comfortable. Would definitely stay here again.

We just completed our 3-night stay in HK at Wilson's place. First of all: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!! This apartment is one block from MTR, few meters from the tram stop, one block from McDonalds/Starbucks, one block from Times Square mall and has a BBQ/Bar on the 3rd floor of the same building. While the building is average looking and the lift / elevator is cozy, the apartment is clean, hip and very modern. Wilson is a perfect host and even stocks up the fridge for you. He helped us at every stage of the reservation.

I would HIGHLY recommend this apartment for any one traveling on business (Wilson provides basic amenities like toothpaste/soap/shaving cream etc. - even though there is a Circle K one block from the apartment), or sight-seeing HK in a small group.

I will certainly reserve this place, the next I visit HK.

The apartment is clean, tidy and comfortable. Great location and there are alot of eating places around and a short walking distance to Causeway Bay Mtr station. Wilson is a great host and he has provided a guide book of the apartment location and transport from airport which make it more easier to find our way to his place. Our family of 5 really enjoyed our stay at the apartment. Highly recommended Wilson's apartment.

This was comfortable for our family group of four adults. The location is really super, in very close proximity to MTR (tube/rail), buses, trolley and airport connections. There is all manner of good and quick eats in the immediate neighbourhood, banks, high end shops/restaurants, as well as convenience stores for water, snacks and access to MTR topup. A supermarket is two blocks away. Despite the central location, the room is high up and so was nicely quiet (surprisingly).  Elevator worked well, and the entry flight of steps (about a dozen stairs) was fine for one of us who is of limited mobility (walks with cane). The kitchenette is small and basic, but has essentials: fridge, kettle and electric burner, and washing machine. Nota bene: the flat has A/C but can still get heat up, esp in afternoon. The entry watchman was very helpful, and gave nice advice a number of times. Top marks for Wilson, the host, who helped out a number of times -- really attentive and accommodating. Great place and would stay there again.

Wilson's apartment is very comfortable and located in a good location near by causeway bay station which easily to go around HK city. The room is nice, clean and look exactly in the pics. Downside is that place might get crowded if you have more than three people in apartment at the same time.
Great location. Comfortable for our family of 5.
Host is quick to response and the place is convenient as it‚Äôs just a min walk away from the MTR. Only 4 stops to ocean park. Good place to stay with kids.

Wilson was extremely prompt with his replies and accommodating with our late checkout request. The apartment itself was small, but not a surprise to us. The single bedroom is really small and can feel a little claustrophobic, so keep that in mind. It was no problem for us cos our friend just slept on the upper bunk in of the bedrooms. We're relatively big (sized) people, and even though the bathrooms are kinda small, especially the ensuite, we managed to shower comfortably. Just let the water heat up for about 20 minutes. The location is hard to beat. Causeway Bay Plaza is next door, and Causeway Bay Station is a skip away. A good selection of western, local and international food is nearby. Do hop into Yee Shun Dairy and try the Ginger Steamed Milk. So so so good!! Overall, we had a great time resting in the apartment when we weren't put exploring the rest of Hong Kong!
Good location, cleanness , can walk around shopping street and near the public transportation. Easy to go from Airport. Have more food shop. Host can help us in time.

Spick and span cozy nice little apartment located in city center. Very accessible indeed. High end shopping centers within walking distance. Really enjoyed and loved our short stay.

Svitlana e Javi s√£o um casal espetacular, muito acess√≠veis, colocaram-nos √† vontade em tudo, incluindo comida e bebida da casa, a localiza√ß√£o √© espetacular mesmo na Sagrada Fam√≠lia onde existe o metro que nos leva a todo o lado, quando voltar a Barcelona irei ficar hospedado novamente !

Their place is right down the street from Sagrada Familia and is close to public transportation, which is great! Svitlana and her boyfriend are so accomidating and helpful. 

We did have an issue with the cat urinating on the bed. This obviously isn't their fault, but make sure you keep the door closed during your stay. 

There was a dead roach on the floor when we arrived. With the climate, I'm not worried about bugs- it just made me think maybe the room wasn't thoroughly cleaned before we arrived.

Again, they were wonderful hosts and the location is great. Just a few hiccups.

The size of the bed was more than enough for two people but unfortunately the only piece of furniture in the bedroom. The room was noisy overnight because it's right by the street but that didn't bother us much. The cat was friendly but keep the door closed if you don't want it to mess with your stuff. Communication with Svitlana was extremely easy and she is a very nice person. If we had any problems she was happy to help out and opened up her entire apartment to us. Check-in and check-out was very easy too. Perfect location from La Sagrada Familia and many good restaurants but a little far from the center. Overall fantastic listing that suited our needs.
great place close to literally everything you need, owned by really nice people and a cute cat! would recommend for sure

Ben was a wonderful and accommodating host. We thoroughly
Enjoyed our stay in the loft. Everything was perfect for our two night stay in Montreal. La Plateau is a vibrant and fun neighborhood and I can't imagine staying anywhere else in the city.  The apartment is so comfortable and relaxing. I especially
Loved the oversized bathtub and waterfall style shower.

Tr√®s bon accueil de la part de Ben dans son condo tr√®s bien situ√©. (Nous avons tout fait √† pieds) les photos correspondent bien au descriptif et cerise sur le g√¢teau la super terrasse sur le toit!

Our stay in Montreal was nothing short of ideal. The space is exactly as advertised, if not better. The open layout was perfect for hosting three friends and I. We made great use of each and every amenity, including the rooftop patio, which provides a great view of the surrounding neighborhoods and skyline. The condo is located in the heart of the action and finding something to do was never an issue. What impressed us more than the condo itself was Ben's willingness to make our stay as memorable as possible. Ben ensured that we knew of all the best places to eat and which events to attend for the true Montreal experience.

What you see is what you get! The place looked exactly as it did in the pics. Very clean, modern,  fully stocked with everything you need and more right down to board games, books and movies. Ben was very accomadating and even offered to pick us up from the airport but we were driving. He had the place ready on time and took us on a walk through to make sure we were good instead of just handing us the keys and splitting. This was my first AirBnb experience and after this one I will be using Airbnb again for sure.

Thanks Ben and Airbnb!!

Bens place was very spacious and modern and had all the amenities we could want. Both Ben and his wife were super lovely and accommodated us with an early checkin at the last minute and had great communication. Ben and his wife even greeted us with fresh bagels and schmear from the famous fairmont bagel shop and croissants.  Their communication was great and the place was a great deal for the area. It is super close to a lot of bars, restaurants, and shops and walkable to the metro which was about 10min and close to many buses. Even though it was a hip and somewhat loud area on the weekend being off one of the side streets was very nice and quiet for a good night of rest. One thing to note is that you will need to use the set of keys to lock the door so going in and out requires the keys. It took some coordination but in the end it worked out. His entertainment set up is also amazing for when you want to curl up and watch on of their diverse library of DVDs  with surround sound. All in all I would stay again and Ben was a good host for our first time in Montreal.

Ben was super helpful across the board. We met to get the keys, and then he was available via text for the duration of our stay.  We was also very helpful after we'd left, when we realized that we'd left some luggage accidentally outside on the sidewalk. He did everything he possibly could to help us get it back.  We really appreciate him going the extra mile.

Ben's place was awesome! We loved the space and it had everything we needed. The only issue we had was our car was too big for the underground carpark, as the roof was super low, so we had to find street parking.

All was great! The appt. was beautiful and walking distance from most places we went over our stay. 
Ben was very friendly and helpful with anything we needed on our stay!
Thanks again, Ben!

Great condo in a fantastic location, close to plenty of shops and restaurants. Walking distance of downtown. The pictures are very accurate so we knew what to expect on arrival. We were able to park the car on the street, although an underground garage was available if we needed it. Ben was a very helpful and friendly guy. We had a good stay at Ben's place and were very comfortable there.
Ben est tr√®s gentil et accueillant le condo est magnifique tres bien situ√©!
An excellent host, Ben went out of his way to make visiting Montreal such a great experience!
Tr√®s belle condo et super bien situ√©. Ben est tr√®s accueillant et sociable.

Jo√£o was a great and caring host! If you love the ocean, the beautiful sunsets, walking on the sandy beach, and watching the beautiful seagulls fly close to your apt. reviews.comments:
Host: Marian gave us a warm welcome and treated us kindly from the very beginning. She offered us help, told us what to visit and even put water, milk and orange juice in the fridge! We could have breakfast at her place which was perfect because she has a little sweet balcony! 
Location: calmly situated in a side street, very near to the Placa Catalunya, the Rambla and the gothic area of Barcelona (very beautiful:)) so you have the old cultural center as well as all the restaurants and bars just nearby.
House/Room: the appartment is not a huge, but I think you have everything you need (beautiful sitting room, balcony, kitchen) in it. You have to share the appartment with Marian so pay attention and don't be too loud in the evening!!
disadvantage: the heat is terrible in summer and there is no air-condition..

I would overall recommend it to everybody!! But if you want to party and stay up late, take a hostel or another appartment.

name: Cute studio with Sydney Harbour Bridge views!
summary: This bright and airy studio apartment offers a fabulous balcony view of the iconic Sydney Harbour Bridge and is conveniently located near buses, trains and the ferry. Just one train stop to the city, or a 30 minute walk across the Harbour bridge. Restaurants, cafes, bars & grocery stores within 10 minutes walk. Apartment has fully equipped kitchen with fridge, microwave, gas stove & oven, dishwasher and espresso machine. Free wifi (ultra fast NBN) and complimentary tea & coffee.
space: Despite it's relatively small size, this studio has a bright and airy feel that makes you feel right at home. The balcony is equipped with table & chairs, so you can enjoy your breakfast or evening glass of wine with views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge.  You will have access to full kitchen facilities and desk space. The TV is also equipped with an Apple TV for complimentary Netflix & Stan - plus DVD player for a collection of near 200 movies to choose from.
description: This bright and airy studio apartment offers a fabulous balcony view of the iconic Sydney Harbour Bridge and is conveniently located near buses, trains and the ferry. Just one train stop to the city, or a 30 minute walk across the Harbour bridge. Restaurants, cafes, bars & grocery stores within 10 minutes walk. Apartment has fully equipped kitchen with fridge, microwave, gas stove & oven, dishwasher and espresso machine. Free wifi (ultra fast NBN) and complimentary tea & coffee. Despite it's relatively small size, this studio has a bright and airy feel that makes you feel right at home. The balcony is equipped with table & chairs, so you can enjoy your breakfast or evening glass of wine with views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge.  You will have access to full kitchen facilities and desk space. The TV is also equipped with an Apple TV for complimentary Netflix & Stan - plus DVD player for a collection of near 200 movies to choose from. Guests have access to the entire apartment - Make your
neighborhood_overview: This studio is located only 10 minutes walk away from Kirribilli Village, a suburb that not only houses our Prime Minister but offers a variety of lovely cafes, patisseries, bars and spectacular waterfront harbour views.  From Kirribilli, you only need to walk 5 minutes further to visit Sydney Luna Park, or take a walk across the iconic Sydney Harbour Bridge, taking you to the city in just under 30 minutes.  Also 10 minutes walk away is North Sydney CBD, a bustling business district offering supermarkets, cafes, restaurants, shopping malls, hair dressers, gyms, dry-cleaners... as well as the dry-cleaner located right next door to the apartment itself!
notes: The great thing about my apartment is it's location, however being so close to the city means whisper quiet surrounds are not guaranteed. The road outside my apartment can get a little busy during peak periods such as the morning and evening commute. If you are particularly sensitive to noise, this is something you should consider when staying at mine. It can get very warm in Sydney during the summertime. Although I don't have full air-conditioning installed, I provide a portable air-conditioner for my summertime guests. For taller guests 6 foot and over, my bed might be a bit of a squeeze. For couples I recommend putting the taller person on the pulled-out section of the bed where at least there's no frame hindering the feet! ;)
transit: Getting around is ridiculously easy from my place. Walk 5 minutes down the road for North Sydney Ferry wharf, 7 minutes to Milsons Point Train station, 10 minutes to North Sydney train station and bus stands.    From Milsons Point station, it's only one stop to the city. Should you want to explore a little more of the Northern side of Sydney, the bus stop right outside the apartment complex will take you to the suburbs of Neutral Bay and Cremorne, home of Australia's most beautiful independent cinema The Hayden Orpheum Picture palace; built in 1932 and restored to its amazing former Art Deco glory... for all you movie buffs out there, it's definitely worth a visit!
access: Guests have access to the entire apartment - Make yourself at home! ^_^
interaction: Although you might not see me in person, I'll be available for any questions or issues via mobile or Airbnb message!
house_rules: Please use coasters for glasses, and use a tray or tea-towel if you're resting plates on any furniture that's not a table. If there's any spills, breakages or other accidents, please let me know as soon as possible - accidents do happen, but the sooner I'm notified the more likely we can come up with a fix ^_^ The only people who should be residing in my apartment are those listed as my guests on Airbnb - if you intend on having visitors please do me the courtesy of clearing it with me first.  Thanks! ^_^

As a well-seasoned traveler, I hope to provide the kind of experience that I would expect and appreciate as a guest. Should you make a booking, you can expect a pleasant, no-fuss stay with maximum convenience. And of course a very warm welcome from yours truly! ^_^

reviews.comments:
Millie's studio was perfect! Fantastic location, easy walk to the train and amazing views of the bridge.

Thanks Millie :)

Our stay with Millie was absolutely wonderful. Matched the description with a lovely view of the Harbour Bridge. Very spacious apartment within 5 minutes from Lunar Park. Easy access via train and water ferry. Lovely stay!

Millie was a wonderful host. The studio was super clean and tidy, and¬†had¬†good wifi and a¬†comfortable bed. Best of all,¬†though,¬†was the¬†amazing view to enjoy from the little balcony. I will definitely recommend to friends.

The studio located in the perfect spot - super close to the CBD, but not too close from the hustle and bustle as well. It's only a short 5-10 walk from the train station to the apartment, and the streets are well lit at night so it's safe. Studio itself was clean, neat and comfortable.

Will be staying here again if I find myself in Sydney again!

Fab stay, Millie was so helpful as our plans had changed due to work and flight cancellations but she helped us immensely and was no issues.
Absolutely love the location and view wished we could have booked for longer! Perfect home away from home so cosy and homely! Thank you so much for sharing your home enabling us to book it and making our 1st week moving to Sydney so nice!

This is why I love airbnb!
Great place, helpful host, would highly recommend.
