Millie was a wonderful host and all was as described - highly recommended.

Millie's place was so pretty and cosy. It's got everything you need. The apartment is also located in a very nice area close to the city and amenities. Every morning you wake up to the harbor bridge view! 
Millie was also very helpful and flexible to accommodate our needs. She was very easy to talk to and help us feel like home. Definitely a nice place to stay when traveling in Sydney.

This was a perfect location for our stay in Sydney. A five minute walk to the harbour bridge and lots of restaurants within minutes of the apartment. Millie was an excellent host and very willing to offer anything we needed. I'd definitely recommend this place to anyone.

Millie was a lovely host, super friendly and great at communicating in the lead up to our stay. The studio is really cute, compact and well designed with some nice touches - coffee machine, emergency toiletries. A great stay, thanks!
fantastic place. thanks so much

Millie's place was as she described it and we found it quite comfortable, everything we needed, a cute little place! Millie was an excellent host and had gone out of her way to make sure we felt welcome. She was always friendly and quick to reply to our questions. Her attention to detail and thoughtfulness included a handy one-page reference card (how to use the coffee machine, where to find the light switches, etc) and some menus from the local takeaway places. 

The unit was clean and matched it's photos and description. It was a short walk from the train station (easy even with a suitcase) and there was no noise from the train line. We would definitely stay here again. It was like staying at a tidy friend's house.

The view is superb.
So easy to get around with public transport a short walk away, the apartment was really clean & comfy, the view was amazing, Millie was easy to communicate with, I would definitely stay here again.

Fabulous apartment, central location, great facilities and million dollar views!
Within walking distance to a fabulous array of dining experiences plus the pubs of both Kirribilli and North Sydney! What more could you ask for!

Millie was great at instructing us how to get to her place and everything we needed to know once we were there. The space itself was nice and private. The one downfall is there is a lot of street noise all throughout the night and especially in the early morning when people start to head to work. So if you're a light sleeper, you might want to book elsewhere.

Millie's place was the perfect location for our stay in Sydney. Just a few meters to the next bus stop and only a few minutes to train station and harbour bridge. The studio was clean and matched the description and had a great view to the bridge.
Would definetly recommend this!

Clear and quick communication with easy instructions for check in/out and how to find Millie's apartment.  Millie's studio had everything I needed for my week in Sydney, and is conveniently located within walking distance to the train, shops and restaurants.  I appreciated Millie's generous sharing of the kitchen equipment and the instructions on the bench made everything easy.  The bed was comfy and the bedding, towels etc. were a convenient touch.  I loved the view too - a wine on the deck watching the bridge light up was just what I needed at the end of each day!

I stayed in Millie's place with my wife through our short visit to Sydney, and it was a delight. The place is a walking distance to the restaurants and cafes in Kirribilli, and a one train station away from the city. The station is almost 7-minute walk from the building. Millie did her best to make us feel at home. She provided us with many goodies for breakfast, and made sure we get entertained through her movie and game collection.

I would definitely recommend Millie's place for anyone visiting Sydney, and I would check it out for availability next time I'm planning to visit.

Millie provided us with a really cosy apartment in a really awesome area. There are really cool restaurants at the foot of the bridge at Miltons Point. We took the ferry to get there or walked over the bridge. What a fascinating city. And what a spectecular view from Millies apartment. Thanks Millie, we had a great time.

We loved the apartment and would love to stay there again in the future. The location was great to get to the centre of Sydney and also the ferry system. The view from the balcony was amazing and the apartment was well equipped (even catering for emergency amenities). Millie was always on hand and very quick to reply to our messages. Thanks for being a great host.

We stayed at Millie's place four nights and congratulated ourselves on a good choice, mainly because of the location. It is in North Sydney which puts it into a lower price bracket, but it is a 5-10 minute walk to the North Sydney ferry which takes you right to Circular Quay, which is the public transportation hub and next to the opera house. You can even buy your public transport pass at the little store next to Millie's. Also, the apartment has a balcony with a stunning view of the Sydney Harbour bridge and skyline. These things compensate for the apartment's tiny size and lack of air conditioning. Millie left us with a lot of breakfast food plus coffee and milk. The kitchen was clean and well equipped. The bed converts from a day bed to a double, and even if we had done it correctly it would have required strength and lifting. If you are not young and strong get her to leave the bed set up for you. The apartment is charming and clean but the public areas of the building, including the laundry room, could use freshening, but don't let that put you off. We would stay there again.

It was a beautiful stay in this lovely studio, we enjoyed the time there.
And Millie is a great host, the conversation was really good!
Thanks very much!!
It was super easy to get to places and we loved walking over the bridge every day.
Millie's flat was clean, comfortable and centrally located within short walk to ferry and train and just a couple of stops to city. Also, cafes and shops close by.
Great location, close to public transport and comfortable apartment. Millie was a great and welcoming host.

Millie's place is just as described. We had a wonderful view from the balcony that we enjoyed having our dinner and breakfast to. Location is great too as it is so near the train station and Milson's point for ferry rides. Definitely happy we made the right choice :)
Thank you !!!Thank you for your patience, thank you for providing us with such a warm environment!!

Location fantastic, we needed aircon  the fan just did not cope and some place to put our clothes, it is Millies house but we feel she could have made some cupboard and hanging space otherwise really nice
Millie is a good host. Check in and check out was without hassle. Millie was available if we needed her. Thank you Millie!

Millie's "shoebox" (as she calls it) is an adorable little corner of North Sydney with easy access to trains and buses. Plenty of nearby food and drink, and her recommendations will definitely enhance your stay. Check in/out was easy as could be. Would stay again!
good location
Lovely studio in north Sydney.
Really close to the Harbour Bridge. Liked the clean and cosy room. Easy checkin/checkout. Would come again!
Had a lovely stay at Millie's.  Only a 15-20 minute walk to Circular Quay over the Sydney Harbour Bridge.  Very convenient.  Many thanks

We had a wonderful stay! Millie's studio is really cosy and was perfect for 2 of us. It also has a great view of the Harbour Bridge and was close to public transport. Checking in and out was also really easy. Would recommend and stay again.
Millie was a wonderful host - the apartment was clean, well equipped, really cute and well located; Millie communicated well and was flexible with my late check in.

Perfect unit, clean, cosy and so handy to all north Sydney has to offer. Millie is a great host, communication was excellent. Definitely recommend and will definitely re-book on my next trip to city. Excellent value

Millie's space is just great! It's such a well designed little unit that it didn't feel small even for 2 for 6 nights. We appreciated the spaces to hang and store clothes and the bathroom shelves. Thanks, Millie!
The stunning view has been mentioned several times but we also liked the proximity to Kirribilli and other neighbourhoods like Neutral Point (Thelma & Louise's for food!) also The Cremorne Coastal walk is worth it.
Getting in and out of Sydney is a breeze. Lots of eating places nearby.
Would highly recommend!

Our stay in Millie's Studio was perfect! The location is very easy to access public transportation or to walk across the bridge. Millie provided detailed notes for her studio and had everything we needed. We would definitely stay here again!

Everything was just great! It is a cozy little apartment near the Sydney center. Clean and you got everything you need for your stay. Public transport is basically in front of your door. Next time we are in Sydney, we would love to come back! Thank you for letting us stay in your home!

We very much enjoyed staying in Millie's lovely and very well presented apartment. It's very easy to get to from the airport/city and in a part of town that's a delight to wander (if you can tear yourself away from the balcony with its view of the Harbour Bridge).
Good communication, lovely view and clean homey apartment !

The room is so cute & good location!
I had a breakfast at the balcony & could see the harbur brigde every morning;)
And Millie is so kind!
I just wanna stay again.and I like SYD more!!

Great communication, accurate description of the space, perfect location and full of character. Overall an amazing experience and highly recommended. I will definitely be staying here again when I'm back in Sydney.

I loved Millie's home! I came to Sydney for work and booked Millie's home for the convenience of having everything close by. I ended up spending an afternoon indoors because it felt so homely and cosy. The bed is super comfortable and it was difficult to get up in the mornings! The view from the balcony is amazing and I loved seeing the city skyline and harbour bridge lit up at night. There was plenty of cafes and restaurants within walking distance and the neighbourhood is beautiful.
Millie herself was a wonderful host, very welcoming and accommodating. Communication was great.
I cannot recommend this space enough :)
Cozy little space with lots of inclusions and views of the bridge.  Walking distance to North Sydney train station, cafes and restaurants.

I would highly recommend staying at this place.
Millie is an incredible host, so accommodating and very swift with communication.
The apartment is the perfect size, tidy and cosy, with a very thoughtful use of space. We looked forward to coming home to the space every day. The view is spectacular just like the photos, with a cute balcony to look over the area.  Staying here was perfect with so many public transport options near by, getting into the city or going to crows nest was too easy.  Attention to detail has been paid to make guests feel so at home here, would definitely stay here again!!

Millie's apartment is very close to the train station and in front of a bus stop. Additionally, there are many little cafes within walking distance. Millie was great at communicating with me prior to the trip to provide me with helpful details regarding the apartment, she made check-in seamless. The apartment was clean, cozy, and had everything we needed - even tea! Thanks for the hospitality.

I really loved millie's apartment , close to all public transport and harbour bridge . Nice view of the sky while in the bed and harbour bridge . Communication with millie was really good. I would recommend this plce and will be back again

Millie's place is an absolute delight. The location is excellent, and although she lives in the apartment when she's not leasing it, it is neat as a pin, well organised and thoughtfully presented. The bed is very comfortable, the bathroom is clean and tidy and the kitchen is very usable. Millie mentions that the place is small, but for a solo traveller it is perfectly perfect. I think two people would also be just fine there. Loved it, and look forward to staying again at some stage.

Everything was exactly as promised. It is a small studio, comfortable and clean. It is close to restaurants and public transport that can take you wherever you want to go. Millie's instructions were clear and communication via the app was excellent. Very fast wifi. I never actually met the host in person but I had a very comfortable and pleasant stay.

The appartment is well situated, just a 10 min walk to catch a picturesque ferry journey to Circular Quay. Inside is really cosy and well designed. The bed was super comfy and Millie was a great host. All in all really enjoyable stay!
Fantastic location, cute little place, has everything you need. We spent 2 nice nights in watching DVDs from Millie's large collection! Would definitely recommend.

Une excellente adresse √† Sydney, id√©alement plac√©e : √† quelques centaines de m√®tres du train ou du ferry!Que demander de plus? Peut √™tre une coupe de champagne √† d√©guster sur le balcon en admirant au loin( pas si loin!) le Magnifique Harbour Bridge!!! A ne pas rater!!;merci Millie,!!!
Great stay, lovely apartment with an amazing view of the Sydney harbour bridge

You will love staying at Millie's. The studio was small but perfectly decorated. It well equipped too! The view is priceless really. It's my favorite park of the stay. In terms of convenience, the Bus stop is right outside the property, 12 minutes walk to the train station, and a few minutes to the wharf. Millie as host was nothing but an angel. Check in instructions were spot on, communication was consistent, and very gracious with check in time. I already miss the studio :)... Will definitely stay here again in the future! :)

Millie's place was tops. I was in Sydney for work and it felt like coming home every night instead of a sterile hotel suite. I would gladly stay again. So clean and exactly as Mille described. Thanks so much.
Millie's place is perfect for a stay in Sydney.  We walked to Ferry's loved the restaurants in KIRRIBILLI,  really enjoyed our short stay.

Yes, the view is everything you see in that photo, it is not faked, and yes it is to die for. Millie's studio is in a wonderful location, both convenient to shops, restaurants and public transport, yet stylish and glamorous. Both Kirribili/Milsons Point and North Sydney are  10 minute walks away. Her studio apartment is in a fabulous mid-century modern complex and she has arranged and furnished very much in period style with a few quirky popular culture and present day tweaks. It is a light-filled and generous space especially for the solo traveller. Whilst it is in a very busy district, there was not too much traffic disturbance and I could sleep well and comfortably.  Millie was also a thoughtful and generous host, who has excellent clear communication, has worked out simple and efficient processes for check-in and has second guessed the needs of travellers, and catered to them. One felt like a welcomed guest not a paying customer. Thank you and good luck to the talented and creative Millie

Awesome!  Location within about 5 minutes of the train station.  Nice neighborhood...felt like I was "coming home" every evening as I walked from the station.  Apartment has everything you need and a great view of the Harbor Bridge from the balcony.  Thanks Millie!
Very convenient

This has to be one of the best locations I've been to around Sydney. My partner and I enjoyed the place very much and everything was so convenient for us, especially going out. Her place was well equipped and very clean. Would recommend!

Millie's place is a nice small studio, perfect for 1 person or a couple. It is in a nice neighbourhood, and very well communicated. The apartment was tidy and clean, with spare drawers and part of the closet, so you feel like home. The desk gives an extra space, very useful if you are staying for work. I will definitely stay again here next time I need a place in Sydney.
A very welcoming place, and conveniently located.

Millie's place was fabulous! It's really central, close to public transport (trains, ferries and buses) and perfect for one or two people. It is cute as a button and super clean. Check in and out was really straight forward and she even provided coffee for her coffee machine. I highly recommend it!
Great place, close from the harbour and train!
Super host very good! Her house wonderful and location.

Millie's place is in a great location close to north Sydney, walking distance to the bridge, with a nice view of the bridge from the balcony. Millie is a thoughtful and generous host who was so easy to communicate with, and I would definitely stay here again.
Great location and great restaurants surrounding Millie‚Äôs place!
There was unpleasant gas smell in the house but Millie tried to solve the issue.
great

Beautiful view, great central location with Milsons Point station just a few minutes walk away.
Charming place that had everything that was needed to make the stay a very good experience!
Communication with host was quick and easy, Millie seems like a lovely person.
Would recommend! :)
Millie's apartment is really nice. It's neat and tidy, and while small, is well laid out and comfortable. The view from the balcony is quite pretty, as you can see the top of the Harbour Bridge.
great Appartment:) we had an awesome stay :)

We stayed at Millie's apartment for a few nights and can highly recommend it! It's in an excellent location (very close to public transport, cafes, supermarkets etc) with an equally excellent view out over the Harbour bridge. The apartment is very comfortable and great to come back to after a busy day exploring. A great place to stay!

We had an amazing couple nights at Millie's.  The apt was absolutely perfect for what we needed and Millie was a very considerate host.  Would absolutely stay here again! And the views of the bridge are fab!

Beautiful place with an amazing view over harbor bridge. Very clean, walking distance to the nearest train station or you can have a lovely walk to the Opera House. Millie was super helpful and provided many tips plus she made her own little guides at home you could read and use. Eveything was there and her beautiful place made me feel right at home!
Great location, excellent kitchen. Bathroom could be improved but otherwise well worthwhile and fair value. Millie is a very good host.

Great place! A wonderful space for two people even sharing the pull out bed. She has AppleTV which allowed my partner to log in and watch a movie we have downloaded. The views are amazing and it was such a short and beautiful walk across the bridge. There is also a cheap ferry that will get you across fast!

The unit is immaculately clean and tidy and in a fantastic location - just 8 minutes walk to the ferry at North Sydney or Milson's Point station in the other direction - or you can walk the bridge if the weather is nice.  The unit is small but we LOVED it, and I would definitely recommend it for a couple or two friends.  Millie was great with communication and access to the unit was easy.  Thanks Millie for making our stay so enjoyable and comfortable!
The apartment is a little gem in a great location, near the public transport to quickly arrive to the centre. It is a cosy apartment, very pleasant to stay and feel like home!
Close to the city, easy check in, comfortable accomodation. Well contained studio.
Close to CBD, very clean,very informative
Lovely, clean and cosy space. Fantastic location. Millie was helpful and responsive and I absolutely loved spending time there

An inviting space in a central location. Millie's apartment was bright, airy and eclectic. With views of the city overlooking the harbour bridge, it was in close proximity to Kirribilli shops, Milsons Point Station and North Sydney wharf. Would definitely recommend for tourists seeking a base to explore Sydney or locals for a weekend away :)

Millie‚Äôs apartment was super clean & tidy and in a very convenient location too (you can take the train, bus or even walk to the CBD). The thoughtful provision of amenities and smooth check-in process ensured a lovely stay. Great neighbourhood, felt safe walking back in the evenings.
Lovely little apartment, close to the heart of the city. Walking distance to several attractions and located in a nice neighbourhood. Would highly recommend!

Everything was perfect! Super fast communication - easy check in and out - cosy - awesome view at harbour bridge from the balcony - clean - super equipped - cbd in walking distance over harbour bridge - and a good hot shower (best after 4 weeks in the camper!!!)
Could not more recommend, one of the best Airbnb's we had so far:)
Super quaint area and easily accessible by the train. We had a great time and the host was super nice. Would 10/10 stay again

Millie's "Shoebox" would be great for one person or a couple looking for a value minded stay in Sydney with great view, clean accommodations, close to Milsons Point train station and even closer to the North Sydney ferry stop that takes you across the harbor to downtown Sydney and the Opera House.  You walk up the road a bit to North downtown and that's where you can buy all the groceries, beer and wine you need for your stay at a pretty good deal.  The views out the balcony are awesome - yes Millie's place is on the corner of a pretty busy stretch of street during commuter hours - but it adds to the charm; watching everyone scurry off to work while you're on holiday!  And the evening time was great for the balcony as you can open up the door, grab a glass of wine and enjoy the views of the Harbour Bridge at evening and sunset.  The bed was very comfortable for one, the kitchen was well stocked, the building itself seemed very safe and secure and it had a nice little counter w/ two bar stools that you can set up your IPad for the day/morning, have breakfast and get some work done before heading out onto your adventures.  You can tell I'm a big fan - as I'm an airbnb Superhost myself back in the USA.  The best part ... Millie's customer service and communication.  I cam a long way from SFO airport landing at 6:30 am after a long flight and Millie went out of her way to make sure I could either do an early check in or bag drop - and she was awesome during my visit with places to check out, etc.  She's a Superhost for a reason.  I've traveled around the world and have been to many countries and continents staying at various Airbnb units - Millie's was right up there for location, value, services, views and cleanliness.  Regards, Bret ~ 3ONE8 Manzanita in Manzanita, Oregon USA ~
Millie's place is great. I have stayed here now 3 times. You can not beat yhe value and the locality
Clean and convenient. Millie is also quick to response to any of our enquiries. Highly recommended.
Clean, perfect location and an affable host.  What more to ask for!?

Millie was a great host and her apartment was perfect. It was clean, spacious and comfy. We had a little issue the first day when the electric tripped (the fuse box is in the wardrobe) but Millie‚Äôs friend Shelly and Millie were both so helpful and attentive it didn‚Äôt matter! The bed is super comfy and she has everything you could possibly need.
The view from the balcony really is the same as the pictures- it‚Äôs incredible! 
I would highly recommend this apartment and wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to stay here again! 
Thank you Millie!
Everthing was perfect!
Millie is very gracious
Location is great. Hassle free check in and Millie responded quickly to our questions.

Millie‚Äôs place is very cute, clean and in a very good location. Plus the view is incredible! We had a wonderful stay and will definitely hope to stay at Millie‚Äôs again next time we visit Sydney. It really added to our experience ‚ò∫Ô∏è
This is the 2nd time we have stayed at Millie and it was great. Will stay again
It‚Äôs really a good experience!
Great location! The train station was only 10 mins away. Recommend this place for anyone who wants to explore the city for a reasonable price!

Millie‚Äôs apartment is perfect for a solo traveller like myself, or for a couple. The location is perfect, only a short train ride right into circular quay! The view from the balcony  overlooking harbour bridge while I ate my breakfast was something else! 
Millie responded to my messages super quickly and answered all my questions. 
Definitely recommend staying here and if I ever get the chance to go back to Sydney this is where I‚Äôd hope to stay!
Small, cozy, and very stylish place! Will definitely come back!

The appartment is very easy to reach by train or bus. It is not big but big enough (and cute) as you will be out most of the time to explore Sydney. Millie is very accurate with response, tries to help the best she can with all kind of tips. The elevator in the appartment building was most convenient with our heavy suitcases..... :). Thanks again Millie.

Millie's apartment is super cute and felt homely the moment I walked in the door. The views from the balcony are superb, a perfect place to spend an evening with a glass of wine. The apartment has a well equipped kitchen, there's good wifi and the bed is really comfy.

I loved the location, just a few minutes walk from the station and the ferry (which was a great way to arrive in the city centre!), and you can easily walk or run to the north side of the harbour bridge and Luna Park. There's a few nice places to have coffee nearby (check out The Flying Bear) as well as amenities and a supermarket in North Sydney.  Crossing the harbour bridge or taking the ferry every day really added to my experience of Sydney.

There was a little bit of traffic noise which was the only slight downside (the place would really benefit from double glazing) but I soon got used to it and everything else more than made up for it. 

I'd love to stay again one day - a real 5 star Airbnb experience.  Thanks Millie!
Perfect place to stay for a few days to explore Sydney. Short walk to Milsons Point train station and stunning walk over the harbour bridge. Amazing balcony views, would highly recommend.

Location was great, 10 min walk to train station. View of bridge: amazing. Size: think Manhattan or Tokyo. Bed: extremely comfortable. 
Quirky and older building/apartment with a few things that remind you its old, though not any pressing issues. 
Noise at night like any big city, but free parking and an elevator make up for it. However, (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps nor GPS took me to the correct address, so be prepared if you‚Äôre driving. Safe, and served the purpose. Recommend to a single or easygoing traveler!
Cosy apartment conveniently located close to cafes and public transport. Millie was quick to respond and provided detailed instructions for our stay . Thanks Millie!

Beau petit nid avec une superbe vue sur les immeubles et le pont de Sydney.  Quartier tranquille. 

√Ä 5-10 minutes de marche du ferry ou de la station de train/m√©tro Milsons Point. 30 minutes √† pied de Circulay Quay. Quelques petites √©piceries en sortant du m√©tro dont 1 du c√¥t√© de Luna park mais plus haut que la station de train. 

Parfait pour une personne seule et l'endroit est tr√®s s√©curitaire. Bien √©quip√© dont un french press et une machine expresso. Pas de cafeti√®re mais une bouilloire. Beaucoup d'√©quipements pour faire la cuisine. 

Seul point incommodant est le bruit de la circulation et la luminosit√© dans la pi√®ce la nuit. Donc, munissez vous de bouchons pour les oreilles et de cache yeux pour la nuit. Aucun bruit entendu des voisins ou du passage. 

Endroit propre et en ordre mais vieillot. Matelas et oreillers confortables.

Nicely furnished little apartment with everything you need for a stay. Great kitchen facilities and well kitted out. For those that do not like noise, this is not the best option as it is a noisy street.

The studio was great for us to stay. We love to stay in North Sydney and had the best stay in Millies studio with amazing bridge views. The studio is how it‚Äòs described by Millie, for my wife and myself perfect to relax for a week. It‚Äòs not to small as you will stay in it just for the night and in case of staying there for a longer time you can use the balcony with his amazing views.

We used the Milsons Point train station, but more often the ferry terminals North Sydney and Milsons Point because of the short ways to Circular Quay and city. Shopping is possible in North Sydney supermarkets which are 10 minutes away.

Millie answers very fast and is helpful in everything although there is (nearly) nothing that needs to be explained because of all the information Millie gives to you.

Would definitively love it to stay again in Millies studio!

Thank you again,
cheers Chris
Cutest apartment, perfect area, great amenities and a wonderfully helpful host. Can't recommend Millie enough.

I loved staying at Millie‚Äôs! The location is fantastic - walking distance to the station, the harbour, and a selection of cafes and shops. The views of the harbour bridge are great as well. The apartment is well equipped with everything you could need whilst you stay and Millie was very helpful in organising a check-in time and sharing other useful information about the place. I would happily stay here again.
This place has fantastic location in a very nice neighborhood. Cute apartment and the host is easy to communicate with. Definitely recommend a stay here.
Great location ...... generally nice apartment ..... bathroom needs a refurb ........ behind settee/ bed needs vacuuming

I agree with positive things that were written in other reviews about the location, view from balcony (I was happy to see a friendly colorful bird visit), nice host with good communication skills and the wifi connection.  I also feel the bathroom should be remodeled.

A great location for seeing the iconic sites of Sydney and the North Sydney beaches. After a 10 min walk to the trains, you can be in the CBD in 10 mins. From the airport to the apartment door was 50 minutes.

Millie‚Äôs place is absolutely amazing. One of a kind with beautiful views and walking distance to all transportations. Great place to stay, with cute little finishing touches. She even had a bottle of wine for us, with snacks and a jar of useful things you need while traveling. Definitely recommend staying here!

name: Gorgeous Designer Decorated 2BR Loft
summary: Designing this apartment was a two-year passion project -- every object and piece of art has been carefully considered. The apartment features two stunning bedrooms, a large, open living space and a fully-equipped kitchen. Ideal for your family or friends. Located in prime Williamsburg, you'll enjoy top flight food, the best shopping, immaculate parks, nightlife and East River Park sunsets with Manhattan silhouette. We take great joy in hosting you and cannot wait to meet you.
space: Experience luxury living in the gorgeous 2 bedroom 2 story loft in vibrant, creative, modern Brooklyn. Surrounded by local artists and entrepreneurs, not only will you be able to enjoy the stunning art work in the apartment, but you will be able to truly immerse yourself in trendy, free-spirited Williamsburg. The apartment is very spacious and has a completely open layout. All of the appliances in the loft are brand new and very modern. The large kitchen, bar dining table that comfortably seats 6, and 2 couches in the living are all perfect for entertaining guests. The floor to ceiling windows allow for lots of natural light to flood the loft. The second story has 2 large bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The first bedroom features a king sized bed, large windows from wall to wall, as well as access to the patio. There is a beautiful, green view from the patio, in addition to the seating area where you can sit and enjoy a quiet, peaceful morning. The second bedroom features a queen sized

neighborhood_overview: Williamsburg is the epicenter of the art world and New York creative energy. You can't walk a single block without seeing large, incredible murals on varying building walls and facades. It hosts frequent pop-up shopping, new restaurants, and events. Our loft is in the heart of Williamsburg - Dozens of restaurants, boutiques, coffee shops, and the like are found just blocks away.
transit: The apartment is located the following distances from these main attractions:  One World Trade Center - 3.6 miles / L to the E Trains Chelsea Market/Highline - 4.2 miles / L Trains Empire State Building - 3.9 miles/ L to the 6 or N, Q, R Trains Grand Central - 3.9 miles/ L to the 4 or 5 Train Rockefeller Center - 4.5 miles/ L to the N or Q, R,  F, M Trains Museum of Modern Art - 5.8 miles/ L to the E or F, M , N, Q , R Trains Central Park - 4.1 miles/ L to the C Trains American Museum of Natural History - 7.5 miles/ L to the 1 or C Trains Guggenheim/MET - 5.5 miles/ 6L to the 4 or 5, 6 Trains JFK  (John F. Kennedy Airport) is located outside of Manhattan and is around 1 hour car ride or 1 hour subway/train ride.  NWK (Newark Liberty International Airport) is located in New Jersey and is around a 1 hour car ride or 1 hour subway/train ride.  Laguardia Airport is located near Manhattan and is around a 30 minute car ride or 1 hour subway/train ride.
access: Guests are welcome to the apt and all its amenities: 120" theater projector, two porches, coffee, honor bar and high speed wifi-- everything but a downstairs closet where we store our personal belongings.
interaction: While Todd is out of town, the apartment is managed by Happy Host, a luxury AirBnB concierge service.  Happy Host will greet you on arrival, tour the apartment with you and provide local tips and event recommendations. Prior to arrival, Happy Host will ensure you‚Äôre provided fresh linens, a clean apartment and fully-stocked essentials. In the event of an emergency, Happy Host will respond 24/7.

reviews.comments: Apartment is beautiful and impeccably designed - exactly as in pictures. Location is great too as it is a ~5 min walk from Bedford Ave with a lot going on in the vicinity of the apartment. The hosts made me feel more than welcome and were very accommodating making my stay a blast. Would definitely stay here again when I'm back in the area.

Todd's place is beautiful and is located in the heart of Williamsburg, Brooklyn.  A very awesome area, close to L train station to get to Manhattan quickly!  I would definitely recommend staying at Todd's place.  The neighborhood is full of great places to eat and shop.  I<3 NY.

Todd is a great host; very responsive, clear communication, flexible, and so kind. I booked his gorgeous Brooklyn apartment last minute and everything was perfect when I arrived; he even arranged for a bottle of wine to be left for me. Amazing space, chic decor, and friendly amenities. I look forward to staying at Todd's place again in the future.

Todd was very easy to deal with and very helpful. The apartment is beautiful and in a fantastic location amongst a funky and trendy area. the beds are extremely comfortable, the projector is amazing. 
The staircase was a little scary however comes with being a loft style.

Todd has a great apartment in an awesome location in Williamsburg. The space was clean and bright and everything was just as described. Cafe Mogador is right downstairs and the subway is only a couple blocks away. Lots to do and a great place to return home to. There were no issues and we would recommend to anyone looking in this area.

Todd¬¥s Apartment is a wonderful place in the middle of Williamsburg. We loved the location as the area is really relaxed and cool and the ferry to Manhattan just a couple of minutes walk away. I would recommend this place to my friends - especially if it is their first time in New York. From the apartment as a base it was easy to understand how the city works. The area around the apartment is really great for just walking around, there are great breakfast and dinner places everywhere as well as nice shops. Will come back for sure.

Great location for 2 couples. The two bathrooms are very convenient and end-of-day-drinks on the main balcony make the stay a breeze. Too bad we only stayed one week. Host interaction was limited to pre-trip sync and check-in and was completely fine! We were allowed to leave our luggage in the apartment on the last day past check-out which helped us enjoy the final hours before heading to the airport. Thanks for a great stay!

Staying at Todd's place was great. Super close to the L train and surrounded by tons of great shops, restaurants, and bars. He was very kind to give a bottle of wine and some toiletries as gifts. 

The projection screen was awesome and I loved the tall ceilings in the space. The bed was very comfy. I mainly communicated with Aimee, but she was really helpful. The only downer is no access to a washer and dryer. At that price point, and as a Superhost, I feel it should be included. I completely respect and understand Todd's reasoning, however. 

I truly enjoyed his d√©cor and style. Thanks Todd, and Aimee, for a great stay. 

Best,
Gabriel

What a wonderful apartment! Quiet, bright, 2 balconies overlooking a private garden. We had a delightful stay in the heart of BKLN, Todd‚Äôs apartment is very well placed to stroll in Williamsburg, move and visit, shopping, it is also delicately decorated, everything is convenient for a family life. The concierge service can not replace the exchange with an owner (the knowledge of his district, the procedures‚Ä¶) but they
answer any practical application whatever the moment by phone, sms or email. As negative points, dust and dog hair, fridge not cleaned on arrival, the concierge service was immediately intervene a person household so it was ok. We also suffered big plumbing problems, 1 then 2 toilets and lavabo clogged for 2 days without the possibility of immediate repair. It can happens ;(  However, we keep very good memories of our stay at Todd‚Äôs place, we highly recommend his apartment and will be ready to return.
Fabulous place to stay in the heart of Williamsburg.
Todd's place was perfect for us. Great location with a lovely cafe right downstairs, grocery 1 block away and a park to see the Manhattan skyline 2 blocks away. Loved it. Thanks Todd!!
Amazing place and great handling. If you like to stay in Brooklyn this the place to be.

The apartment is beautiful, the location is quite fantastic - walkable distance of various great shops and restaurants and the sametime the street is peaceful and family friendly.
The communication was always great, everyone answered promptly and were always very amicable the whole stay. 
Thanks Todd and Happy Host for helping us throughout our stay and making us feel very welcome.
This flat is amazing, Beautiful natural light in a perfect location.
Todd's loft is fantastic and exactly as described in a brilliant super cool area of Brooklyn. Would definitely recommend staying there and living like New Yorkers for a few days.
Superbe appartement, beaucoup de charme, tr√®s bien plac√© dans un quartier tr√®s sympa, √† c√¥t√© du m√©tro pour Manhattan. Nous recommandons vivement !

Todd's place it's the perfect place to experience the true Williamsburg experience. With a walking distance to the best places for brunch, music stores, and the coolest area to get to know a different side of Brooklyn! L train is just 2 blocks away where in just 10 min. you are in the middle of Manhattan. We had a couple really cold days and the apparent was so cosy we barely felt the heavy weather. Definitely recommend!

Location is amazing! And the place is really quiet! 
There is a lovely cafe just next door and the L station is two blocks away! 
Loved everything! Just think the apartment could me a little cleaner, but that's just me being super hard. 
Would definitely recommend and hopefully come back! 
Thanks Todd!
Good location for the L train and getting to know Brooklyn

Great place and location!
Checking in and out was super easy.

Todd's apartment is beautiful, spacious and clean. My girlfriend set her family up there for a week, and they were very happy with everything. The best thing is definitely the location-- you can't ask for anything better in Williamsburg. Close to the subway, but also close to all the best restaurants and shops the neighborhood has to offer.
Cool place, great location, we had major issues with cleanliness unfortunately.  Hopefully with a deep clean it would be an incredible place

The place is a complete sanctuary! Hard to believe you're in New York when your there. Very central, some great restaurants, shops, bars in the area and a stones throw from a walk to the water. Great communication with host, just a great experience. Definitely hope to stay here again in the future!
Really beautiful space with a lot of potential but struggled with cleanliness a little. Would still book again!

Amazing location. Place is big enough to stretch out. Great natural light. Comfortable furniture. All furnishings well designed. Cool neighbors. Equipped kitchen. Well functioning appliances. Solid Wi-Fi. Great experience, can't wait to be back.

The appartment is great! Location is amazing! Special  touches and things you usually do not see in an airBNB apartment.
As the appartment is marked also as kids friendly, I would say, with kids under 6 the staircase to second floor is too steep.

Todd, loved your beautiful space. A true green oasis in Brooklyn. The location is second to none. You clearly have a great eye for interiors, the apt is beautifully done. 
There had been commentary re. cleanliness so I was a bit concerned. Where it matters (linen, bathroom, kitchen) - things were spotless. Rest of apt is pretty dusty but that doesn‚Äôt impact on the stay. 
The Happy Host setup is a little impersonal and can make for tricky communication where there are questions or concerns.  
A side note: the beds are very comfy, but if you have back issues it might help to know the mattresses lie on the floor. They‚Äôre terribly soft, which could be an issue if you have a bad back.

The place was all together nice, but a few things were lacking and the communication with the host was a problem as he was late, not responding and only acting on essential requests when I contacted airbnb about the problems. A stressful experience which could have been avoided if the host was acting responsible.

The Todd apartment is perfectly located! Ideal area to stay in NY because lively but so quiet than Manhattan. Located right next to plenty of restaurants, shops and a delicious bakery right across the street. Small terrace overlooking a garden so very quiet and very nice. I recommend!

The location is perfect! Near the action but not right in it. Easy to get to the train and other parts of the city. 

Although the location was great the place was very dirty and communication regarding details about checking in, checking out, wifi, and directions were difficult. 

The place looks great in the pictures, but the pictures do not show the dust, mold and expired old food in the fridge. We came across a used q tip, dead bugs, used toothpaste, and a dirty ash tray too. 

The moldy shower curtain was the worst part because it made the entire bedroom smell the whole time we were there. Being pregnant this was a concern. 

Checking in involved talking to 3 different people, and we were not provided information including the address, lock box code, wifi or details about the area until I asked a few days before. 

Lastly, as we were packing up the cleaning person came in and started cleaning 20 minutes before we were due to check out. 

We provided this feedback to the host and their concierge in the hopes these issues will be resolved because there is a ton of potential that is not being met. Hopefully they get it cleaned up and looking and smelling like the great place  it could be.
Todd‚Äôs place is in a great location in the middle of Williamsburg. Nice, modern spot. Definitely would stay there again.

Nice place, great location, quiet building. Stairs up to bedrooms were more difficult than I could tell from the pictures, definitely not good for children under 5 or 6. Walk up one floor to condo, no elevator. Not bad but just a little difficult to maneuver with luggage.
Great place, great location, amazing design!

I'm going to preface this by stating that my intention is not to write a "bad" review, but instead it is to write it as factual and honest as possible. This was the first time I felt compelled to write such a review after an Airbnb stay, but I feel like it will be important for potential future guests. First off, there are a few things written in the Airbnb description that I didn't find entirely accurate. The listing states that you will be greeted by a representative from Happy Host, a luxury Airbnb concierge service. The description states that this Happy Host rep would be greeting you upon arrival, providing a tour of the apartment, provide tips and local recommendations, and ensuring that you're provided with fresh linens, a clean apartment and fully-stocked essentials.. This never happened. When I booked the Airbnb, I was asked to provide my flight itinerary. I complied and figured this would be to plan the concierge check-in service weeks in advance. What actually happened on my check-in date was I received a text message with self-check-in instructions. That's it‚Äî no big deal, I guess. It's just not what was advertised. Second, the word "luxury" is used throughout the listing description. The Airbnb photos are very professional, the appliances and bathroom fixtures are very nice (aside from the downstairs bathroom cabinet that was falling apart). However, I would not describe this loft as "luxury" by any means. The couches especially are by no means "luxury." Then lastly, the description describes the kitchen as "fully equipped." This is definitely not the case. There are two very small saucepans and a 2-3 egg size skillet to cook. Aside from that, I suppose perhaps you could describe the kitchen as "fully equipped." When I arrived, there was an extra-large laundry bag sitting in front of the door that was there the entire 4 nights of my stay. The beds lay directly on the floor. Instead of fitted bedsheets, standard bedsheets on top of bare mattresses is what we were left to sleep on top of. We were left one "Amazon Basics" brand towel per guest (not exactly luxury). Also, the 120" theatre projector described in the listing was not hooked up to anything to stream content nor play audio with. I managed to find which wires needed to be plugged into what to get it to work, however I don't think that most people would have been able to or would want to figure that out. The front door would not close properly and lock the first night I got there because the plate that the deadbolt locks into was falling off. I found something to use as a screw driver to screw it back in. My biggest issue with the loft was the cleanliness. This place needs a thorough deep cleaning and dusting. There were also about five or so dinner plates in the kitchen cabinets that I went through and found dried bits of food and...

This apartment is in an amazing location, and it worked perfectly as a share between two couples. Most of the cleanliness issues from previous reviews have been addressed, so don‚Äôt let that worry you. Building is easy to access with a great cafe right next door. We‚Äôd definitely stay again!
Nice place - perfect for our family
Perfectly clean, stylish apartment. We loved our stay.

Beautiful apartment in a wonderful neighborhood. Highly recommended! Todd and Anthony were great hosts, kind and helpful and available at all times. The apartment is spacious, full of light, beautifully decorated and extremely well equipped. And staying in Williamsburg makes the perfect NYC experience. Really looking forward to staying here again.
Great if you are looking for a centralized location in a hot area of Brooklyn. So easy to get around and a great value. Todd was so easy and responsive.

Vi n√∏d at v√¶re i Todds dejlige lejlighed. Beliggenheden er fantastisk med gode restauranter t√¶t p√•... og en dejlig bager lige p√• den anden side af vejen. Lejligheden er perfekt til fire mennesker; det bedste udgangspunkt til oplevelse af New York, man kan t√¶nke sig.

Todd‚Äôs place is incredible! Very modern, clean and stylish. Located right in the best area of Williamsburg, Brooklyn. Great places to eat nearby and a great park on the water  I enjoyed walking to  every morning with coffee in hand to appreciate the NYC city views. Super short and easy walk to hop on the Subway and head into Manhattan as well.

Can‚Äôt wait to stay here again!

The Loft is located in a neighborhood with character, close to many nice bars and restaurants and not far from the marina with a wonderful view of Manhattan. The apartment is quiet, which allows you to take a break from the city noise. The interior is very nicely designed. We spent a wonderful 8 days here.
A very peaceful location but in an area filled with restaurants, bars, shops with easy access to all tourist sites.

Todds Apartment is in a very nice neighborhood, specially hipster will like it there.
BUT the apartment wasn't as we were expecting it,  we arrived at around 5 pm the cleaning personal opened the door for us and we had entry to the apartment.
Let me say it in a nice way...
... we stayed there instead of 5 nights just 1 night, the apartment wasn't clean, in the lower bathroom the ceiling was coming down it was  because a water damage and it was mold, the aircondition is super loud so we had to turn it off and sleep in a hot apartment, we also found a small cockroach. 
We booked a Luxury Apartment for a lot of money so we weren't happy with the situation and after the first night it was clear for us that we have to switch if we wanted to enjoy our vacation...
BUT we immediately texted Todd and Airbnb and both sides agreed on a full reverse and i got all my money back plus a 250$ coupon of Airbnb this happened  very fast and we switched to a hotel
Todd was awesome! Highly recommend this trendy space!
Very quiet apartment in the best possible location in Williamsburg.
What an amazing place!! Todd did a really good job decorating it and the nice view to the back of building with all these trees make you feel like you aren‚Äôt in NYC. I‚Äôd definitely come again :)
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: King Size Private Bedroom in Surry Hills
summary: Welcome to Surry Hills! Private room with a King size bed close to the CBD, Oxford Street, Central Station and Hyde Park. You‚Äôll love my place because of the comfy bed, the location and the homeliness. There is a fully equipped kitchen with Nespresso machine and breakfast essentials. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
space: This cosy, bright 2 story terrace is located on a quiet street in leafy Surry Hills. It's a 20 minute walk to the heart of the CBD and only a 10 minute stroll to the beautiful Hyde Park.
description: Welcome to Surry Hills! Private room with a King size bed close to the CBD, Oxford Street, Central Station and Hyde Park. You‚Äôll love my place because of the comfy bed, the location and the homeliness. There is a fully equipped kitchen with Nespresso machine and breakfast essentials. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. This cosy, bright 2 story terrace is located on a quiet street in leafy Surry Hills. It's a 20 minute walk to the heart of the CBD and only a 10 minute stroll to the beautiful Hyde Park. Full kitchen with amenities, including Nespresso machine. Shared bathroom with full amenities Washing machine and dryer Iron and ironing board Wi-fi Barbeque I live in the house and I'm a professional working in the city so you have the place to yourselves during the day. I'm friendly and easy-going and I'm happy to give you ideas for things to do whilst in this great city. Surry Hills is a foodies haven - there are heaps of great coffee places and re
neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is a foodies haven - there are heaps of great coffee places and restaurants all within a short walk. Ideally located between the CBD and Centennial Park, Surry Hills is an ideal base location to visit the iconic sights and also catch a cricket, AFL or rugby game at the SCG/Allianz.
notes: Flexible on check-in when possible and have a key safe in case you arrive when I'm at work etc.
transit: There is a bus stop 10m from the front door which goes directly to Circular Quay via Martin Place. Central Station is a 10 minute walk to get anywhere you could possibly need to, including the airport. Taxis to and from the airport take around 20-30 mins depending on traffic - an uber to the airport is usually the best way to go.
access: Full kitchen with amenities, including Nespresso machine. Shared bathroom with full amenities Washing machine and dryer Iron and ironing board Wi-fi Barbeque
interaction: I live in the house and I'm a professional working in the city so you have the place to yourselves during the day. I'm friendly and easy-going and I'm happy to give you ideas for things to do whilst in this great city.

host.host_about:
Hi, I'm Hayley. I moved from the UK to Australia in November 2015 with my boyfriend and we love living in Surry Hills.
I'm very active; I enjoy the gym, running in Centennial Park and exploring all of the great walks around NSW and beyond. I volunteer for a women's charity and I'm also a Girl Guides leader.
I love to cook but with the variety of amazing restaurants on our doorstep it's hard to not eat out all the time!
As both a guest and host I'm polite, considerate and tidy. I like for our guests to feel at home when they stay with us - so if there's anything you need, just ask.

reviews.comments: We had a great stay here. Hayley was very easy to communicate with prior to our arrival. The room was spotless and comfortable and the breakfast/coffee was very much appreciated. The central location was perfect for our weekend in the city.

The room was just as described, and was in a perfect location in the heart of Surry Hills.  Getting to the CBD, or walking around the neighborhood were so easy from the apartment.

Hayley and Jack made my stay really pleasant, with lots of amenities and insights into the neighborhood and Sydney in general.  They even went out of my way helping me get to my next location.  Couldn't recommend them enough.
Comfortable place to stay, good kitchen facilities, easy access to transport and nearby supermarket, places to eat etc.
My boyfriend was in Sydney for a job interview. Hayley was a great host. The location was perfect as well.
Clean and comfortable lodgings, the hosts made me feel welcome. It's a relaxed household and I'm a returning guest. My preferred place to stay in Surry Hills.

This is a cute little cottage in the heart of Surry Hills close to Oxford Street and Central Station 
Hosts were friendly and made me feel very welcome with brekky provided in the mornings 
All necessary info was given to me before hand and  any questions I had were promptly answered
Arrangements were made to provide a key for my arrival when they could not make themselves available
Jack and Hayley were great hosts. I felt welcome, the room was comfortable. No problems at all.
Hayley and Jack made me feel very welcome. Everything about the listing was accurate and it was a great location and neighbourhood.
Jack and Hayley are awesome. Down to earth. Welcoming. Made us feel at home. Would def stay there again.
Hayley & Jack we're very easy & friendly hosts who I would stay with again.

The location was great, comfortable bed, close to nice cafes and restaurants, easy walk into the city and to central station.  The only issue was the parking, however we parked in a secure car park which was only a 10min walk from the accommodation.  Would definitely stay again.  Thank you Hayley.
Very nice host and room, comfort bed, clean bathroom. House is near byaround museum station of airport link, and there are a lot of good restaurants around.:)

Great location and super easy to organise, check in etc.
Very helpful and warm-hearted hosts. Very good journey in Sydney with the perfect accommodation they have provided.
Hayley & Jack were very welcoming and friendly. The location was great, comfortable room and clean bathroom. Would highly recommend and stay again if we were in Sydney.

Jack and Hayley were very accommodating, friendly and easy going. Loved the location and the room was just lovely!
Pleasant stay. Hosts were engaging and made sure I was enjoying my stay. Wifi is very good and fast!
Comfortable bed. Clwan and well organized. Easy access to upper central district. Very safe and friendly community.  Great restaurant s on crown street. Thank you for a comfortable stay.

Hayley and Jack are busy people and often out of the house, so although this is a house share I did not see much of them. House more or less to myself.
Amazing location to get the best out of Sydney, very friendly hosts who made the process very easy . Thanks Hayley and Jack!

I really enjoyed the stay at Hayley's and Jake's place. They were really helpful and down-to-earth. 
The neighborhood is fantastic to explore the city. You can do everything by foot, it's safe by night too.
Would definitely recommend this place to a friend.

Irresponsible lowest host.
"We will now be away for the weekend so unfortunately will not get to meet you! "
She sent me this message the day before the afternoon of check-in date, no sorry, no apology, nothing. When the day before I made a final confirmation about check-in, she did not mention anything, I don't know why. I didn't check my e-mail after leaving my home, so I first realized this after arriving at her house. I felt very uneasy, I had to find all things myself.
If you need to get away from home, okay, but you should let the guest know at least a few days ago, you are too irresponsible.
Also where was "Nutribullet and breakfast essentials"? I didn't see anything, I had only tea and coffee.
Also, I left the house before the checkout time, but after that I got a message about checkout.
Lowest host.

Hayley and Jack were great hosts, and the location of the apartment was very convenient, within walking distance of bus stops and the train station. The bed was huge and very comfy. Thank you for having me!
Great location and comfy bed. Thanks for a pleasant stay.

Enjoyed my stay at Hayley & Jack's! Their place is located in a cool neighborhood with a great selection of restaurants/shops with close access to tram lines. Hayley & Jack made themselves open to communication and were quick to respond to any questions. They're a friendly couple and made some great suggestions for restaurants. Thanks for making me feel welcomed!
A nice place. The bed is huge. They made me feel at home although they were at work most of the time. Very accommodating even when I had to check in late.
Hayley and Jacks place is great! It's clean and quiet, and simple. Would definitely recommend.

Great location and seamless checkin/checkout process. 
Lovely place!

It was a good stay with all basic necessities covered! Clean and well kept. Really nice to have coffee and bread too. Great location by bus from Circular quay and Hyde Park. Uphill climb from Central Station. No aircon but fan is provided for summer nights. Appreciated Jack's fast response to my questions! Thanks!

The stay at Hayley and Jack's was terrific! They are such nice hosts. The room was also very clean and the bed was a real kingsize. I shared it with my brother and we both had enough space:)! I absolutely recommend this place during a stay in Sydney!

La camera rispecchia la descrizione. Molto vicino al centro che √© raggiungibile a piedi in 20 minuti circa, e ben collegata con i bus. Molto vicina anche alla stazione 5-10 minuti a piedi. Zona carina e tranquilla con diversi locali aperti fino a tardi. Hayley e Jack sono stati carini e disponibili fin dall'inizio e Jack ci ha dato diversi consigli utili su come utilizzare al meglio il nostro tempo. Caldamente raccomandato!
Great spot in Surrey Hills only moments from great cafes and restaurants and walking distance to most other central Sydney sights.

My stay here was great! Awesome location and the hosts go above and beyond. There was milk and bread left for us to eat/drink and they were available for any questions offering perfect suggestions. Would recommend to a friend

Hayley's place is very well located, close to Museum Station, which makes it very easy to get to the airport or the city centre.  Also close to Hyde Park, Oxford Street but best of all Crown Street - this is a great street with plenty of restaurants!   There are also supermarkets close by if required (for fruit / snacks).  Place is really nice and quiet, bed is huge and comfy, slept really well.  I only stayed 2 nights but enjoyed my stay and would definitely recommend this place.
Great location, friendly hosts

Hayley and Jack are great hosts and were always very polite and accommodating. The place is comfortable and located in a great neighborhood. Very clean room and bathroom and I would highly recommend to anyone visiting Sydney.

I would def stay again.
Everything was just fine! Hayley and Jack were great hosts. Very helpful and responsive. Thank you once again for the nice stay!
Great spot and location. Listing precise and accurate
Check in was easy. Location is great with easy access to transport. Bed is great although the room is a bit small. Hayley and Jack were welcoming and helpful.

Everything was exactly as advertised and fantastic. Great location (10 min to rail station, 1 min to bus, 30 min walk to Circular Quay, and loads of places to eat and drink v nearby), comfy bed in nice little house with good storage space, sofas, wifi, and breakfast essentials and tea/coffee provided... and Hayley & Jack were great hosts and I enjoyed meeting them. Would definitely stay again!
Great place to stay. Jack was very helpful and gave clear instructions. Bed very comfortable. Great location.
Great location, close to whole food grocery, cafes and grocery stores. Jack was very helpful and gave clear instructions. Clean place.
Great location, and Jack's communication and recommendations were spot on. Would stay again when I'm next in Sydney.

Good emplacement.
Nice location. Tidy room. Highly recommended.
the location is perfect,convenient to almost everywhere around downtown you could think of,and jack is very kind,giving us some tips as where to go,we had a good time!
Walking distance to Sydney CBD, great location!
Jack and Hayley were great hosts! They made everything convenient and were endlessly helpful. Great location, true to advertising, and very affordable. Thank you both!

I had a very comfortable stay, the room and the whole house was very nice - nice paintings all over the place. Jack was very friendly. I think that the greatest value is location here, Surry Hills is hip! It's also well connected to everywhere with public transport.
Great Location, easy walking distance to Sydney CBD. I was there on business so worked out perfect for me. Didn't get to meet Hayley but Jack was a great host.
Great location. Accessible.
What a terrific 2-night stay at Jack's home! Good location, fast wifi, clean bedroom and quiet environment. Great set up inside the room and considerate hospitality. Smooth communication with Jack!

Great location! Easy to get to from central station and plenty of buses around the corner too. Bed was really comfy. Hosts were super friendly and flexible with our checkout - Thanks guys it was great.
Jack was helpful, friendly and responsive. I would highly recommend staying at his place in surrey hills. It's in a great location with a ton of restaurants nearby.

I had a great time at their place, Surry Hills is a great location for exploring Sydney. They are walkable to good restaurants and bars, but also able to get a quiet sleep at night. The apartment is spacious and very comfortable, I recommended staying here if you visit Sydney!

Nice littke spot close to cafes and CBD.  Jack and Hayley were very accomodating and the coffee machine was a god send force army morning starts.  Don't need a car when staying here at all.  Great location.
Great location. Lovely hosts
Nice guy and nice stay. Very convenient

Great apartment in a perfect location for CBD, the harbour and other central sites. Excellent communication with Jack throughout (he was away for most of my stay) ...... free WiFi and access to coffee machine .... would happily book again - great value for money.

You will feel yourself home away from home. *CHECK IN AND CHECK OUT ARE HANDLED BY OUR AGENTS ON THE SPOT.

host.host_about: I organize, manage and handle the requests of our guests. I would be happy to host you in one of these apartments in Istanbul. My local agents and I will always be ready to help you to make your stay comfortable.

reviews.comments: Hotel super bien situ√© assai spacieux tr√®s moderne et bien d√©cor√©. Tous le n√©cessaire y √©tait et l'h√¥te et tr√®s serviable, J'y retournerai s√ªrement √† mon prochain voyage.

Mali a su r√©pondre avec rapidit√© et professionnalisme √† chacun de mes messages.
Appartement propre, bien situ√© et tr√®s calme pour ceux qui souhaitent se rendre vers la mosqu√©e bleue ainsi que les autres monuments pris√©s de cette magnifique ville.

Romain
Excellent host, excellent location. Highly recommend.
All ok
We really enjoyed the stay mali is really great person , the apartment was lovely and nice we are so happy that we choose the apartment
Nice apartment with lots of natural light. The people of the area are very nice and helpful. Location is great.
Good place in a perfect location within the Old Town of Istanbul.

PERFECT LOCATION 
just a few streets way from all the locations you want to be in ISTANBUL, The Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, the Basilica cistern, Topkapi palace, Hagia Irene and so much more! you can save lost of money, transportation,and tours that you can do on your own from this strategic location!
on the first level of the same building, there is a shop that sell traditional pastries and bread, DO NOT MISS THE BOREK! 20 mts. away in the corner a little supermarket with all the things and supplies you need, (beer as well)
the apartment by itself is really what you need, really clean and in perfect condition with a clean kitchen and fridge.

Mali is super responsive, and is the sort of Host that fixes things right away, not a common thing in many places!
if you are still with me on this review...
do not hesitate, book now! you won't regret it!
Great location, kind host, clear home.

We had a nice host at Mali's place! He wasn't there but all was pretty well organized. The studio is realy close to the blue mosque an Hagia Sophia only 5 min. to walk. At the bathroom ceiling is mold and it smells abit like that, but we had no problems with that. The wifi doesn't work. The communication with Mali was nice and quick. Greetings

Nice studio. Really close to ayasofia. Surroundings are streets of restaurants and  art shops. The host is nice and facilitates are all good for use. Downstairs is a mini market where you can buy most of your needs.

Konumu gayet g√ºzel,√ºcret olarak uygun, mini marketteki √ßalƒ±≈üanlar ihtiyacƒ±mƒ±z olan her durumda yardƒ±mcƒ± olup ilgilendiler.. 3 aile 3 farklƒ± dairede kaldƒ±k lakin temizlik konusun da hepimiz aynƒ± fikirdeyiz malesef √ßok k√∂t√ºyd√º.. sadece √ßar≈üaflar deƒüi≈ütirilip , temiz havlu bƒ±rakƒ±lmƒ±≈ütƒ±.. banyo,tuvalet, aynalar √ßok kirliydi, g√∂zle g√∂r√ºl√ºr yerler idareten toplanmƒ±≈ü geri kalan √ßoƒüu yerlerde bir √∂nceki gelenlerden kalan kullanƒ±lmƒ±≈ü mendiller, d√∂k√ºlm√º≈ü sa√ßlar hala duruyordu.. ke≈üke daha hijyenik olsaydƒ± , i√ßimize sinerek kalabilseydik..
The price/quality was good. It is very close to all touristic sites of Sultanahmet. I recommend it for tourist stay.

Mali made my stay great! He answered all my questions before I got to Istanbul and while there helped me again with taxi transfers, places to shop and what to do! He was a great host! I'd stay again at Mali's;)

I'm really happy that I found this place! Perfectly located studio with comfortable bed and nice view from the window. There is also fully equipped kitchen in the studio. Definitely recommended for everyone.  Though Mali wasn‚Äôt there, he answered all our questions by phone and provided us with all necessary information and support.  Budget travelers should also visit home-made food restaurant right next to the house. The owner, Murat, serves traditional Turkish dishes made by his mom. He will give you some useful tips about where to go for the best kebab or seafood in the city.

Before I found Mali's place I was thinking about one near the Galata Tower. (My mom 70 would have had hard time walking up the hill and stairs. The Galata Tower is on the top of a hill.)As we came Istanbul we were happy I'd made reservations for Mali's studio. It's less than 5 min. walk from the Blue Mosque. 2min. away from the restaurant with the nice Turkish breakfast and sea view. In the morning from 7-9 you can buy fresh simit (turkish bagel) right under you window and in the afternoons they sell different turkish dishes. We used to buy when we were tired to go eat out. 
 The staff was super helpful and friendly. 
If you want to save on yout accommodation and have more budget to  spend on entertainment, this place is for you. 
Hope to come back again someday!

Good place, 9 - 10 minutes walk to blue mosque, aya sofia and topkapi palace, near souvenier bazaar as well, the price not so different with grand bazaar.  although the walk to the the attraction a bit going up, but not a problem since going back home will be going down. If you like to enjoy the old city this is a good place. 

To bring kids or baby also comfortable as it is spacious. Mali gave such quick response. Amazing and help us gave info about Istanbul and where to go as well. He gave ua info abt transportation price etc. Great, really helpfu for us who have no plan befor visiting istanbul.
Perfect location. Close to all sites. Very friendly locals. We had an absolute wonderful time. Thanks, will definitely visit again.
Very nice apartment ,very good location

This is a really good place for 2 people in a great location(walking distance from all the main tourist attractions and tram station(Sultanahmet stop).There are a lot of places of interest and some really good restaurants nearby.

Excellent location.. welcoming and friendly locals.. felt safe throughout our stay..

Hidir was always available and saw that we had all we needed.. Thank you..

Apartment is different to the photos. The whole building is made for airbnb apartments but the pictures were from another apartment. Our apartment was really old and dirty, like in communist times. Almost no appliances in the kitchen. I have never seen such an old electric stove. Dirty carpet in the living room. I would also not recommend this location. The apartment is situated in the old city, not far from Blue Mosque but this is the most touristic area of Istanbul, everything is much more expensive there. If you want to explore Istanbul, I would suggest staying somewhere around Galata tower or Taksim square.
Great host
It was a nice holiday! good appartement

We booked the room 6 but were accommodated to another one (4 or 7, do not remember ‚Äì I realized it only after I left it). Its condition was a little bit worse than on photos, the worst is that there are a lot of molds on the ceiling and in the corner of the shower.
But in total, I liked this studio. It has a good location, pretty comfortable, well cleaned.
It was great, really close to fun stuff, super nice and clean apartment, super recommended.
Very helpful staff and very conveniently located. My wife and I stayed during a 30 hour layover and were very pleased with the location and staff. Within walking distance of almost everything.
Very nice place to stay an location. Great Hospitality, very helpful and quick to response before arrival and during our stay.

we're so thankful for Hidir for his hospitality. The apartments are so spacious and the staff keeps it cleaned all the time. it is located close enough to local attractions. we advise you to stay there.

Wir waren 10 Tage in Istanbul und haben uns in diesem Apartment sehr wohl gef√ºhlt. Das Apartment verf√ºgt √ºber eine kleine Einbauk√ºche, die kochen erm√∂glicht. Das Apartment wird t√§glich gereinigt und die Handt√ºcher gewechselt. Der Wlan Anschluss war leider sehr langsam.

name: Bright room in Spacious house close to Airport
summary: My home is close to the Airport (5.2km - no Airport noise) and St George Hospital (2.5km), it is half a block from the beach, 15 min walk to the Novotel Hotel in  Brighton Le sands where you can also find an abundance of restaurants, cafes and shops. You‚Äôll love my place because of the light, airy room in our spacious house and your own  bathroom. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers. We are on the 3rd floor with no lift.
space: Angela and Coby Welcomes You To Monterey The Room:  A bright and airy room awaits you which features: A Double size bed in a private room Desk Access to unlimited Wi-Fi Internet Kitchen Dining room Balcony Laundry service (I will do your washing for you at no charge - its a big machine,  and I am washing everyday so easier for me to do for you.)
description: My home is close to the Airport (5.2km - no Airport noise) and St George Hospital (2.5km), it is half a block from the beach, 15 min walk to the Novotel Hotel in  Brighton Le sands where you can also find an abundance of restaurants, cafes and shops. You‚Äôll love my place because of the light, airy room in our spacious house and your own  bathroom. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers. We are on the 3rd floor with no lift. Angela and Coby Welcomes You To Monterey The Room:  A bright and airy room awaits you which features: A Double size bed in a private room Desk Access to unlimited Wi-Fi Internet Kitchen Dining room Balcony Laundry service (I will do your washing for you at no charge - its a big machine,  and I am washing everyday so easier for me to do for you.) Bedroom, main bathroom, kitchen, dining room, balcony and laundry (baskets on top of laundry cupboard to put your dirty washing in, I will return it outside your bedroom door when dry). My son
neighborhood_overview: The Area Located near Botany Bay, the area where Captain Cook initially landed when exploring Australia, Monterey neighbours Brighton Le-Sands (10 Min walk away) providing ample dining and entertainment options. There is a beach half a block away that stretches for kilometres on end, a perfect destination to relax and a great swimming beach for children as no strong waves. With a plethora of restaurants to choose from, you will never be bored from the variety of cuisine available.
notes: Please be aware that my son is only 7 so is not always quiet (we are up around 7am), we are out a lot through the week (working/school) but in the weekends/holidays we are home and in the daytime it can be a little noisy at times. Also I need the house to be reasonably quiet after he goes to bed (8pm).
transit: Public Transport Situated around the corner to the bus stop, whether you're heading to the CBD or local train station, Rockdale (bus 478), there are plenty of options to take when planning to visit the city or suburban Sydney. The train trip to the CBD takes around 25 minutes while a bus ride usually takes 45. Please feel free to get in touch if you have any questions. Looking forward to meeting you.
access: Bedroom, main bathroom, kitchen, dining room, balcony and laundry (baskets on top of laundry cupboard to put your dirty washing in, I will return it outside your bedroom door when dry).
interaction: My son (7) and I live here so can be on hand most days to help out with questions.
house_rules: If using - please hide the key safe numbers for security. If you could keep the noise level to a minimum after my son goes to bed, closing the bedroom door when making phone calls, chatting or watching tv and closing hallway doors quietly (they are noisy doors and the handles need to be pushed all the way down to close quietly) that would be great. After 11pm please refrain from using the shower, running the bathroom taps for too long, loud phone calls or banging doors as I am a light sleeper and these do wake me. Turn off  bedroom/bathroom ceiling fan and lights when going out to conserve electricity. Keep kitchen tidy, dishes washed etc.I have recently had new wood floors in the apartment, please be aware they cannot get wet so if an accident happens please wipe up asap and ALL laundry/swim wear to be dried on the clothes lines outside. No unortherised visitors to enter the apartment day or night, thank you. $150 will be charged if the key is lost as I will need to change the locks o

host.host_about: Hi, I am from New Zealand, Steve is from Malta, Coby is our son. We love living here in Australia and the beach nearby is a big plus for us. Coby and I love travelling, I have been to over 50 countries and Coby to 7 (not bad for a 7 yr old!)  We love the Airbnb accomodation, doing little road trips within Australia and meeting people. Steve lives close by with his two sons and is looking forward to travelling more with us when they get older.

reviews.comments: Angela was very friendly and welcoming, I had a wonderful stay in her warm house, couldn't have asked for more. Thanks Angela

Angela's place was very close to the beach, and whisper quiet from road and airport noise.

Angela keeps a beautifully kept place. It is extremely well set up for guests and very comfortable.

Coby is a real sweetie, was well behaved, and good fun.

Thanks guys for being good hosts. I would love to come back.

Angela is a great and friendly host! Had a wonderful, comfortable stay at her place. Its very clean, bed is comfortable, and the room is spacious. The room is quite with fast internet access. Very powerful hot shower, good street parking. I would definitely stay here again and caanot recommend it enough! Thank you Angela!
Very happy with my stay. Very clean and quiet. Would recommend.
Angela's house was very good. The room is clean and nice better than the pictures. And angela and her son were very kind! Nearby here, there is the brighton le sands beach. That was great also.

Angela's apartment is a great place to stay, very close to the beach, super clean, with all the convenient appliances on cooking and cleaning. Angela has good tastes on apartment decoration, such as the sweet fragrant candles and the tiny lights spread on flowers and comfortable sofa.... Angela is also a very considerate host and would like share everything with me. It's so lucky of me to meet her  when I try airbnb for the first time. Thank you, Angela
Angela is very nice. The room is very clean and the bed is very soft. Thanks for ur warm welcome. Strong recommend. I had a very nice trip in Sydney.
