Was awesome! Couldn't have asked fora better stay! The room was neat and tidy with everything you could want available!! Plenty of parking and the bus stop that takes you to Sydney center is right on the corner! Thoroughly enjoyed my stay!
Everything is fantastic, more than worth!
Great communication, great location, clean and very well laid out. Angela and Cody were great hosts.

Angela was very accommodating. Place was very clean exactly as shown in the pictures. Neighborhood is nice and near to some restaurants. She even had some listings of take-away menu on the table.

Will definitely recommend to my friends who will visit Sydney.

It was great to meet Angela and be welcomed into her lovely home.  While it's not close to the city center (about 45 mins away via public transit), it's definitely close to the Airport (15 mins away) and the beach (5-10 min walk).  Uber or taxi is definitely the best way to reach this place from the airport though public transit can be an option if you have a lot of time.

Bring your strong arms as you have to take your luggage up to the third floor as they don't have a lift.  But, once you reach to her unit, you'll be rewarded with a great retreat.  The house is very clean and the room was spacious.  There's a big window besides the bed that brings in lots of natural light and there's even a TV in the room! Angela wasn't home the evening we stayed so we weren't able to converse more.  But all in all, my family and I had a very comfortable and enjoyable stay.

I am grateful to Angela for her help- I was in a rush to find a place to stay, and I am glad I found her home. She very swiftly communicated with me in regards to how to reach her home. What's more, she has a lovely, tidy, and clean home. Thank you so much for accommodating me at basically a moment's notice! Her home is not too far from the airport, which is best reached by car (I used Uber).
Very nice, clean and confortable, Angela was very nice. I did like the place.

The place is clean and cosy, I liked the  neighborhood and the bed is comfortable. You will have everything you need. Angela is a a very good host, she received us on the night quite late and was always easy to communicate with her, responsive to all my questions and give us some options to go around. You will enjoy your stay.

It was a very good stay at Angela's place. Angela was responsive and very kind to guide me the way to get to location. Place is at a good peaceful location yet with some very good views across the road. Overall a good stay!
I really enjoyed my stay at Angela's. Would strongly recommend.
Fantastic place! Location is excellent, and Angela is a great hostess. I really enjoyed staying there and would recommend it to anyone.
Angela and Coby were very accommodating and friendly. Thanks again.
Angela was fantastic. I was able to book at short notice. The appartment is close to the airport.  The room is very comfotable. Everything was great. Thank you angela
Thanks Angela, I will come again and again

Immaculately clean house and room. Great having your own bathroom. The bed was very comfortable and Angela was a great host and flexible when it counted. Also a great area close to beach and walking distance to shops and restaurants. You will be well looked after.

Stay here!!!!!! Great room. Service and communication was awesome. I arrived at the airport after midnight and still was able to get a response from her within minutes and room was perfect. Clean bathrooms are very important to me and her bathroom was amazing. Highly recommend it. Thanks again.
Just as advertised, room is spacious and Angela is good at giving instructions on everything. I recommend her place to anyone.
Perfect host, angela is adorable, everything is pleasant and perfect. we will come back
Ang was a brilliant host. The place is very clean and close to public transport and shops. Extremely happy with my stay and highly recommend staying at Angela's place for any person looking.

Angela's house was very clean and lovely 
It takes 10min to the airport
I never meet the host of the house. As we came late. I can say the place was awsome and angela service was excellent. It was very quite and comfortable.

One of the best Airbnb experiences yet! Angela is a wonderful host and definitely knows how to run an Airbnb. Just staying a single night between flights, it was super convenient for an Uber to/from the airport and Angela was very accomodating with a last-minute booking. Hope to stay here again and share more travel stories!
Excellent accommodation

Angela was a very welcoming host. She was available via txt msg to communicate about arrival any time. Fresh towels etc we're prepared, besides a key, local info etc. The room and whole flat were very tidy and clean. Angela was a nice host, would recommend staying here. The flat is good to reach with public transport.
I had a lovely arrival to the other side of the world with my stay at Angela's Such a nice friendly welcome with a lovely clean room to help fight the jet lag. Thank you Anglela

Clean comfortable room with bathroom right beside it for your private use. Friendly hostess who has provides a pleasant staying experience. Walking distance to transport shops restaurants and the beach.

Great location if you want to stay close to the airport and still have good access to the city center (direct bus just 200m away). The apartment is very nicely furnished and very well kept. The room is spacious and the bed very comfortable. Angela is a fantastic host and very keen to answer any queries and help out where possible. Definitely would stay again and recommend!

Angela was a great Host, very friendly and kind. It was the first time we used Airbnb and we had a problem with the booking but Angela called Airbnb for us and helped to solve our problem within 5 minutes. Thanks for that again :). The room was clean as shown on the pictures. My girlfriend and me stayed 3 nights. Reaching the beach just takes 2 minutes by foot.

Angela made our stay in Sydney very easy, she informed us well about the neighborhood, public transports, restaurants & everything we needed at her place. She couldn't be there upon our arrival but we communicate seamlessly through Airbnb. She also arrange us because we needed to stay for one more night and it didn't cause any problems to her.

Her place was very cosy & nice, so was our room, very bright with all the commodities you'd expect. The bed was very confortable and helps us beat the jetlag easily as we were coming from a 8+12 hours flight from France!

The location itself is great, I mean, you can walk to the beach in 5/10 minutes from foot! There is also loads of restaurants/cafes near the beach and you're like 15 minutes away to Rockdale station by bus if you want to go to the city center! The neighborhood is safe and quiet, perfect for families too! Angela lives with her son Coby, and they never bothered us so that won't be an issue at all if you were wondering! Either you want to live your life or socialize is up to you as they are really easy & respectful people! 

Me and my girlfriend enjoyed our stay very much and we would definitely come back again!
Lovely house and hosts. Great for overnighters close to airport
Angela was very kind and lovely lady. also her house was very clean and well equipped. I really enjoyed staying there. I would definately visit her again, and recommend to everyone. thank you Angela.

We were lucky to get the room last minute as we had a change of plans when we arrived in Sydney so it was a perfect place for us to stay for the night. Communication went really well! The room is nice and bathroom is super clean (so important for me:)) Thank you Angela!
Friendly host. Room has everything needed for a comfortable stay. Recommended.
Un tr√®s bon week-end dans un quartier tranquille  proche de tout, je recommande.

Stayed at Angelas very briefly for one night on way to Southern suburbs.  Place was easy to find and really close to the airport.  Rooms were nice and clean and modern.   Had a delayed late flight and Angela was very responsive and super easy to communicate with, and facilitated a late check in for me which was greatly appreciated.   Highly recommend this place :)

We crashed at Angela's place for a night. She was sweet and made sure we knew how to get around. There is a bus stop around the corner which made it easy to get back into Sydney. She is more than willing to explain how to get there.
Great place for travellers who are alone and looking for inner peace as this flat is very near to beautiful sandy beach. This is also recommended to couples who wishes to spend quality time together.
Very fast response and flexible with arrangements
the home was comfortable and clean.

I needed to find urgent accommodation and this was perfect! Angela was so quick to reply to all my questions and she was very patient and flexible with check-in and check-out. Very very clean place and a cool vibe in the house! It was lovely to meet Angela and her son, as well as getting to know their travel history a little bit. Will definitely be coming back.
Angela is very kind and reply the messages to us is quick. she ready for everything is awesome! Her house is tidy and clean. It's very comfortable. highly recommend!
A good stay
Very nice quiet and clean place to stay. Close to shops and airport. Would recommend. Thank you Angela, great host.

I needed a place to stay for the night before my morning flight and this was perfect! I took an uber for $17 and it only took 13 minutes. The place is huge and comfortable! I would definitely recommend
Angela's place was lovely, clean and welcoming. The room was exactly as described, the bed was comfortable and the shower was hot. Angela and Coby were lovely, friendly hosts.

I stayed 1 night. Angela's place is actually nicer than the photos. The beach is near and had amazing views. She let me use her phone charger because mine wasn't working and had breakfast available. The unit was very clean and fairly close to the airport and near shops. Angela was also flexible with my check out time. I would stay here again.

Wonderful home and lovely hosts! A beautiful location near to the hospital, beach and airport. Many restaurants within a 10minute stroll. Will definitely be staying with Ang and Coby next time I'm in Sydney!!

Angela and Coby‚Äôs home was superb. The entire unit was airy and bright, with a well decorated balcony, which was perfect for an afternoon glass of wine, and having a peek at my work emails. The bedroom is super quiet, which was perfect after a long day work. 
¬†
The place is a 2-minute walk from the beach, which is fronted by a terrific walking path if you‚Äôre keen for a run or long walk. The nearest train station is a short bus trip away, or approximately 30 mins walk. 
¬†
Angela was super friendly, and has a wealth of interesting stories about her world travels. The conversation even led us to discover we knew someone in common! Small world.

Angela's house was a lovely place to stay during my short trip to Sydney. Her house is spotless and neat, with everything you could possibly need to feel at home. In particular, the tissue box and folder of nearby restaurant pamphlets on the desk were thoughtful touches! 
The bed itself was comfy to sleep in and the room receives plenty of natural light. 
Breakfast and towels were all provided, and Angela and Coby are kind and considerate of their guests.  
Just a tip to keep in mind how big your luggage will be as there is no lift and you'll have to climb a few flights of stairs to reach her house. 
Overall a great experience that exceeded my expectations!

name: Fresh, Simple Sleep in Brooklyn!
summary: A budget traveler's DREAM! Queen bed, shared bathroom, subway access, and SEVEN YEAR/FIVE STAR Superhosts, all for a very reasonable price! Plus, 2 dogs to call your best friends for the duration of your stay :)
space: :) FIRST THINGS FIRST! :) Airbnb has a COMMUNITY VIBE. We invite strangers into our home and welcome you as family, while giving you the SPACE AND RESPECT you need on your vacation. As such, we have a few requests when inquiring so that you get a QUICK AND POSITIVE acceptance! 1. PROFILE: Have a PHOTO of YOU, along with a BIO to let us know a little bit about you! (Where you're from, what you do, etc.) Please, VERIFY YOUR ID! 2. TRAVEL: Tell us about your TRIP (travel plans TO NYC, duration, etc.) and any special requirements you may have. 3. AGREEMENT: Confirm you have READ THE TERMS of stay, POLICY on check-in and check-out, and the very few house rules. 4. GET HAPPY!: If we have the space and you've done #1,2,3, we WELCOME you gladly! Hosting people from the around the world is awesome and you've chosen the BEST VALUE anywhere! **** Our home is a BUDGET TRAVELER'S DREAM!! A peaceful oasis to crash at while you're out all day exploring the city. Easy subway access to Manhattan on two

Hosting people from the around the world
neighborhood_overview: About the NEIGHBORHOOD:::      The neighborhood is Flatbush, bordering Ditmas Park and Prospect-Lefferts Gardens. This is NOT hipster paradise, and it's NOT gangster's paradise either!  Our neighborhood is very residential and typically quieter than most urban cities. The summertime is louder on the block because very few people have air conditioning and enjoy hanging outside. The neighbors are friendly, so say hello as you pass! The ages of the neighborhood are very diverse (young children to elderly homeowners who have been here for 40 years). Flatbush has a lot of local charm and people with hearts of gold.  Jamaican food is plentiful (jerk chicken- yeah!); there is also a local donut shop nearby, Subway, Thai, sushi, pizza, and Indian food for delivery or a 5-15 minute walk to the restaurant, as well as many chain stores like Dominos, Dunkin' Donuts, IHOP, and Walgreens drug store. There is also a Planet Fitness (handy for Black-Card members!) Just a 10 minute walk down the road is
notes: **NOTE: Though our CHECK-IN and CHECK-OUT times are VERY FLEXIBLE, it is important to understand that many times, we have guests back to back.  CHECK IN: This means, if you are coming in on a red-eye flight and are arriving early in the morning, the previous guest may still be occupying the room until after we have both left for work meetings. As we work and are not a full-time business (just a couple renting out a room to meet awesome travelers), we may not be able to change the sheets and thoroughly clean the room until later in the evening, sometimes as late as 7pm. You are welcome to drop your bags at any time on Check in Day! This is usually no issue 90% of the time. CHECK OUT: Additionally, because of time constraints, we may ask  that you be packed up and OUT of the apartment on the morning of your checkout. You are always welcome to leave your bags, especially for those guests who have late evening flights (Who wants, or COULD, drag all that gear around?!). Thank you so much in
transit: We are located three blocks from the 2,5 trains at Church Avenue. We are also a 5 minute walk from the SBS 44 bus to Crown Heights, Bed-Stuy, Clinton Hill, Fort Greene, and Williamsburg. We are near B35 bus, which takes you across Church Avenue. The B,Q trains (south to the beach, north to Manhattan) are a mile (20 minute) walk away.
access: Use of the... -SHARED bathroom with tub and detachable shower-head -parlor/living room -kitchen to eat in and cook (we must show you how to use the stove and toaster oven) -occasional use of clothes washer and dryer  (once we give a briefing on the appliances)
interaction: WE LIVE HERE so we are usually home in the evenings.  Zach mostly works from home in the day, so he is available if guests are in need of anything, but mostly keeps quiet to himself on his laptop or in his basement studio. Christa works out of the home and is usually available via text messaging on What's Ap or iMessage for iPhone.
house_rules: - Most importantly to us, please take your shoes off before entering the apartment. - This is a non-smoking property. All smoking must be done at the curb due to asthma and allergies.  - Absolutely NO GUESTS who have not been previously approved through Airbnb reservation or in person. Please do not bring anyone into the house. - AIR CONDITIONING: This window unit costs a large amount of money for us to run, so we want to make sure we can afford to keep providing it. The room is rather small and well insulated, and cools down within 7 minutes of turning it on. ...Please, do not raise the level over 4. It should be cool in your room, not frigid, which would likely be about $10/day to run it (yikes).  ...There is no energy saver mode, so please remember to turn it OFF when you leave. ...Please keep your door closed at all times when the unit is in use. - Be courteous to other guests staying: leave the bathroom as you found it by cleaning up hair and any spills. Wipe the counter if prepar

host.host_about:
Wahoo! Celebrating over SEVEN YEARS of hosting over 2,500 people from dozens of nations! Yay!! Superhosts! Committed to giving you the best stay possible at an affordable price.

Chris:  Wishes she could live outside, 80% of the time. Happy, pleasant, and harmonious. Collects Christmas ornaments, and new plants. Married to an ambitious artist; cares for two sweet puppy dogs.
Loves...
- lists ;)
- miniature pigs, goats, chickens (I hope to have a mini farm one day!!) 
- to run, do yoga, and lift weights
- write
- sew 
- anything relating to the great outdoors
- gardening in our backyard and making our block even more beautiful
- flowers
- family

Zach: originally from Texas. Artist, likes cheese, his pups, and New York. Works from home part time, an adjunct professor part-time, a website manager part-time and as an assistant part-time, and loves to visit galleries and hear artists' lectures. Lots of odd jobs, and lots of hustle in this city, chasing our passions. 

We love helping people navigate the city by sharing useful tips and recommendations of places to eat and see! Hosting on Airbnb is a great experience, as we get to meet so many wonderful people from around the world. We love to learn about other cultures and share ours as well! 

We have over 1700 bookings in nearly 8 years!! We have met over 2,500 different travelers! What a great experience! 

In our minds, a great guest is someone who first feels welcome in our home, and treats it as they would their own. A great guest treats others as they want to be treated, and leaves a shared space just as they found it, if not better! A great guest doesn't hesitate to speak up when in need. A great guest knows we are human, imperfect, and not a five star hotel, but two folks just trying to do our best to give you the most comfortable vacation accommodations ever. 

When we travel on Airbnb, we strive to be these guests who make someone's home a better place! We hope to stay with you soon.

reviews.comments: Christa and Zach were very welcoming hosts. I enjoyed staying at their comfortable home with their adorable dogs. Both were very easygoing and considerate. Christa even baked cookies! They were very respectful of my space, but were also very easy to talk to, especially concerning our schedules and house rules. Their home was beautiful and clean. I felt at home in their house, and I couldn't have been happier with my decision to stay with them for a week. I recommend staying with them for any period of time, its a great experience!
I had a really good time in Brooklyn. Christa and Zach are very friendly and helpful. The room was clean, cozy and calm. Thanks so much again!

I liked Christa and Zach‚Äôs personalities.  They‚Äôre very kind and helpful. They tried to get me feel like my own home. Their dogs are very cute, I really liked to be with them and enjoyed playing with them  
My room was the same as I saw in the pics. There was not any lack in the room. Everything was clean and tidy. The room was just a little hot because of summer season. I think that that the room is warm in winter.  So, it is a good option for winter travelers and there is an air conditioner and a big fan for summer travelers. These are quite sufficient to cool the room. 
The house is in the walking distance to number 2 train (red line) to Manhattan direction. The station‚Äôs name is Church Ave. It can be arrived there 10 - 15 minute walk from the house. It takes 40 minutes from Church Ave to Times Square by train.  
I wanna thank this young couple for entertaining me in their sweet home. I think it is a nice and friendly place to stay.  I will get in touch with them for accommodation when I have a travel to New York one more time.
I really enjoyed staying and Christa and Zach's pad. It is tastefully furnished, close to the 2 & 5 train and a great price for NYC.  They are also really nice people.

I had a great stay at Christa and Zachs place! They have a really nice and comfortable home, also very clean. I enjoyed spending my time there and I also liked the neighborhood. Beautiful Prospect Park is very close and by subway you can get easily to Manhattan. There were also two very cute dogs in the house. 

Really helpful people, who make you feel like home. I can totally recommend this place!

Christa and Zach are amazing hosts. I've used airbnb a few times before but this experience was one of the best. They are truly kind and genuine and willing to help you out with whatever you need! Christa made sure that the temperature in my room was good and that I was comfortable at all times. They had the most amazing specialty bagels that they offered to me in the mornings and even got me cake the day I left! 
Their home is extremely clean and tastefully decorated. You get a very warm and welcoming vibe as soon as you walk in. Their dogs Ollie and Cookie are so cute and friendly as well. 
The location is a little far from midtown Manhattan (around 40 mins on the 2 train, the 5 train is faster but doesn't come as often). If you bring something to read for the ride it goes by quite quickly. I never had any trouble getting back at night on the metro but past midnight i would usually just cab home which cost anywhere from $20-$30 depending where in Manhattan I was.  
I really don't think there is a better place to stay for the price that you pay. I definitely would recommend Christa and Zach's place!

My stay at Christa and Zach's was awesome. Their house is beautifully decorated and super clean which is something I greatly appreciated. They are five minutes away from the subway and their line goes directly to downtown Manhattan, which is good for those who aren't familiar with the NY subway system. More than anything, though, I really appreciated their company. They are both very nice and friendly, respectful of your space but totally open to hanging out and getting to know you. Would I stay there again? In a heartbeat.

Christa and Zach were so attentive and courteous their home for me was warm and I felt in those walls at home. Though time we had not much talk, but the feeling of warmth , comfort and kindness never left me during all days. Always ready to help, tell them everything, help find the right routes, Christa and Zach will give you reliable and sensitive owners. Room is very cozy and very comfortable mattress. Dogs Cookies and Oliver will be always glad to you. But when there are no owners , you do not hear nor see. I have been offered Breakfast , although not included in the price.This is a very positive and sincere people.Come to him and you will not regret it.

My stay at Christa and Zach's was definitely quiet and relaxing.  I did not have the chance to meet Christa, but Zach was very nice.  I drove to their apartment and had no trouble finding a parking space.  Their place is very clean and quiet at night.  The bed was also quite comfortable.  If I get the chance I would stay again.

Crista and Zach made me feel welcome, and were great hosts. They made sure I had everything I needed. The room was just like the pictures- it was clean and comfortable. It really was a quiet, relaxing experience like they advertised.

One thing that I wasn't aware of until I got there is that the neighborhood is not ethnically diverse (I was the only asian around and got frequent glances) which made me feel uncomfortable. I think it is an ok neighborhood overall, but there isn't a lot of foot traffic walking down the street to their home. Since I was new to the area and stood out, I felt like I had to walk very quickly down the street from the subway to their house at night. I hope that helps!

Christa and Zach were great. I needed a place to crash and store my stuff while i ran around, and their room and house were perfect. They offered super helpful tips on navigating the city. Real nice couple with cool dogs. Would recommend

Though I wasn't able to stay at Christa and Zach's place for very long, they were extremely hospitable and accomodating hosts! They keep a very cozy and clean home that is located close enough to the subway to get to other parts of the city but it is still tucked into a cool residential area that offers up some great looking restaurants! 

All in all, I would definitely recommend this room for a solo traveler who is looking for a more "local"-esque experience, with plenty of accessilbity to all that NYC has to offer!
The hosts are really friendly and helpful.Their place is nice and clean and has everything I need at a modest price.

I had such a great time at Christa's and Zach's. They were so welcoming and helpful. The apartment is so lovely, nicely decorated and very clean. They provided a little guidebook for all the travelers that are new in the City and this was just so great. -I was happy to get some recommendations from real New Yorkers! ;-) Al in all I would totally love to come back and recommend to anyone who visits NYC to stay with Christa and Zach and their two little, supercute dogs!

Fantastic place to stay. Clean and tidy. Close to public transport. Christa and Zach are helpful and friendly too. 

Enjoyed my stay a lot. 5/5 stars would visit again.

It was a great experience staying with Christa and Zach! Cookie and Ollie (their cute and awesome dogs) are very welcoming! They were very helpful and gave me great advice about the city. They are great host and made me feel like I was at home all the time and made sure I was comfortable. The room was very cozy and clean.I highly recommend them!!

I was staying with Christa and Zach for more than a month (for my studying rotation). It was really a great experience. Despite being far from my family for such a long period of time, I felt comletly at home thanks to the guys' hospitality. It was especially a big pleasure to enter the house after a hard and exausting working day, to have a good conversation with Zach or Christa, to have some fun with two buddies (obviously, I'm speaking about the dogs:).
The house is very cozy, clean and well-decorated. I could find everything I needed for my entire month stay. The neighbourhood is completely safe - checked it at every time of the day:) A subway train will give you a pleasant ride to any attraction you need in Manhattan and not only there.
During my long stay there were a lot of guests who where coming for shorter periods of time and staying in the other guest-room, and everyone was really satisfied by everything.
If you consider coming to New York for any purpose - vacation, studying or business - this is definitely the best place to stay!

Christa and Zach are nice folks. Altogether a pleasant stay. 
Subway if very close and will get you to Manhattan in no time.
Recommended!

Zach et Christa sont tr√®s accueillants ! Leur appartement est superbe, tr√®s chaleureux et d√©cor√© avec go√ªt ! Leurs deux petits chiens Cookie et Early sont affectueux et en aucun cas g√™nants. Le quartier est desservie par deux lignes de m√©tro qui desservent une partie de Brooklyn et tout Manhattan, c est tr√®s pratique ! 
J ai pass√© un tr√®s bon s√©jour chez eux et le referai sans h√©siter !

I'm not even sure I need to add another glowing review to this list - the chorus makes it clear that Christa and Zach are great to stay with! I received a warm welcome, lots of assistance on navigating the city, and great company. Beautiful home, adorable dogs, friendly neighbourhood. The house isn't far from the subway and is in an area that always seemed to be populated so I felt safe travelling back by myself late at night. Go to Tom's for breakfast if you can!

I had a great time staying at Christa and Zach's place. Just before the trip, the nearest subway closed during the weekend. Christa alerted me immediately and gave me alternatives so I won't have to waste my time on the street and plan my day accordingly. Also the self made guide booklet they left in the room was very helpful. The room was clean and minimally decorated, perfect as a guest room. The entire house looks the same as in tho photo. Very bright. Most of all, Oliver the puppy was soooo cute. Had fun playing with Oliver. Overall, my experience was fantastic.

This was my second stay with Christa and Zach and it could not be better. Room looks exactly as it is pictured, very cozy and welcoming, bed is very comfy, and overall there is enough space for one. 
Shared bathroom has all essentials as well as your own place for toiletries. You can use kitchen to cook and keep your food in the fridge. Communication with Christa and Zach is at the highest level, you always know what to expect and Christa will give you all necessary advice and tips if required. 
The neighborhood is safe and it takes you around 40 minutes to reach Manhattan, we never had any problem taking 2 and 5 trains to come back even late nights. We would definitely stay again for the third time:)

Christa and Zach were very friendly and helpful. The communication was always great, the place was very clean and in order. They recommended places to go and where to eat. The experience was very pleasant and nice. Highly recommended.

My biggest dislike of Christa and Zach's place was that I didn't get to spend much time there. Christa was super accommodating with my last minute reservation. Their neighborhood had tons of parking, felt super safe and was right by a subway stop. Also, Christa and I discovered we were from the same hometown!

The room had an air conditioner, their bathroom was great and the rest of the place looked lovely. I highly recommend it.

I stayed at the single private room at Christa and Zach's for 6 weeks for my clinical rotation at KJMC. Overall I really enjoyed my stay there, Christa and Zach are wonderful and very considerate hosts. Love their puppies Cookie and Ollie! Very close walk to 2 and 5 subway lines. I always get breakfast at Dunkin Donuts on my way to the hospital every morning!

(Website hidden by Airbnb) Happy to report that it was exactly as described. Christa's notes and text messages helped me navigate efficiently to and from their place via the Subway and bus.  Its really hard for me to stay asleep and  yet I had no troubles falling asleep and sleeping soundly on the comfy bed.  I felt it was worth the $ and I would stay again.  Loved the rules so that expectations were set and followed for everyone.

This was my first time using AirBnB and it was exactly the experience I hoped for. Christa and Zach have a beautiful home and were incredibly hospitable hosts. I had just moved to NY and stayed with them for 8 days so Christa was very helpful in giving tips/advice about the city and my move. Their home is a quick four block walk to the 2 and 5 trains, and about a 30 minute subway ride in to the city. Overall, I recommend staying with them if you're looking to stay in Brooklyn, you couldn't ask for a warmer home to stay in!
Christa and Zack were very welcoming couple and the place was exactly as described. I liked the neighborhood and location was close to subway.

Christa and Zach were very welcoming and I enjoyed getting to talk with them. The room was comfortable and I liked their place. The house was smaller than I'd expected and had only one bathroom which can be a bit of a challenge with a full house. I found the dogs to be trying at times but that may be a personal preference.

The neighborhood is pleasant but has yet to be gentrified so there isn't much in the way of restaurants or coffee shops nearby so a subway ride is required if that's desired.

Excellent value for money! Christa and Zach were very friendly and made me feel at home, they even booked me a taxi on my last day to pick me up and take me to the airport. The bedroom was very clean, with a a very comfortable bed, a desk and a good size wardrobe to hide away suitcases and clothes. The house is lovely, modern, cozy and have a very well equipped kitchen. I definitely recommend.

Christa and Zach's place is beautiful and exactly as described. They were gracious hosts. Very friendly and welcoming. Always available to help and quick to respond. The place is close to the subway. It was great to be close to the park but I didn't care much for the neighborhood. Everything else was wonderful.

The apartment is very well situated in Brooklyn. Arrived a Friday evening and left Monday morning, was happy to be able to leave the car in the street with no charge. Metro was easy and only 5 minutes away. Had a wonderful stay. Room is not too big but was enough for me alone. Christa was very nice, and did all to make my stay comfortable.

Thanks Christa and Zach for a wonderful stay in your beautiful apartment in NYC! Great place, with a unique neighborhood vibe and close to the underground that takes you right into town. Love your little doggies :)

Christa and Zach were really friendly, helpful hosts and the room and area were just as described. As a female travelling alone I felt at home and safe in their neighbourhood and home. I would happily return!

Christa and Zach had been wonderful people who received me as i were in house. Nice environment, beautiful dogs and pure hospitality were what i found un that place. They offered you generously their home. They make me my holidays really perfect. Absolutely recommendable. A place of 5 starts.

Christa and Zach were so friendly and welcoming, their house was exactly how it was described if not better. I truely felt at home and had a great 2 day stay. I would definitely go back. Also their dogs cookie and olivier where great companions :-)
Stayed here for one night for an interview at Kings County. Great place, very clean, responsive, friendly hosts. Would recommend to anyone!

I really enjoyed with Christa and Zach, they are very nice and help me a lot, the apartment  is clean and the room also and they are very well organised host

they have nice dogs :)

I highly recommended them to my friends and family
The apartment and the room were exactly as described. Zach and Christa are great hosts. They were also very helpful in telling me how to navigate my way around the city.

I had such a great stay here. Christa and Zach were really nice and helpful. The room was clean, cute and cozy. Although it can get chilly at night I believe the heater is on. Their house is so charming! Transportation was easy and near. They had two cute little pups.  I Highly recommend you guy's to stay here for your trip.

Christa and Zach are great hosts! I really like this clean and modern apartment. The room is a little small but it's perfect for trips where you don't need to work at home. Also very NYC-stranger-friendly with close-by subway and a lot of indications from the hosts.

Zach and Christa were excellent hosts, the room and bathroom were very clean, I was not able to talked to them because my schedule was very tight. I definitively recommend this place of you are looking for a clean and warm place.

I really enjoyed my stay at Christa and Zach's place. The room is just as described and they so generously provide a lot of things for travelers that I feel that this is my own apartment! Christa made some cookies on the weekend and they were really good. :) I would recommend this place to those who prefer somewhere quiet!

Zach and Christa were great hosts! The house was clean, the puppies were sweet, and Zach and Christa were super helpful with giving me directions to get around and ideas on how to spend my day! Also, they left some great snacks beside my bed when I got there and Christa even made fresh chocolate chip cookies! Loved it!
Everything fine, Brooklyn area is ok, very beautiful house and appartment, I would recommend it. I liked the area, public transportation is near by.
I came and left quickly but they made my stay as smooth as possible. Excellent hosts!

Zach and Christa were fantastic host and their place was wonderful. I was looking for a place to get my feet wet in the city while I looked for a permanent apartment. I am so glad that I found Zach and Christa. They were more than helpful and accommodating with my work schedule. If you are looking for a nice place with wonderful people that is just a short train ride away from Manhattan this place is for you.
Chris and Zack are great as their place and their neighborhood. Totally recommend it.

I chose their apartment, because I wanted to meet American people as many as possible, and it was the right choice! The hosts were very very friendly and kind couple, and I enjoyed our conversations, too. I had a problem with my knee during my stay, and they gave me some tablets, which worked very well and also big pillows, so that I could rest my feet when I was in bed. I also should mention that their bed was very comfortable. (I often have problem with pillow, but their pillows were more comfortable than mine!)  I saw that they were trying to do their best to make their guests comfortable, and they were doing really well. The apartment was close to subway stations, too. I will definitely come back if I have another chance. I wish them a lot of good luck and success!!
I loved the place, the people and the dogs. I have no regrets in my decision, as Christa and Zach are honest with what they say to people in Airbnb. You can trust them.

I loved staying with Zach and Christa! We had a great deal of fun together and I appreciated the blend of privacy and welcoming that they provided. They have been my favourite airbnb experience thus far and their beautiful Brooklyn home is a very special place that I will remember fondly for many years to come.

Very friendly couple and cute doggies! Their home is very nicely decorated and looks just like it does in their photos. Supplying a continental-type breakfast was a nice touch that made it feel like an actual bed and breakfast :)

Christa and Zach make the whole process very easy and relaxed. It's a really nice street, filled with trees, and a nice single bedroom (though you'll need a sleepmask - it gets all the early morning light!) with plenty of storage and full use of their kitchen helps make it feel like home from home, as do the two dogs who run to greet visitors! You're a couple of minutes walk from the subway, and most of the everyday shops (groceries, bank etc) you could need are just round the corner. Takes a while to get to Manhattan, say, but there are plenty of hidden treats in Brooklyn to explore on the way. But above all my hosts were really helpful and understanding when I ran into some problems, for which I was very grateful. Strongly recommended as a friendly welcoming base if you want to see all the surprising beauty (try the botanic gardens) and places of interest in Brooklyn.

It was nice staying at Christas  and Zacks place. They prepared very detailed instructions on everything from how to find their apartment and best public transportation routes to nice shopping and dining places around. Apartment was exactly as on pictures. Room was clean and cozy. Would return there gladly on my next trip to NYC.

It was great experience for me to stay Christa and Zack room. They are very kind and provide me good information. They share the information of how to get Yankees ticket so that I could enjoy baseball game!
And dogs are cute!
I recommend they are great host!

An absolutely beautiful home and wonderful hosts Christa & Zac are! They were always on hand to help and make sure everything was okay as soon as I stepped into their home! A cozy and comfortable room and the subway is so near! Loved, loved, loved my stay and their two adorable dogs :)

After an oversight in booking a Airbnb room left me with no place to stay for one night in NYC I found Christa and Zach's listing. They were quick to respond, and very helpful in directing me to and from their place. The room and apartment are as advertised, and were more than adequate for my needs. Christa and Zach are pro Airbnb hosts, as indicated by their approval rating. I felt very welcomed in their home, and enjoyed talking with them. I highly recommend this listing and would gladly stay there again. Thank you Christa and Zach.

Christa and Zach were very nice and helpful. The house itself is great and the room is small but definitely enough for one person traveling. Lively neighborhood with lots and close to convenient subway stop. Only thing is it's not super convenient to take public transport to airports so taxi or √ºber is the better option.

Christa and Zach were very welcoming and extremely helpful. My flight was supposed to reach very late, so they left me quite a detailed message on how to reach the room! That was great. They had kept everything prepared with informative material about places to visit and eat at. In the morning, I was pleasantly greeted by the family, including Christa's parents and the two wonderful dogs. They made me feel completely at home, even when I was so far away! They helped with everything I required in the kitchen as well :)

The listing was exactly as shown in pictures, and as described; even better. The neighborhood was friendly too. Subway was close by, I would suggest, understand the exact routes by them and then your stay would be very easy ! 

Christa would come each night to talk about my day and give me suggestions about the next day. This was so great! The two dogs became very good friends, and after looking at so many places around the great city, I wanted to come back to them :). Christa made sure I was okay with the dogs, only then she allowed them to be around. 

The family was very helpful and friendly, and at the same time they provided the private space very elegantly. I loved that. 

I would definitely want to go back!

Zack and Christa were great hosts! I spent two weeks living in their place and they were extremely friendly and willing to help me with anything. I had just moved to the city and they helped me navigate my way around the city. Their apartment is lovely and I would definitely recommend staying with them to anyone who needs a place to stay!

Chrysta was a very nice host and accommodated my last minute reservation. The room is small and cute, however it was quite hot in the summer-- no AC or cross breeze and a bit loud with the window open.
Great hosts! Comfy bed and great apartment. Clean too. (Very important to me) The dogs are sooo cute. Thanks for the great stay!

Christa and Zach were excellent airbnb hosts and very deserving of their title as "Superhosts." They were both so welcoming and helpful. The room was perfect for a single traveler and was very comfortable and spacious.  I really appreciated that it was not too far off from public transportation and that it felt like it was in a relatively safe neighborhood. And I loved their adorable dogs! I would highly recommend their place to anyone who needs to stay in Brooklyn.

I am sorry to write this, but I didn't feel welcome, nor did I feel safe in the neighborhood....

But they have a nice appartement and the room is really good for one person..
It was very nice to leave with Christian and Zac. They have two adorable dogs. I got the family sense staying with them. Help this will help to make your decision

Everything was great at Christa and Zach place, the location was good, close to many things, the room and apartment was clean and comfy. I do really like my stay there. Sometimes WiFi didnt work 100% fine, but the rest was really nice experience. I recomend a lot.

Staying with Christa and Zach was a fantastic way to spend the evening before a move.   I had just driven all day, was exhausted, and while I would have loved to explore something local, I just wanted to crash.   I still couldn't help but be sociable and they were both very wonderful.    Many home improvements have been made here and its a very lovely place.   Incredibly clean, inviting, even their little dogs are adorable.   

It doesn't take a few moments to realize they are both very active in their community, they live on premise and don't just rent it out...  its really a home. 

The room I stayed in was on the small side, but for one person, you really don't need a lot, and it's all there.   Anything else, they drop what they are doing and tend to you.   I couldn't have asked for a more laid back simple and comfortable experience.

Christa and Zach have an amazing home, beautiful, clean and cozy. They welcomed me with fresh towel and bedding, maps and a typed up recommendations of thing to do eat and see in the neighbourhood/New York in general based on their personal experience. I felt like I was staying at a close friends home who just so happen to be resourceful native New Yorkers! Love them and thank you guys! Hope to see you again some time!

It was overall a great to stay at Zach and Christa's. Their dogs were adorable as well! I wasn't sure if the neighborhood was safe when I first got there but was assured that it was when I talked to two girls who were staying there also. The single room is small but sufficient for one traveller and the room is cool if you keep the windows a little open at night. Christa responded quickly when I had questions and was very helpful. I had to shorten my stay during to personal reasons and Christa gave me a 50% refund swiftly. It was a great first Airbnb experience and I recommend staying with Zach and Christa.

I almost didn't get to meet Christa and Zach because of our busy schedules we kept missing each other! But, when I finally did, Christa was nothing short of warm and welcoming and an instant friend! The fact that they had a keypad lock made it so easy for me and my schedule to come and go as I needed without having to deal with an exchanging of keys. The room and bathroom are cozy but were perfect for my stay. I definitely wouldn't stay there if you are traveling with a partner, but for one person its just fine. They were super close to the subway which made it very easy to get to Manhattan. I did have trouble getting an uber to their place the one time I tried, so if you prefer cabs this place might be tricky. I found the subway train very easy and as quick as a cab though. They also let me leave my bags there on my last day after my stay had completed so that I could go exploring around the city and not have to carry them until I was headed to the airport which was a huge weight off my shoulders- literally! I will say, the surrounding neighborhood wasn't as fun and interesting as I was hoping as far as any cool shops or eateries or the general atmosphere. Overall I enjoyed my stay. Very pleasant.

Great place to stay! Christa was super nice and gave me a spare weekly travel card, which she happened to have, for the subway once I arrived. The dogs were friendly and very cute! Trustworthy and safe place to stay, friendly neighbourhood! Strongly recommended!

I had a great stay at Zach and Christa's apartment. Christa provided me with extensive directions and advice about navigating the subway and NYC in general. The dogs were very happy and well trained and I looked forward to giving them a pet at the end of my day. Christa was also lovely to talk to and is extremely friendly and welcoming. Walking to the apartment at night seemed a little dicey but it's a quick trip and there are a lot of police patrolling. The subway access was also very convenient. Christa and Zach strive to accommodate any way they can and I would recommend their place to anyone!

J'ai pass√© 5 jours √† New York, ne voulant pas dormir √† Manhattan, je me suis dirig√© vers Brooklyn, et j'ai trouv√© ce superbe appartement dans un quartier tr√®s tranquille de Brooklyn. Christ et Zach sont 2 personnes tr√®s charmante et gentille.
La petite chambre √©tait propre et en bon √©tat, climatisation (oblig√©e en √©t√©), petit d√©jeuner et affaires pour la douche offert.

Je recommande cette chambre malgr√© le fait que ce soit √©loign√© du centre de Manhattan, compter 45minutes si pas de pannes. Mais lignes de m√©tro tr√®s proche de l'appartement.

Christa and Zach are wonderful hosts. They provided me with a plethora of information about transit options and places to eat. You can really sense their warm hearts, and It almost felt like visiting family. I would hands down stay with them in the future! You really can't beat the fair and honest prices either. If you're looking for a no stress and proper stay then look no further :)

Christa and Zach were awesome. I felt right at home from the get go. And their two dogs were friendly. The neighborhood would be scary to those used to suburban living but really it's an ok neighborhood even if walking home from the train at night. The room was small but not too small, the bed comfy and the air conditioning a welcome addition during the hot and humid days--which during my stay-it was pretty much every day. All in all a very pleasant stay. I hope to stay there again.

I had really good time at Christa& Zach's house.
When i think of the place to stay, the price and cleanliness, safe neighborhood are always important for me. 
Their house are all completed! 
It was so comfortable and nothing to say bad! 
on the first day, i actually felt scared about their neighborhood and i asked her. She kindly explained well and made me feel safe:) 
i would like to come back to stay for next NY trip. Thank you!

Christa and Zach are gracious hosts at their Brooklyn apartment.  The subway directions were concise which made it easy for me to maneuver from JFK and find my way easily to their place.  The room was as described, simple and for one person.  They made me feel comfortable to use the kitchen and living room space.  Their place is a few blocks away from the subway station and I found it easy to get to Manhattan and back, feeling safe at any hour.  I would definitely stay here again.
Lovely home, hosts and pets :-) Highly recommend.

My first trip to New York was one made even better by the hospitality of Christa and Zach! Although we didn't see each other much during my stay, it felt like I was coming 'home' each night after a long day exploring the city. Their home is adorably quaint and their furry kids sure know how to make their guests feel loved.

Thank you, Zach and Christa, for opening up your home! I can't wait to stay with you again! :)

tres bon voyage, la chambre √©tait exactement comme sur le descriptif, il ne manquait rien. Vraiment parfait pour un voyageur seul. Logement tr√®s propre et calme. Tr√®s bon quartier. Zach et christ a ont √©t√© des h√¥tes parfaits pouvant me renseigner lorsque j'en avais besoin. Ils sont √©galement tr√®s discrets
Un appartement dans lequel on se sent comme chez soi

I got there around 8pm and Christa was there to greet me. We chatted for a little bit and after that I got settled in. The room was very adequate for a single traveler, but would suit a couple easy enough. The bed was a full-size(maybe queen?) I think and comfortable. There was space for the small suitcase and the ability to hang/store items in the standing closet.

They provided a towel and washcloth which was very kind of them and some limited provisions in their kitchen (cereal) to get you going in the morning.

The neighborhood has food options, but the quality of Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn haven't made it down that way yet. So you're stuck with fast food and pizza for the most part. I ordered some pizza having delayed dinner, but I'd recommend finding some small snacks or eating elsewhere prior for dinner in particular if you're staying multiple nights.

The place was very nice overall and is easily accessible by subway or car. If and when I head back to NY, I'd definitely stay there again if I can find an open date!
Absolutely lovely apartment.  Extremely clean, all the amenities.  Hosts were wonderful.  Highly recommended.  Only bear in mind this place is 45-60 minutes from the usual places people want to go.

Christa, Zach and their dogs were wonderful hosts. They have a very clean and beautifully decorated place. I had an interview at SUNY downstate and their place was a convenient ten minute walk away. Would definitely stay again.

This was my first time in New York, and it couldn't be better with this good place to stay. It's a very clean house, and has everything you need to stay for a few days while visiting the city. I will surely look for this place if I go back to NY.

Staying with Christa and Zach was fun and easy. The apartment was clean and cozy, and I felt very much at home there. Although I didn't need much extra from them, they made me feel as if I could ask for anything. Their two dogs, Cookie and Ollie, were very well behaved, cute, and fun to play with. 

I was a little nervous when I first booked my stay as it was my first time staying at an airbnb. But with the tone of Christa's first email, I felt completely assured and happy with my decision. Christa, Zach, the two dogs, and their home fit the description on their listing perfectly. Christa and Zach were very honest and open, and I felt like they would have let me know if I did anything that made them feel uncomfortable. Likewise, I felt I could do the same with them, which is part of why I felt so comfortable there.

I talked with Christa a bit about living in NYC, especially in Brooklyn. As she has been there for over four years, she knows quite a bit about the city and gave me some good information.

The location was great -- only several blocks away from the subway. The neighborhood was good, and the people living on the same street were very friendly.

I would definitely stay there again when I go back to NYC.

Christa and Zach have an amazing space in a great area! Super welcoming and SO accommodating - instructions to the subway, things to do, apps that will help you enjoy the city to it's fullest - they seriously thought of everything! Bedroom (and entire apartment, really) was clean, the bed was crazy comfortable, and their locks make it easy to come and go as your please while feeling comfortable leaving your items in the apartment. Easily best experience using Airbnb to date.

Very easy to work with and genuinely cool people to be around, will definitely stay here again or refer to friends (and you fine folks reading this review!).

This was my first trip to US so I was quite worried and insecure but Christa‚Äôs messages calmed me down. She was really amazing and provided me a lot of useful information (thanks again for subway directions and taxi tips!). The room was recently refurbished so I was lucky enough to enjoy new large bed! The flat is really nice, cosy, comfortable and clean. The neighbourhood is quiet and safe. I would definitely recommend staying there and I would love to stay there again!

This was my first time in New York, and I had a great time in this wonderful place to stay. Christa and Zach have a clean, cozy, artsy house, and it has everything you need, intructions, directions, and security. Even though they weren't home I felt very comfortable there like my own home. It was a place that I needed asap and Christa and Zach repond fast, and answered me everything that I needed to know, and made me feel safe. When you are out of the house it's the kind Brooklyn panorama that you could imagine, I loved it. I had a lovely staying and I recomend it. I will surely look for this place if I go back to New York. 
Thank you!

everything is same or better than I expected!
It's my first Airbnb stay, and I feel we are lucky to have a great start.

Its an amazing place to stay in. It was less than a mile from where I interviewed in. Clean sheets, clean towels, and easy access to the subway and dining areas (<.5 miles). I feel secure walking around the neighboring areas and probably because there is a nearby police station too. I would love to stay at their place again.

I really enjoyed staying at Christa and Zack's place. They are incredibly nice,  humble people and great hosts. I felt welcome and the house was just like the pictures. Every part of the apartment was clean and the room I stayed in was perfect for one person, with a super comfy bed that made me the laziest guest they've had for sure. Safe neighborhood and close to the train stations. I recommend this place to anyone. Wish you guys a lifetime of happiness. 
:-)

Christa and Zach were great hosts! They were accommodating and their place is GREAT! I felt right at home. The bed was super comfy and it was conveniently close to the Metro for an easy trip to Manhattan. Most definitely would consider staying with them again!

I simply loved their place. It is exactly like in the pictures. Extremely clean and organized. We didn't get a chance to meet them but they were very good about co ordinating everything. They responded very promptly to texts whenever we needed anything. It's super close to the subway station so we didn't have trouble even when we got back late in the night. The house had all amenities that we needed and we throughly enjoyed our stay.

I loved staying at Christa and Zacks! The place is awesome, super clean and their preparation was impeccable! I had a few delays during my travels and they were fine with my schedule change. Would totally recommend this place to everyone!
Excellent hosts, everything was perfect! Thanks!
The apartment is beautifully decorated, the room is super cosy also! Christa and Zach made me feel really welcome and were very helpful.
Great place to stay at. Nice room very clean. Didn't get to meet the host. Very close to trains. My first time using air nb also would recommend to anyone to stay.

Great experience! Christa and Zach are the best hosts I know. You just feel like in home and they really take care about you, to give you everything you need and to make you feel confortable. The house and the bedroom are very beautiful and cozy. If you like dogs Cookie and Ollie are going to stole your heart. Thank you Christa for everything, definitely stay in your home was one of my favorite things arriving to New York.

I stayed with Christa and Zach for 6 weeks and it was just perfect. I felt at home from the moment I set foot into the apartment. It's clean and absolutely beautiful. Ollie and Cookie (the dogs) are adorable!

Christa and Zach, thank you for making me feel so welcome. I really enjoyed my stay with you guys and I was very sad to leave. I hope to be able to come back again! :)

Although the location is not familiar for travelers (the area is not beautiful, but so cheap for breakfast, or laundromat!
), the guidance by the host is very easy to understand, and I could arrived without lost my way.
When arrived, Christa (and cute two dogs!) welcomed me, and introduced the room. The room is well coordinated with good sense as seen in the picture.
I love the place, the host. I will stay hear when I visit NYC again.
Clean,comfortable, convenient , nice apartment , I will come back:-)

I have used AirBNB a handful of times, each time in NYC, and Christa was BY FAR my favorite host. She was very accommodating, made me feel like an old friend and was helpful in recommendations. The room was just as described and a very comfortable stay. I would definitely stay here again! :)

My short stay at Christa and Zach's lovely apartment was great. They are really warm hosts and their two small dogs are adorable. The flat has been done up with a lot of care and is beautiful and spacious, and although I had a small room it had everything I could need. The neighbourhood is safe with good transport links to Manhattan and elsewhere in Brooklyn via the subway. I'd definitely return and would recommend!

I arrived late in the evening, but Christa and Zach informed me in advance how to get there and to enter the apartment. The communication always was very good, even I didn't see them much (especially Christa ;-)). 
The room was like described, clean and nicely decorated. I liked the short manuell about the housesharing and tips for food, site seeing, public transport, etc. Bathroom sharing, storage of food or beverage in the fridge never posed a problem.

The apartment in Brooklyn was nice, clean and well furnished. The room was small but I didn't need anything bigger and it worked perfectly. The hosts were nice and offered breakfast for the mornings. Overall a good place to stay, and only about 35 mins easy subway ride in to central Manhattan.

Great Experience for me as a first-time airbnb user!
Easy Access to Manhattan
Clean Room, Nice Atmosphere and helpful Christa and Zach
I think I will come back in nearly future!

The place was very nice and exactly what I expected.  I only spent one night and found it  to be quiet and comfortable.  Christa was very helpful and provided excellent directions and tips related to the house and the neighborhood.  I would happily stay there again.

Christa and Zach are probably my two favourite hosts thus far! They are ever so accommodating and make you feel as if you are at your friends house rather than just a place to crash. They are always willing to answer any questions you have and are always up for a conversation. I could not recommend them highly enough!

Had a lot of fun here! Both hosts and the dogs were amazing. The room is very clean and has everything you need. The neighborhood is also safe, i didnt have to think about my safety at all.
The subway is 5 min by walkig away from there the connection to manhatten can take a while but i was aware of that. I also had nice talks with other guests and the hosts.

It was a pleasure to stay with Christa and Zach, they were great hosts! The house is in a good neighborhood and just a quick (5-10 minutes) to the metro. The room was very nice and clean, as was the rest of the appartement. I would definitely come back again :-)

Christa and Zach were so helpful before and during my stay. They made sure I knew exactly how to get to their place and what to do when I got there. They gave some great suggestions on local cafes and things to do around the neighborhood. I highly recommend staying at their place!

It was lovely to stay at Christa and Zach's place! Even though I had little time, I could get a nice Brooklyn experience, also due to the kind recommendations by Christa. It was a fresh, clean and simple stay and Christa was just great in also supporting me regarding airport transportation!

I love the hosts, Christa and Zach.  Very open & easy going.  Christa provides a lot of good information on the city.  Their space is cute!  A 2nd floor walk up is nice in a town like NYC.  The room is small but that's typical of the city.  The a/c unit was helpful.  Just one note to travelers:  there's only one bathroom that is being shared by you (and potentially someone with you), the host couple and possibly even 1-2 other guests for the other Airbnb room.  On my trip there were 5 of us sharing so in the morning especially there was a bit of a log jam but we were all courteous of each other's time which is important when you're wanting to explore a city like NY and factor in transportation time too.

The neighborhood is safe, lots of families, churches and shops.  It's a neighborhood with lots of islanders so awesome Trinidad, Jamacian, and Dominican/Haitian food in the immediate surroundings.  Also some great fruit markets I had fun exploring.  As a solo female traveler I felt safe.  

The 2 and 5 subway lines are just a few quick blocks away.  The closest neighborhood that is gentrified is called Franklin Ave, just 3-4 stops down in Crown Heights.  I also enjoyed hanging out at the restrants & shops there.

Overall I feel like Christa and Zach's space is a great value! I want to attend something at Kings Theater next time!  That's an awesome historical theater that's close to this spot.

I had a great stopover in NYC in no small part thanks to Christa and Zach. They answered all my transit and where to eat questions, and made me feel completely welcome. Enjoyed meeting the dogs, too. Beautiful living space, would book with them again.

Christa And Zach are a very nice hosts, they respect your space and your schedule. I Reccomend them for everyone who wants a quiet place to stay in New York. The Neighborhood was quiet and Safe, i walked around there late night and it was very secure. The metro station is very close, but where they live is little bit far for some places like the airports and Williansburgh.

This was the best experience I have had on air bnb so far! As a single female traveler (and a young one at that I'm 20) I felt incredibly safe. I felt so comfortable in their home. Thank you for having me!

This was my very first Air B&B experience.  Christa was very responsive when I reached out to her for directions to the apartment.  Overall it was a positive one.

This place is a gem spot in that block in Brooklyn. The rooms are small but super cozy. From the garden to ornaments, they all speak how much the hosts love their life. Except for Microwave, you can find pretty much everything you need. Christa and Zach are super friendly and their puppies are just beyond adorable! I enjoyed staying there. It feels like home.

I had a great stay with Christa and Zach - they have a beautiful home in a quiet neighbourhood, less than ten minutes walk from the subway station which is a short ride from Manhattan. They were both so helpful and made sure I got the most out of my trip. Will definitely be back!

Every aspect about my stay with Christa and Zach was perfect. Their home is very comfortable and is just a few minutes walk away from the subway. Their building is very safe, especially with the keyless entry system. Christa and Zach are lovely people who I really enjoyed getting to know, and their dogs are lovable and adorable too! I would definitely stay here again on my next trip to New York.

I was so pleased to stay in Christa and Zach's place as my first Airbnb experience. They provided useful NY manual and visiting the garden Christa told me was most relaxing time I could spent in NY. I was happy to meet 2 cute dogs too. I'll
Choose their place again when I visit NY next time.
The room was just beautiful as was the whole house. Everything is nice and clean an Christa and Zach are such nice an friendly people. I would return there anytime!!
Great hosts and great dogs. Felt right at home even though it was a quick trip.

Christa and Zach accepted my last minute booking. They are very nice hosts,  flexible and accommodating.  They made my stay very pleasant. Transportation is convenient with two express trains, and the neighborhood offers a variety of place to eat. I found parking easily.

This has been a very nice stay. Thanks to Christa an Zach. Indeed the dogs are very nice, too. Got very helpful tips and all questions have been answered immediately. Would definitely recommend the stay. Cosy and simple fits as perfect description.

I stayed here for nearly a week and always felt like I was at home. I'm glad I found this place, not only is it close to the subway, it's a nice and quiet neighborhood. Zach and Christa are very welcoming and nice hosts. Let's not forget their two dogs: Ollie and Cookie. For 7 days, I walked till I couldn't walk anymore only to come home to have two dogs greet and play with you. Zach and Christa also gives you as much space as possible which is a plus. As much as I came here to sightsee New York, sometimes the small rewards are the best rewards. I would definetly come here again. The house is nicely decorated and the room (window) I had was very comfortable. Highly recommended.
Christa was very communicative and helpful. Hope to have the chance to stay here again soon!

Christa and Zach were great! I didn't get to meet them in person since my plane was delayed and I often came back late after spending all day at a research conference, but they were very friendly and accommodating. They left a helpful guide in my room in case I wanted to do a little exploring and directed me to just about anything I might need! If you're coming through NYC for a short trip, definitely try to book with Christa and Zach!

Christa gave great instructions prior to arrival. The apartment was cozy and clean, as was the room. The information booklet in the room was super helpful, with tips on transportation, activities, and food options. The bed was very comfortable and their two dogs are so adorable! I would love to stay here again the next time I'm in the area.
Really nice room, sunny.

The room in Christa and Zach's apartment was really cute and perfect for a couple of days' stay. I was out and about most of the time, but they made me feel welcome by offering cereal and tea in the morning. They also had a very useful homemade guide by the bed, with useful directions and information for a newbie in the area. Unfortunately, I forgot to put this back before leaving the flat (so sorry!). Would def go back!

Exactly as described, a superb place to base yourself if you're visiting the NYC or Brooklyn area. In a friendly little neighbourhood only minutes from the subway and local shopping, I always felt welcome and safe, even walking home alone, after dark.

Christa and Zach are genuine, easy-going and good communicators; readily willing to share tips on how/where to come and go in the area. The keypad on the door made it a breeze too, after my flight was delayed and I arrived later than planned.

Highly recommended, would definitely stay again!

Christa and Zach are fantastic hosts! Such clear directions and helpful tips. They are there for support but let you be as well. Beautiful little house with the two cutest pups to cheer you up at night. I felt super safe as a single traveller and had everything I needed!

Was my second time staying with Christa, Zach, Cookie and Ollie, and it was just as good as the first.
Excellent value, welcoming hosts and a couple of super friendly dogs - their place is the perfect place to set up camp whilst you explore the five borough's.

This was a great stay especially for my goal of going to SUNY downstate medical center. It has everything I need especially a warm and comfy bed in the cold weather. Christa was easy to coordinate with, she gave me the iron and ironing board I need and was flexible with the check in and check out time, which was of great help especially after a draining day. Thank you again Christa and Zach for the great stay and cookie and ollie for being nice dogs.

Christa and Zach are both very friendly and helpful, and their place is just lovely. The house has a very warm feeling to it, and the room I slept in is perfect (most comfortable bed ever!). The apartment is in a neat and quiet neighborhood, very close to the Church Av. Metro station (trains 2,5), which makes it very easy to come and go. Highly recommended for a great stay in a great city!

I wasn't able to make my reservation, so I cannot speak to the quality of the room or location. I can say that Christa was very responsive with emails and tried to ensure that I had everything I needed upon arrival.
Very nice place to stay in between exploring the city
Great place in a nice location. Not far from Manhattan by train, and the Christa and Zach were extremely helpful.
I had a wonderful stay, Christa was so pleasant and helpful. Their place is very clean and comfortable. I would definitely stay there again.

It was a lovely stay at Christa and Zach's place. Their home was cozy and very clean, as well as being close to the subway for Manhattan. The neighbour felt safe and it suited well as a base for me to explore NYC. I would definitely stay again!
