reviews.comments: The Host made us feel very welcome , we were six of us. Everything was clean and spacious and the neighbourhood  was right in downtown with all the amenities and resturants. Although it rained we still had a good time.

The apartment was lovely and in a fantastic location in Montreal. 

Just as described. 

Kenny was welcoming and helpful. He made our stay very pleasant and accommodated our arrival and departure times.

We had the most wonderful experience at Kenny's spot! It's in an awesome location central in the Plateau and a quick 10-15 min drive or cab into downtown.

It is cute, clean and he leaves you towels and other nice additions that really make you feel comfortable! 

The property is set up through an entry code so no key exchange makes everything so seamless and efficient.

We will definitely come back to stay here again!

Although we didn't meet our host in person he communicated with us via text and promptly replied to any of our exchanges. We arrived in the evening and the lights and airconditioning were on for our comfort. Fresh flowers were on the table and the apartment was clean and stocked with all necessary supplies. The apartment was spacious enough for our family of six. Great location, close to shops, clubs, and restaurants. We would definitely come again.

L'appartement est tr√®s bien situ√©, sur le plateau du Mont-Royal, tout pr√®s des resto et des commerces.
Kenny √©tait tr√®s pr√©venant et a tout fait pour que notre s√©jour se passe bien.
L'appartement est comme sur les photos, avec 3 belles chambres et une terrasse.
Nous recommandons vivement.

Very nice place with three proper bedrooms and a sofa, kitchen and living room. There were four of us and we were perfectly comfortable. In a great central location, easy walk or short drive from many Montreal destinations. Kenny was very accessible. Thank you!
It's my first time in Airbnb, overall it is a nice house!

Kenny's Airbnb was very spacious and unique. Everything was clean and the location (Plateau) was really good. Close to many bars and restaurants without the noise and crowds of the downtown core of Montreal (which can be reached by foot in 20 - 30 mins or easily via subway)

Check in / check out was convenient using a keycode. The apartment had a dishwasher, AC unit, a washer, and dryer. There's also a TV box with Netflix, a nice added touch.

Provided free parking in the back of the house was VERY helpful. Finding parking in Montreal can be a huge headache.

I would definitely stay here again!

Cute place that sleeps 3 singles comfortably (although we were only two). Loved the quirky decor. There was coffee, sugar cubes and a French press which was nice. No hair dryer though, so ladies - bring your own. :)

Tr√®s bien organis√©
Rue cependant un peu bruyante
Very big space. The photos didn't do it justice. Has everything you need. Great location. Car space is a bit awkward.

Our experience with Kenny was wonderful.  Kenny was very quick to respond and helped us find an extra parking space for our U-Haul trailer which we had with us as we were moving our son into his apartment for the school year.  

The location is perfect, the apartment is large and I especially enjoyed sipping my coffee on the back balcony! Also, the free parking was fantastic for a small/regular sized vehicle. Parking may be too tight for a large SUV. The keyless entry was convenient, and the ac was welcome as it happened to be a hot and muggy couple of days.  Finally, we asked what we should do upon leaving and Kenny quickly wrote back "don't do a thing" and "good luck" to our son. It was a nice, personal touch.

It was great staying at the heart of Rue St Denis, just 2 blocks from the Metro. Having a parking space is an added bonus.  Airconditioning was great. Kenny was so thoughtful; she left bottles of water for us, which was a nice treat during the hot streak. The terrace was a nice treat. This is an awesome place for a family.

This property has a great location and unlike most in the area has a private (albeit small) parking spot in the rear alley. 
It has two terraces, one over busy St Denis, the other overlooks the backyard.
The parking spot is a bit hard to get in and out of. My full size car fit but I had to have my travel partner guide me when leaving the spot. 
Coffee and bottled water were on hand and a nice touch.
The Metro station is very close.
I think it would be tight getting 6 people to fit comfortably. One bed is pretty small, 5 would be more accurate.
The free WiFi was fast and reliable.
Host was very responsive with emails arranging how to access the apartment.

Great place to stay!  Very clean and was in a great convenient location near all the bars and restaurants and a metro station.  It was very quiet, so you don't hear anything from the outside.  I would definitely stay again and recommend it to future Montreal travelers!

We had a great experience for our first time  at an Airbnb.  We really enjoyed our stay, and the location was wonderful.  The rooms clean, and the place had a cozy feel to it.  We would definately repeat.
terrific place in Montreal.  great location.  clean and comfortable.

Kenny's apartment is a great place to stay in Montreal. Like others have said, it's in the heart of great neighborhood, Plateau Mont Royal, and right around the corner from a metro station. There are multiple great bars and restaurants (including a bistro called Cafe Cherrier and the famous L'Express) within just a few minutes' walk.

We were a group of four and the apartment fit us very comfortably. The rooms are spaced pretty far apart for privacy, which was an added bonus. The bathroom is large and the water pressure in the shower was excellent (it's a pet peeve of mine when pressure is low!).

Kenny was extremely responsive -- he answered a bunch of my emails before the trip and a couple I had while we were staying at the apartment, most of them nearly immediately. 

I would definitely stay here again!
Great
Kenny's Place was very clean, what we expected and she even let us come back when we forgot our trays the next day. We would definitely stay here again.
The apartment was entirely adequate. The location was very good; three minutes to the Metro and bus stop outside the front door. The street scene was quiet as was the apt.

The place is located in a great neighborhood, right on the Plateau and not far from the hip Mile End neighborhood. Many nearby places to eat or go out. The apartment itself is very nice, comfortable and quite large.
Kenny is an excellent host, great communication and accommodating. The apartment is located in a hip neighborhood and very comfortable for 6-8 people.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Mona Lisa Apartment was just like the pictures and very charming! The Da Vinci theme was not lost on us... I loved the "last supper" on exposed brick.  Rooms were clean, bright and as pictured. Our host communicated beautifully and we were happy to find our accommodation in a new city with surprisingly little stress!
Private parking, laundry, two lovely decks, near bistros, across street from lovely cafe with the best croissants and cafe ole' , metro very close, 1.9 mile easy walk to Old Montreal, park nearby, ... We loved it! We will be back.

L'organisation entr√©e/sortie est tr√®s bien. Nous √©tions peu pr√©sents dans le logement (cuisine non utilis√©e), d√©couverte de Montr√©al oblige!
Le logement est bien d√©crit dans l'annonce. Construction tout en long. Bien situ√© pour d√©couvrir Montr√©al... sympathique Caf√© situ√© juste en face.
Un b√©mol sur le nettoyage de la salle de bain et en particulier la baignoire... Mais √ßa se corrige.
Bon rapport qualit√©/prix. Pas de contact visuel avec Kenny, communication par mail... Code d'acc√®s pour le logement. Merci de nous avoir permis de laisser nos bagages apr√®s 12h puisque nous avions un avion en soir√©e.
Lejligheden er hyggelig med god plads til 5-6 personer, god beliggenhed i sk√∏nt kvarter, parkeringsplads og lille altan.

We had a lovely time here. The apartment was huge, super spacious with two balconies and everything you need for a home base in Montreal. Kenny was super fast on our inquiries, and parking/checking in were a breeze. The location is great, with lots of awesome restaurants around, and the park not too far away. Would highly recommend. Thank you Kenny for the great stay!

The Monalisa is a fabulous place to stay in Montreal. It's location is smack in the middle of a vibrant neighborhood with lots of shops and restaurants. It's a quick walk to wherever you want to go and the metro. Inside there is lots of space to stretch out. We were three people and never felt crowded. The bathroom is nice and the shower had plenty of hot water. Overall a good choice for a weekend in the city.

We had a great weekend at Monalisa! It was the perfect location for exploring the neighborhood and whole city. It was convenient for transportation and even had a parking spot. I would definitely recommend staying here.

Avec une arriv√©e tr√®s tardive, Kenny a √©t√© tr√®s compr√©hensible et donc nous avons pu rentrer dans le logement sans aucune difficult√©. L'appartement est conforme aux photos, grand et tr√®s bien √©quip√©. Proche du m√©tro, et tr√®s bien plac√©, il est id√©al pour les personnes voulant visiter la ville. Merci beaucoup Kenny, nous avons vraiment appr√©ci√© notre s√©jour √† Montr√©al.

The apartment was great! We loved the location and Kenny answered all my questions very quickly. The space was clean and lots of space for us. It was great having the items needed to make coffee and a quick breakfast before heading out for the day. I would highly recommend this listing.
Kenny's place is amazing :)  It is right next to plenty of great food, bars and shopping.  It's very cozy and easy to access with parking in the back and the metro down the street.  Thank you Kenny!

Basic apartment on 2nd floor of an old, 2nd Empire residential building. Front and rear porches. 3 nice bedrooms plus a sleep-able sofa & a spare queen mattress.

This place can easily accommodate 8 with a good measure of privacy.

Shops all around for basics & beer plus some lovely cheese shops and bakeries.

Great location.

2 Parking spaces in rear.
Liked every bit of the place. Was very warm and very close to amazing places.
Nice flat ideally situated in the hearth of "le plateau" 2 mn walk from montroyal street and tube station. Convenient to park a car. Kenny was very nice and helpful !
Place was great to stay at! Kenny is very accommodating and the space was great. Beds were very comfortable and clean. Cute neighbourhood and lots to see on foot, we did not use our car at all.

Kenny's place was perfectly situated, just a 3 min walk from the metro and right across the road from a cute coffee shop (with lots more great restaurants, bars, and shops within walking distance). Kenny was very quick to respond to questions and provided info clearly. We liked that the apartment had Netflix already set up, and the kitchen was well-stocked with utensils if you want to save some money and cook for yourself. Bring your own food staples though, (salt, sugar, butter, etc) as there was no food in the apartment. Parking spot was easy to find, and we enjoyed the general feel of the place (brick walls, a good amount of light, big stack of clean towels). Our only real complaints were first, that the apartment is listed as 1.5 bathrooms, but there was only 1. As there were 4 of us, this wouldn't have been a deal breaker but we would have liked to know what to expect ahead of time. And second, the bed in the back bedroom was not very comfortable (front bedroom was fine, and no one slept in the middle bedroom so I can't speak for its comfort level). All in all, I would recommend Kenny's apartment, I do wish we'd come during the spring or summer months to enjoy the two private balconies and backyard!
La situation g√©ographique est id√©ale.  Les lits sont tr√®s confortables.

Fantastic location with lots of nice restaurants and shops, all in walking distance. Warm homy feeling and a family of 6 fits comfortable, I would definitely stay there again.

good

Very well located apartment. Nice 3 bedrooms and large living space. Check in and check out are very easy! This is my second time at kennys place and it's great!
Wonderful place! Big, clean and comfortable. The location is next to lots of  restaurants and bars. I will definitely come back.

Magnifique appartement id√©alement situ√© et avec une place de parking

Montreal Monalisa was everything that was promised: well located, clean, comfortable and with parking at the back. Check-in was super easy and Kenny was an attentive house, getting back to us quickly with any questions we had. We'd be happy to stay there again.
Clean, nice And cozy in great location!

Nous √©tions trois coll√®gues et l'appartement se pr√™te tout √† fait √† cela. Trois chambres individuelles avec une salle de bain √† partager. L'emplacement sur la rue Saint Denis est excellemment situ√©, proche des commerces et restaurants  et du m√©tro Laurier et Mont-Royal.
Attention si vous venez de France, il n'y a pas de prise adaptateur, il faut venir avec mais il y en a au magasin la Source sur la rue Mont-Royal et probablement √† plein d'autres endroits.
Pour faire la cuisine, il y a peu de vaisselle mais pour nous qui ne l'utilisions tr√®s simplement c'√©tait suffisant.
Les chambres sont spacieuses avec une bonne literie. Nous ne rencontrons pas physiquement Kenny mais elle est tr√®s r√©active et r√©pond √† toutes nos questions  pendant le s√©jour. Un petit soucis avec la porte d'entr√©e et son papa est l√† en 5 minutes. Il est tr√®s tr√®s gentil et arrangeant.
Bref un tr√®s bon s√©jour avec un bon rapport qualit√© prix.

The apartment is very good! I was there with my family (4 people in total) and we had a very good time. Close to cafe and restaurants, mont royal park and little Italy, the flat is also close to public transport and underground station. Communication with Kenny was precise and super easy.  I would like to repeat the experience in Montreal and I suggest to everyone this flat!

Kenny was a great host. The apartment was very clean, as expected. We had an issue parking where a guest staying in the other unit occupied 2 parking spots..which forced our car to get very close to the neighbours spot. I sent an email to Kenny and she contacted the other guest and got the parking situation resolved very quickly.
The host canceled this reservation 116 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Kenny's place was such a great decision! It's right in the heart of Montreal. The rooms were kept clean and tidy, and the apartment as a whole was so quaint! It was perfect for 6 people. The parking space was helpful for anyone driving up, no need to find street parking. Kenny was very quick to respond to any questions I had! Definitely would recommend.

Great location, with a parking spot smack in the middle of all the action. Many good choices for food, coffee, cocktails and enjoyment less than 5 minutes walk. The checkin process was super easy and Kenny was very quick about getting back to me about any questions.
Convenient location and plenty of space, all worked out well.

There are a number of good things about this apartment: it's is in a great location, it has three bedrooms with good sized beds, the use of a private parking place is very helpful, and the wifi and hot water worked fine.

However, I expected something more upscale given the cost. We had water dripping inside the window when it rained at night, entry systems that stopped working (and some confusion over who to contact about that), light switches in odd places, one loud air conditioning unit for the whole apartment - a number of glitches. 

The apartment definitely worked for us during our four night stay. But there were a number of issues along the way.

this was a great option for a decently-sized group of people looking to explore montreal on a budget; there is plenty of good-enough bedding (seems like there is at least one additional spare air mattress and couch space, if your party is more than 6 people). the location is stellar (walkable to many areas of interest, with good restaurants), and the check-in situation is hassle free.
Overall Kennys great place. Only suggestion would be for the tub, not a big deal but could use slight improvement.

A lovely place in a great location. I especially appreciated the small balconies in front and back, where we enjoyed our morning coffee and our evening glasses of wine. Only issue was with sheer curtains. You had better be prepared to get up when the sun does!
Average stay. Nothing outstanding.

Great location and nice light inside the house thanks to two skylights.  It's fairly quiet inside though the front bedroom gets some traffic noise from the street -- but nothing that would interfere with sleep as long as you're used to living in a city.

One thing to note is that the apartment is on the third floor and the rear staircase is somewhat precarious.  You might want to get a street parking spot in front of the house first to unlock the door and unload large items, then move the car to the dedicated parking spot in the back.  Otherwise it takes a minute or two to walk around the block from the back to the front or vice-versa.

A minor annoyance is that all the drains have fine mesh filters on them that get stuck very quickly.  We ended up having to clean out the bathroom filter pretty much every night.

Contrary to the description, the apartment does have a hair dryer, but did not have shampoo when we visited.  There's a drugstore across from the metro station if you need to pick anything up.
Nice apartment in a great location. Lots to see and do nearby and a great space to stay with a group of people. We would definitely stay here again.
The place is adequate. Very well located. Very comfortable, it is a 3 bedroom apartment!!! full kitchen. Kenny was very kind. I recommend this place.
Awesome place, Parking spot in the back and close to downtown.
Great location, great apartment with lots of room, Kenny was very helpful. Woudl definitely book again.

The space was awesome or our needs - really spacious with three bedrooms and an additional mattress. Very close to Mont Royal metro station. Exceptionally fast response to all communication - and very clear instructions. Only complaint is the air conditioning unit is just not sufficient for the space on a super hot day. First night was exceptionally uncomfortable - slowly got better as the nights after were much cooler. Really enjoyed everything else though and would recommend.

Very well situated near the Mont Royal tube station, with lots of restaurants and nice shops around. The street facing room gets very noisy because of traffic, but the other two are nice and quiet. The flat is well equipped and friendly. Kenny responded timely and well to all our requests. I'd go there again.
Bien plac√© et parfait pour une famille avec 3 enfants .
Location, location, location! Walking distance to bars, cafes and restaurants. We wished if there was a coffee machine, but was never a issue with a great cafe just across the street!

We had a very nice stay at Kenny's apartment.  He was very responsive via email and was able to accommodate a slightly earlier check-in for one of our guests.  

The apartment was in a nice location and well suited for a group of 3.  Would return to Kenny's apartment.
The host canceled this reservation 45 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Logement tr√®s bien plac√© avec 3 belles chambres. Contrairement √† ce qui est √©crit dans le descriptif, pas de t√©l√©. Il faut appeler pour avoir le code wifi.
Logement qui m√©riterait d'√™tre entretenu par l'h√¥te, notamment pour la partie nettoyage....attention rien pour cuisiner, pas de casserole, pas de saladier, m√™me pas une planche √† d√©couper.

I have no doubt this was once a beauty (whenever the pics were taken). However, the host admitted that the space had been rented to a long term tenant and the evidence was everywhere...from cig butts left both inside and outside as well as drug paraphernalia left behind. Floor obviously had not been mopped in quite some time and it smelled of smoke. There was no tv (although it was in listing) and the smoke detector was not in working order and was not addressed when pointed out. Old linens were left behind but removed when requested due to smell. As well, the dishwasher was plugged into an extension cord, which was plugged into wall and would trip breaker when turned on same time as ac. On a positive note, location is great, ac worked and beds were comfy.

The monalisa apartment lies in a wonderful neighborhood, with parks and the beautiful mount-Royal on one, and the vibrant quarter of mile‚Äôs end on the other. It‚Äôs close to the subway and is thus a good choice for every explorer. The inside of the home is pretty as well, even though it would benefit from a bit of refurbishing in some places. The host is incredibly fast in responding and very helpful though, so that was never much of an issue. All in all, i can recommend it for families.

Logement tr√®s bien situ√©, propre et bien entretenu.
Bonn qualit√© de service incluant climatisation et le wifi

Great location on busy road but noise not an issue. Lots of bars and places to eat in walking distance. Close to subway. Slightly tired decor but clean and functional and good value for the city.
Good value for the price. The space was comfortable, the location was fantastic and communication with the host was very easy.

Montreal Monalisa is located in an ideal location. Very close to the metro and restaurants. The outdoor terrace near the kitchen is a lovely place to have breakfast. We found the unit clean. 
Some observations. We saw 2 smoke alarms in the hanging basket. Not quite sure why they were there, but any future guest should ask about this. There was no toaster. Not quite sure if this was an oversight or are there electrical issues. They did have a portable air conditioner which provided enough cooling for the main area, but the bedrooms were warm. One of the fans did not work and another did not function as well as it should . There was not a third one.  An unusually warm time in Montreal, there needs to be better air flow in the bedrooms, which means three well functioning fans. Light switches were hard to find and some of the lights did not work. 
The main complaint is that they listed as an amenity, a parking space. This is not true. Fortunately, the manger was there when we arrived and very graciously got in my car and helped us find a public parking space that was good until we left. Public parking is very difficult in this neighborhood, so be aware that this could be a problem.

L'appartement est bien plac√©, juste √† c√¥t√© d'une station de m√©tro. Par contre, si vous comptez sur le parking, sachez qu'il s'agit d'une erreur et que garer votre voiture est tr√®s compliqu√© √† Montr√©al.

reviews.comments:
I stayed in this House during the last week. Marc's house is really amazing.I really like the space. It was really clean and it was all brand new. 
For a week, I didn't feel at all uncomfortable. Marc was very kind and I was able to get in touch with him quickly.
I strongly recommend this House.

Marc proved to be the perfect host! Before arriving and during our stay he responded quickly to all requests. Waiting for us in front of the apartment when we arrived, giving us "the grand tour" of his place. Even managed to get a technician to fix the wireless internet within a few hours (not his connection but something wrong on the providers side)
The fully equipped apartment was newly renovated. Everything being brand new made the stay even more comfortable. The pictures in the add are very true to how the place is. 
We can safely recommend Marc's place to all types of travelers it be business or pleasure.
Excellent apartment in a beautiful area in Barcelona. The apartment looks just as in the pictures. I would definitely stay here again in my next trip to BCN.
Tr√®s bien. Moderne et tr√®s bien √©quip√©.

La casa fue el condimento perfecto para disfrutar de Barcelona al m√°ximo. Realmente es hermosa y la ubicaci√≥n es genial! Gracias a Marc y su hermano por la buena predisposici√≥n y hospitalidad. Volver√≠a sin dudarlo!

Marc was extremely responsive as we were on our way to the apt. He was waiting for us upon arrival. He provided a thorough walk thru of the apt, showing us where everything was and how things worked. He kindly answered all of our questions about areas to visit, places to eat and options for getting there including highlighting items on a city map provided. The apartment itself was exactly as pictured. It was recently renovated and every aspect was redone beautifully with quality finishes throughout. The location was perfect as it was on a quieter street that offered a real neighborhood feel. We took advantage of the multiple restaurants right outside the front door as well as a supermarket 3 minutes around the corner.
Would love the opportunity to stay here again when in Barcelona!

Marc was a wonderful host who was very helpful with orientation of the apartment and the city. We emailed a few times with requests or questions and he always responded quickly and gave great advice- much appreciated. The apartment was spacious and very adequate for a 5 day stay. Everything you need was provided and worked well. The location was good for all the central activities with just a few block's walk to Place de Catalunya. Supplies were easy as there's a supermarket on the corner and a few bars and restaurants closeby. The restaurant next to the apartment was excellent. Light sleepers might hear early traffic but this won't detract from a wonderful stay. Would return and recommend. Thank you Marc!

Terrific flat in a great location.  Nicely decorated, updated and clean. 

We enjoyed walking to most of the sites that we wanted to visit.  The shop next door, Pirineu en Boca, is a good place to shop for food items and there are several other good shops and cafes at the end of the street. 

Marc was a wonderful host and met us upon our arrival, which was delayed due to our flight. Upon check in he shared information about the neighborhood, restaurants, and instructions for washer/dryer, etc.  He was also very prompt in responding to our questions via text.

Would definitely stay again.

Excellent location and wonderful newly renovated apartment. Retro modern style, very well done. Marc is a wonderful host and had great suggestions for restaurants in the neighbourhood. 
We truly enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again!

I will definitely recommend Marc's apartment on Girona street. The location is superb for either Passieg de Gracier and the Gothic area (around 10 mins walking). There are some local pubs and a supermarket just on the corner which make us feel convenient for the daily life. The apartment itself is decorated in a modern and comfortable manner. The furnitures are all brand new, my friend and I have had a wonderful vacation in Barcelona! We also thank Marc for his flexibility on the check - in time.

Host very welcoming and great to have local knowledge. Marc offered lots of suggestions and enthused about Barcelona. All very good - lovely modern apartment with retro feel. Walking distance to all the sights.

A beautifully appointed, immaculate and comfortable apartment. Conveniently located to everything. We would recommend it to anyone we know coming to Barcelona, without hesitation. Everything was perfect, with excellent communications by Marc prior to our stay, and Marc is a charming and considerate host. We would absolutely stay again. Hopefully one day soon!
Excellent apartment!And Marc is so helpful and friendly.Nice trip in Barcelona!
Marc is very friendly and quickly response to our requests. Everything is newly remodeled with high-end appliances. Location is easy to access all the attractions. Highly recommend!

An EXCELLENT airbnb. Felt like a HOME. Great location next to shops, bars, and restaurants and a quick 10min walk to the great El Born neighborhood and the old town. Great communication from Marc on check in and check out. The ONLY downside I saw was the firmness of the bed. Pretty firm bed. Overall one of the best airbnbs I've ever stayed in.

name: Chic 2BR in Festival Quarter by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the beautiful panoramic windows, sleek decor, and fully-equipped kitchen. Located in the Quartier des Spectacles, known for the renowned Contemporary Art museum - Place-des-Arts, you're close to an array of wonderful local shops and restaurants.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials‚Äîeverything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the beautiful panoramic windows, sleek decor, and fully-equipped kitchen. Located in the Quartier des Spectacles, known for the renowned Contemporary Art museum - Place-des-Arts, you're close to an array of wonderful local shops and restaurants. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials‚Äîeverything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we‚Äôll leave you to enjoy your stay. There's plenty to offer within walking distance. Try Bouillon Bilk or Restaurant Boustan for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping, head to Rue St. Catherine and take a stroll along the storefronts. To explore the rest of the city, head to the Saint Laurent metro station.  Quartier d
neighborhood_overview: There's plenty to offer within walking distance. Try Bouillon Bilk or Restaurant Boustan for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping, head to Rue St. Catherine and take a stroll along the storefronts. To explore the rest of the city, head to the Saint Laurent metro station.  Quartier des Spectacles was designed as a center for Montreal's cultural events and festivals, with world-class entertainment taking place year-round in Place des Arts. The area is a great starting point to explore the city. It‚Äôs within walking distance of Chinatown, the Old Port, the Plateau, Downtown, the Village, and metro lines.
notes: This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Drivers can find free and paid parking options nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we‚Äôll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.host_about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

As well, the smoke detector was off the wall and not working when we arrived, but I received a prompt reply via email from Sonder with an offer to fix it ASAP. Overall a good place to stay in downtown Montreal.

neighborhood_overview: Poble Sec is a neighborhood with a rather special character, very different from the rest of Barcelona. The streets of Blai and Plaza Del Sortidor are the main streets, where you can find many bars and spectacular restaurants. In addition, it is next to the Paral¬∑lel Avenue and Montjuic, two areas with lots of life and where you will find monuments and museums that you should definitely visit.
transit: Public transport in the area is another plus. The room itself is not huge but it is comfortable and the place was clean. The flat itself is located in Poble Sec which is a very nice area with a lot of bars and restaurants, close to the busier areas of Raval and Gotico but has still not been invaded by all the tourist masses. One thing to keep in mind is that the flat is on the top floor which you can only access by stairs. We didn't mind the extra exercise but someone else might! Added bonus is that the flat is also shared by a lovely older cat and a tortoise. I would recommend Montse's place to anyone travelling to Barcelona and wanting to get an affordable place in a good location, great value for the price!

host.host_about:
Bonjour!

Je suis biblioth√©caire et √©tudiante √† la maitrise. J'habite un joli 5 1/2 en plein coeur d'Outremont, √† deux pas du Mile End, √† proximit√© de caf√©s, boulangeries, restaurants et du fameux St-Viateur Bagel! Une station de M√©tro est a 5 minutes de marche. 

Je serai pr√™te √† vous guider vers les endroits gourmands int√©ressants √† Montr√©al et peux tr√®s bien vous assister dans vos recherches (c'est ma sp√©cialit√©) de trucs √† voir.

Je travaille le plus souvent de la maison, sur mon m√©moire.
Voyageurs d'affaire bienvenus!

-----

Hello!

I'm a librarian and master student. I live in a cosy 5 1/2 in the heart of Outremont, close to Mile End and the famous St-Viateur bagels. On the street you can find caf√©s, bakeries, restaurants with terrasses. The closest subway station is a 5 minutes walk away.

I can surely guide you and help you find any activities you'd like to do while in Montreal. I mostly work on my thesis from home.

reviews.comments:
Centrally located apartment in a really nice, lively area of Montreal. Very welcoming host. Isabelle was SO thoughtful. She offered a disposable kitty litter and catnip for my cat, who quite enjoyed the stay too! 

The room (and apartment) was SUPER clean and came with everything from a bathrobe to shampoos and soaps to even - and this one impressed me a lot - a PRAYER MAT. For people who need one to pray! I had NEVER seen anywhere think of providing so simple and obvious an amenity before, not even expensive hotels. It shows a level of empathy that she continued to demonstrate during the whole 10 days I stayed with her. 

She's a good conversationalist and also very capable of resolving conflict calmly, which is good since there are bound to be toes stepped on when two strangers decide to live together for several days. 

All in all, despite some minor awkwardness, I'd say that I had a nice stay and would recommend Isabelle's company and hospitality to anyone wanting to find low-price high-class accommodations in Montreal for a brief time.

the host: Isabelle is a fantastic host. She is direct, easy going and fun with a great  sense of humor ( to the extent of comprehending and appreciating mine. lol). It was easy to communicate with her and we had some interesting exchanges. A brilliant conversationalist who have an interesting opinion on the surrounding world.
the place: The room has all the basic amenities, you could dream of with a great balcony to enjoy, if the host agreed to share with you. Although small, but this is a known fact, it's perfect for the solo traveller.
the neighborhood : I've lived in Montreal for quite a while now and still puzzled by the mile-end. I called it the little Paris, for the amount of french living in the neighborhood, but not only. The place is charming and the small cafes and pizzerias definetely gives you a taste of Europe.

Isabelle welcomed me,  and I felt like she had been my good friend for a long time by the time I left!   Isabelle went out of her way to find a parking spot,  made sure my stay was lovely and comfortable.  She is a fabulous chef, and a wonderful company.   I truly enjoyed my stay.

Le mauvais temps m'a forc√©e √† avancer mon arriv√©e et Isabelle √©tait disponible pour me recevoir un peu plus t√¥t que pr√©vu. Un voisin faisait du bruit et elle est all√©e lui demander de baisser le son. Bref, elle a su rendre confortable mon s√©jour et je l'en remercie.
Great place, great hostess, great value.

host.host_about: Welcome to NY.  I am your host, Tom.

There is also a well equipped kitchen, which is convenient for both cooking and reheating leftovers/take-out.  The neighbourhood is fun and convenient (lots of restaurants, and close to the subway).  Overall a very pleasant experience, and I would highly recommend this place.

The washing machine and dryer were brand new and very handy also.

We didn't use the kitchen except for a few bottles of water etc but its huge and you could cook big meals if you wanted.

The location is amazing if you like bars, restaurants, shopping etc. Youre right on the number 6 subway train which goes north to south in Manhattan and is easy to catch. 

If youre going to NYC for a short time dont try and save money and stay in Brooklyn or elsewhere. Get the real experience and stay somewhere like this in Manhattan. Its a very safe and clean neighborhood. We loved it!

Tom es muy amable y prolijo. Se preocupa excesivamente porque todo est√© en orden y que se mantenga. La zona es genial para quien quiera encontrar barcitos abiertos , lugares para comer o escuchar m√∫sica . Mucha gente joven por ah√≠, ya que est√° la Universidad de New York" NYU"

Centric and clean! Nice supermarkets (Whole Foods about 5 min walking), restaurants and bars across the street.
The host was always present to my needs and the apartment (room, bathroom and kitchen) was always clean which makes me feel really comfortable. 
I will definitely come back when I travel back to NYC!

The room is very small, the second bed is a uncomfortable cheap Ikea sofa bed, that takes all the room once unfolded. 

No decoration whatsoever, the place was cold, and looks like it's designed to be as cheap as possible. Don't get mistaken, that room is not in someone's appartement, it's a building designed to be hosting airBnB full time and make money out of it. If only the hosts could just decorate a little bit and make people feel at home, that would negate that feeling.

The location is great, but that room number F is too small for 3 people. The AC unit is very noisy, there is no lamp on the night stand. 

The place is extremely clean, including the bathrooms.
Very convenient to a lot of restaurants and bars. Check in was easy. Rules are somewhat strict but in place for a reason.
Zona piacevole, molto vicina al centro, ottimo e vicinissimo il supercato, confortevole la stanza

I stayed at Tom's place with my fifteen year old son. The apartment is super-clean and the location is perfect for getting around in the city. The neighborhood is lively and there is most certainty not a lack of restaurants! Tom's associate, Ann, met us right on time. She was very friendly giving us good tips on what to do and where to eat. I would definitely recommend staying at Tom's place.
La ubicaci√≥n es inmejorable, hemos tenido una estad√≠a fabulosa! Gracias!!

Tom‚Äôs place is in a great location in East Village. Nami and Ann greeted us and were super friendly. Ann was so sweet and even bought me cough drops because I was sick. 

HOWEVER, the rules posted all over the apartment were a little too much for me and the no guests was an issue... I was sick and a local friend who I‚Äôve known for 17 years escorted me back to the place. He came in for a brief moment and this older Asian gentleman started yelling at him telling him to get out and that he was going to call the police... it was very aggressive. Also very suspicious on why they don‚Äôt allow any visitors whatsoever. 

Although Nami and Ann were very amicable and polite, the crazy strict rules are not worth another stay at this place.
It was definitely a very pleasant experience. The host was so nice, and the place was safe and clean. I‚Äôd definitely book again.
It was a good stay.
A block or two away from some of the best restaurants in NYC, especially Japanese food!
Muy bueno todo
The room is quite small but it's ok if you plan to use it only to sleep. There is a lot of rules but all seem to be reasonable.

All other reviews are pretty accurate. The space itself is very clean and comfortable. The host does have a lot of rules that can be overbearing but it‚Äôs all for the safety and comfort of other guests, so it‚Äôs understandable. Perfect for a couple night stay.
Awesome place

Good Location; The local area is nice and safe, close to subway and is convenient for travelling around NYC.  There are also many restaurants and supermarkets nearby.  There are a good number of bathrooms, a large kitchen to cook in and store items, and a washer and dryer for use.
Great location and great hospitality.
By far the cleanest, most stress free Airbnb experience that I have ever had. Unbeatable location and great host!

Awesome location in the dynamic East Village. Ensure you know and follow the rules, they are fair and clear.  I would stay here without hesitation again. 5 min walk to several subway lines. Lots of food and grocery options.
good place and location. will come back.

Not friendly , too many unnecessary house rules , u have to take ur coffee, tea shampoo , nothing is provided . the house keeper is loud in the morning, telling the guests what to do in a rude manner. I will not go there again. Not recommended.
Very clean place.

Pros: awesome location! Walking distance to many great restaurants and markets. The house and the room are neat and clean. House rule is ok since the only purpose is to keep everything in order. I had a late checkin, arriving around 10:40pm at night but the host was waiting for me. I really appreciate his waiting.

Cons: The room #F is super super hoooooot! Even when I open the window, still feel the room is like 100F inside, as in winter... There is noice from somewhere (maybe heater) and is louder if you open the window. The bed covering is cheap, no soft touch.

In all, the room is matching its price, no surprise. Good for its location.

Tom has the perfect location for a stay in NYC. I just happen to love the East Village, it‚Äôs my favorite neighborhood. 

I stayed in the F room for one week during winter season. The size of the room was perfect for me, traveling alone. It would be also fine for 2 people, more than that in my opinion would be a little too tight. Only if one really needs to save money.

The temperature of the apartment was fine and no noise from the streets in that room. We can hear bedroom neighboors, but there weren‚Äôt many people there during my stay.

The only negative side of the place is that it‚Äôs not very friendly... No warm welcomes, charming decoration or NYC guides, maps or books to share with the guests. Traveling alone I Would have enjoyed it, but I guess ‚Äùthis is NY‚Äù, deal with it, and Im sure  Tom has his reasons to put up cameras and several rules written all over the apartment. I can see that some guests have no education or respect for others.  

I got an early check in for a $59 fee. And the day before my check out I got an email requesting that I left the apartment before or at 10am the latest.

Overall my experience was fine and I would definately stay there again. thanks!

host.host_about:
Imagine the ultimate lifestyle that comes with combining the ultimate destinations and a unique vacation home, allowing you to wake up to a new scenery outside your private veranda anytime you wish.

That is what life is like when you are staying with HOMES IN BLUE, a rental company that started in Barcelona and offers you exclusive short and long term rentals that seeks to recreate the feeling of being at home, despite being in another city. We like to make you discover all the comforts of your own home, including the highest standards of quality and comfort - the enjoyment of all services that provide a superior hotel in a unique private living space. In addition we offer a inside look of the most updated chic restaurants, shops, local delicatessen, VIP areas, trendy bars, etc., according to the latest urban trends and the coolest cities on the planet. Our urbanite taste and character makes each singular living space a place capable of harmonizing art, technology and design. The exquisite selection of details that decorate our rooms naturally integrates the latest technology with a unique modern taste. 

Residents & guests enjoy extensive time in each destination, expert guides and in-depth expeditions to dense cities, ancient archeological wonders and modern-day marvels like anything you could experience elsewhere.

Our idea is to create something unique that makes the world special. Don‚Äôt miss this window of opportunity to witness our spectacular collection of unique homes and lifestyle.

name: 2BR, Walk to the Beach, 2 Lanais, Stunning Views!
summary: Come visit beautiful Kihei! We're located at the Maui Sunset, close to family-friendly activities, public transport, and Kihei nightlife. You‚Äôll love the complex amenities, renovated kitchen, walking distance beach access and the open, airy and light decor. This 4th floor condo has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (both with showers, no bath), wifi, and 2 lanais that are perfect for watching sunsets and sunrises. Great place for couples, friends who want a home away from home, and families (with kids).
space: Our condo is located at the Maui Sunset in Kihei which is the sunny side of Maui. It's on the 4th floor facing the central garden and ocean. It has amazing sunset views from the lanai off the living space, as well as bonus sunrise views from the master suite! Only 8 units in the entire complex have a front and back lanai for these views! Our condo has two bedrooms, two bathrooms (both recently remodeled and both have tiled showers, no baths), a large living room, dining area, fully accessorized kitchen and front and back lanai with views of the garden, ocean (front) and Mountain (back) , perfect for watching sunsets. The master bedroom has a queen size bed. The second bedroom has two twin beds. And the living room has a pull-out sofa. There's a washer and dryer in the kitchen, appliances, dishes, towels, flat screen TVs and DVD players in each bedroom plus the living room, etc.  Our condo is located in a great part of the complex with two lanais, giving a view of the garden and ocean f

neighborhood_overview: We are close to shops, restaurants, Lahaina, highway access and excellent beaches.
notes: The beach in front of the Maui Sunset is great for walking and for enjoying sunsets. This part of the ocean is great for kite and windsurfing. It has a shallower beach and is not necessarily the best for sandcastles and long extended play times. The Kama‚Äôole beaches are a very popular set of beaches for locals and visitors. (less then one mile away) Beautiful, long, 1.5 mile sandy beaches with incredible views of Molokini, Kaho‚Äôolawe and Lana‚Äôi islands. Kam III has one of the most regular South Maui shorebreaks for boogie-boarding. Snorkeling opportunities are plentiful. Full facilities and family friendly.
transit: There is a large parking lot at the Maui Sunset.
access: You will have access to the condo, parking spaces in the lot, as well as the shared pool, lawns, tennis courts, shuffle board courts, BBQs and beach.
interaction: Your keys will be waiting at the main office when you arrive. Check in time is 3pm, check out time is 11am. Our local property managers are available for any concerns that come up during your stay. I am available via AirBnb messenger at all times.
house_rules: - Check-in is after 3PM -Check-out is by 11am - Follow property rules - Quiet hours from 10PM (when pool closes) to 8AM - Do not remove bedding or supplies from unit

reviews.comments:
This condo was in a very convenient location, near shopping, beaches, and grocery stores. Very nice well-kept condo complex and a fantastic pool. Good AC that kept the condo comfortable.

This was our first visit to Maui and it was great! When we visit Maui again we would absolutely stay here again. Condo owner was very helpful with very quick replies to our questions.

Andrew was a very responsive and enthusiastic host!  He made us feel very welcome at the unit, which we appreciated.  He also replied very quickly to emails and checked in with us when we arrived and left.

The apartment itself is very well-stocked with kitchen appliances, cookware, dining essentials, and beach gear (e.g., boogie boards and beach towels).  We appreciated the convenience of the dishwasher and washer and dryer.  The grounds themselves are perfectly manicured and have many bbq grills which we used on several occasions.  The grounds are very clean and the bbq grills themselves are cleaned by the apartment complex's maintenance crew.  The grounds are right on the edge of a shore (not exactly a beach that one would go to for swimming and lounging) that provide stunning views of the water and sunset.

This apartment is a great value in that you are centrally located among different sights such as Wailea Beach and Lahaina (a 15-30 minute drive).  We would recommend renting a car so that you can drive around the island.  Very few sights would be easily accessible to you otherwise.  There are also a full bathroom for each bedroom, so you have a 2-bedroom, 2-bath apartment.  The master bedroom has a lanai the provides a good view of the island.  The second bedroom's window looks out into the dark hallway of the apartment floor though.  A free parking spot was provided for the unit, which was convenient for our rental car.  There is also a balcony off of the kitchen that provides you with a great view of the water.

Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this unit!

The listing is in a great location with an incredible pool and great place to watch the sunset. It is close to a grocery story, restaurants, etc. The listing was about as described. Bathrooms were both small but worked, and lots of towels and beach gear were provided.

Andrew is a fantastic host - he is a very active and quick communicator. His apartment in Kihei, Maui is beautiful: the location is ideal, the building complex even has a swimming pool and is right at the beach. The apartment itself is spacious, well maintained and gives of a holiday/aloha vibe. Andrew is a generous and flexible host and tried to accommodate wherever possible. We truly enjoyed our experience and stay on the island and I can only recommend his place if you are looking for a fantastic vacation!

Andrew is a perfect host ! I recommended this host to all ...
If all host was like im! That will be perfect
Great place for the money!! Nice beach and clean condo.  Andrew is VERY responsive and great to deal with!

Andrews condo home  is excellent but the check in at the front desk will be unexpected if early going in. It is not what I expected cuz I was told to check at the front desk and I will receive the keys  ASAP but she made us wait until 14:00hours... it was a bummer..

The condo is in a great location central to everything.   The place is well maintained.  My only complaint would be that you will not want to spend much time at this beach.   The ocean is very rocky and not good for any activities.  Also, no walk on the beach as have to go to Walea to do anytime of beach path walking.  The rooms were ok and everything was there that you needed.
Tons of cool beach gear available, very nice place. Road noise a little much, but quiet other than that. Beautiful sunsets & beach a 3 minute walk away.

Andrews place was PERFECT for our group in town for a family wedding.  VERY well stocked with all of the perfect amenities and even some extra touches for the beach, etc.  The condo is convenient to EVERYTHING around Kihei.  The sunsets were AMAZING!  We LOVED the pool.  Andrew was easy to work with, easy to reach and had all of the info we needed to enjoy our stay.  GREAT AirBnB experience
Great location, a lot of equipments for beach entertainment, very clean. We will definitely stay here again.

Andrew's condo in Kihei is steps from the ocean.  Tennis courts/gym/hot tub and pool will keep you entertained all day.   The condo is. Also stocked with everything needed for a smooth vacation.  After hours check is was a breeze and Andrew's timely responses made the vacation that much better.   Will definitely be back!
Andrew‚Äôs place was great!!! Has everything you could need. He was incredibly quick to answer any questions I had. We loved it. Thanks!
The host canceled this reservation 327 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The house has just about everything one would have at their own home! Very well stocked! Thanks.
Very nice place, excellent location!

name: Modern NYC Studio Apartment Near Central Park!
summary: This apartment features a fully equipped kitchen and a spacious floor plan.  Residents can enjoy an array of fabulous onsite amenities that this community has to offer. Symphony House is located in a very desirable neighborhood just one block from Carnegie Hall, two blocks from Columbus Circle, three blocks from Central Park and close to many theme restaurants along 57th Street, as well as not too far from Times Square and the Theater District.
space: Thanks to its proximity to some of the world‚Äôs leading cultural destinations, this building is one of the most desirable residences in Manhattan. Guests can spend the day perusing the high-end Shops at Columbus Circle, and then enjoy an evening performance at the world-famous Lincoln Center, Carnegie Hall, or one of the many venues in the Theatre District. Each beautifully furnished apartment includes spacious walk-in closets, marble bathrooms, and a fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops. The building has numerous amenities for its guests to enjoy, including a playroom for children, private fitness center, indoor swimming pool, outdoor jogging track, and sundeck.

name: PRIVATE FLAT AT TAKSIM SQUARE
summary: The Flat is renovated, so everything is new. Location is great its on Taksim Square. Just 2 minutes to the metro and bus stations and also 2 minutes by walking to the Airport Shuttle service station, you dont need to take a taxi for to reach them. There is a washing machine and dryer machine, so you dont need to hang your clothes after washed. There is double wifi internet, so all the time connected. There is an air comditioner, iron, hair dryer, led tv, fridge, kettle, and kitchen utensils.

reviews.comments: This studio apartment is in an ideal location, within walking distance of Taksim Square and the Metro station! Ergun is a great host and very helpful.
Mr Ergun is amazing and friendly plus he response immedutly, the location is good if you like hip areas.

Ergun was very respectful man and so cooperative. He contacted before arriving and guided me to his apartment. He is very lovely and always smile and has a quick response.
I advice to deal with him. 
The only two issues for me :
First the studio was so small and you need to take your loggaege to upper stairs until you get the elevator.
Actually I say many thanks to mr Ergun.

We have been in the studio for 13 nights , Ergun was always presents and houpful , the llcation was perfect near to everything ,there was just the probleme of cleaning but you can do it yourself all was disponible . If i come back to istanbul Ergun will be our distination ..thank you verry much
I can see why Ergun is a super host, the place was great and he was very responsive and helpful. Thanks!
great location ; very reasonable price and Ergun is more than host .. he will act as a friend when you need help.
Mr Ergun is a great host, the apartment is tiny but clean and located in a wonderful position!

Ergun is great and attentive, the apartment is no frills but is exactly as advertised.  Its super clean, secure a great location.   The toilet and bathroom are very small so might be a bit too intimate for a couple to share but I found if perfect for a solo traveler.
The location is great! The apartment is small, but it has everything needed for a comfortable stay. Ergum gave us a warm reception and met us since we had issues finding the apartment.

The location for me was perfect as I was there for a training course in the neighborhood. The studio is 2 minutes from Taksim square and therefore close to the main restaurant area and shopping  streets in this region and 20mins from Galata tower. Taksim also has decent public transportation opportunities to go to other places in the city. Additionally, the apartment was just 5mins from the Havab√ºs shuttle busses to the Sabiha G√∂k√ßen Airport. The studio is small and cute and had everything that I  needed and Ergun was quick to respond and a really nice guy. The only minor comments I have would be the noise from the busy street outside and the mosque. I would also recommend Ergun to provide some extra blankets for the colder evenings in autumn/wintertime :).

reviews.comments: El apartamento est√° muy cerca del Parque G√ºell, cuenta con una parada de metro cerca y  otra de bus en la misma puerta . Fueron muy amables al darnos la posibilidad de entrar por la ma√±ana, bastante antes de la hora fijada. En general, el apartamento est√° bien.

Great area of Barcelona. The apartment was ok, we were there a family of 4 and it worked out. There were som problems, with broken lightbulbs, and other things, but the host was very quick to fix it.  Perfect Wifi.
Amazing place, amazing owners, everything was as i expected, is more than expected.. i would recommend everyone to take
Muito bom!!! Recomendo

The apartment was very clean just like the pictures. It was convenient to have the bus stop literally at the front door of the building. It is about a mile walk from the Sagrada Familia and about 1.5 mi from other major city attractions. Not too bad but when you're walking all day your feet need a rest and that's when the bus comes to the rescue! We really enjoyed staying here and checking in was very smooth and the guy was very helpful.
Tolles Apartment! Wundersch√∂nes und gem√ºtliche Quartier, gute Lage mit der Metro oder dem Taxi ins Zentrum. Sofa-Bett nicht so bequem, optimal f√ºr 3-4 Personen. Sehr zu empfehlen.

We stayed at the apartment with our 3 kids(19,17,13).  The apartment was a bit cramped for all of us.  It would be a better for a family with smaller/less kids. But the location is good.  There are grocery stores, restaurants and the subway within easy access.  The check-in process was very smooth.  We don't speak Spanish and that was a bit of a problem as the Washer/Dryer unit in the apartment did not have any instructions in English.

Good location, close to some of the big sights to see, short walk to the metro but from there not that far to get into the centre. Clean apartment as advertised. Check in fairly easy process, but the company gets you to fill in some forms and take a holding deposit, but pretty stress free process.
Thanks for the stay, would consider staying here again!

Pros: located close to a metro station and Park G√ºell, functioning air conditioner.
Cons: Oven was broken and not repaired. We had purchased food to cook and the host did not offer any sort of compensation nor acknowledge my request for such. There were two toasters and neither worked. Two stovetop burners broken. The dishwasher had an extreme malodor which made it unusable. The shower fluctuated hot and cold water throughout. 
This was our fourth Airbnb on this vacation and it had the most problems. Also the only one where we were met by the host asking for more money in the form of taxes and a deposit. Perhaps that was mentioned in the listing but it came as a surprise following the smooth check ins elsewhere.

El apartamento est√° bien situado y bien decorado. Espacio suficiente para una familia de cuatro personas como la nuestra. S√≥lo sentimos dos peque√±os problemas: la salida del aire acondicionado es para el mostrador, lo que exige que se apague el aparato cuando se quiere estar all√≠; Y la estaci√≥n del metro m√°s cercana requiere una peque√±a caminata que puede cansarse un poco si usted tiene que hacerlo varias veces. Por lo dem√°s, todo estaba bien. Los anfitriones fueron atentos en todo y hasta nos agendaron un traslado al aeropuerto de madrugada. Es necesario estar atento al valor de la tasa de turismo, que se cobra aparte. Fuimos en cuatro personas y tuvimos que pagar 70 euros por siete noches.

La casa purtroppo non √® stata confortevole. Manca: sapone per i piatti, asciughino, panno per pulire il piano della cucina, scopa, tagliere, caff√®, tovaglia. Le pentole sono vecchie e rilasciano odori presumibilmente tossici. Il tostapane riscalda solo da una parte. La porta scorrevole del terrazzo non si chiude bene, lasciando entrare uno spiffero. I fornelli non riscaldano bene. L'acqua della doccia tende a riversarsi all'esterno passando fra l'anta e il piatto della doccia. Il letto della camera singola non √® comodo.
Apartment is good value for what you pay--couldn't ask for a better location! Walking distance to Park Guell, La Sagrada Familia, and near the subway as well!

name: Vintage Mile End Gem
summary: Our place is in the heart of the Plateau/Mile End, close to great parks, coffee, shopping, and restos.  It is within walking distance of the metro and bus routes.  It is a ground floor apartment, with access to a garden shared with the neighbor. This is a *real home*  one bedroom (with one room closed), living room with access to records, full kitchen with vintage charm, and sunny reading room by the garden. A cute, old "Montreal-style" gem in the middle of it all!

house_rules: The garden is shared with our neighbor, who has a dog.  Please be considerate of this when sharing space, especially if you bring a pet.

reviews.comments: Our host was great with making arrangements simple and convenient. Wonderful neighbourhood, easily accessible to bars, restaurants and subway but also quiet and quaint. We really enjoyed sitting outside in the shared space with a beer or tea.

Pamela's place was just what we wanted. Quiet neighborhood, GREAT location in Mile End. Quaint backyard, comfortable bed and clean bathroom. Our host was communicative and left the key in an easy to find spot for us. There is some non-resident parking right in front of the house- perfect! There is also a lovely little futball field behind the back yard where there is always someone (kids/adults alike) playing a game. Plenty of coffee shops, restaurants, bars and locally owned boutiques within walking distance. Perfect!

We very much enjoyed our stay in S√©rgio's town house. It's lovely decorated, spacious, and all in all a great place to stay when in Porto. We very much enjoyed the fact that it was so close to the metro so getting into town was very convenient. 
Communication with S√©rgio was great and he was very helpful.

Although we had a great experience, we have a couple of remarks. The stairs to the top floor were a little scary to walk (and very scary to have our child walk) - so perhaps installing a banister would help. We thought the apartment was overall very clean, but the floor was not (downstairs)... so if you like to take off your shoes indoor, you will get dirty feet. While the house is very close to the metro, parts of the neighborhood seemed a little unsafe at night (though in the house, which is walled, you do feel secure).
A casa √© maravilhosa. √â at√© maior do que visto nas fotos. Voltaremos com certeza.

Entsprechend aufwendig ist die Ausstattung und vor allem ziemlich komplett. So etwas ist am Anfang sehr wichtig. so eine umfangreiche Hilfe wird man selten finden. Sein Angebot zur Unterst√ºtzung ist auch sehr ernst gemeint. 
Es gibt hinter dem Stadion ein gro√ües Einkauszentrum. Der Foodbereich ist im UG. Dort gibt es alles, auch bio und vegan (Celerio).

It is spacious for Students, Couples, Solo Adventurers, or Business travelers.  My place is close to The Famous Nathan's Hot Dog, Gargiulo's Restaurant, Sideshows at The Coney Island USA Bar/Cafe, Applebee's, and Footprints Cafe, plus others just check out my guidebook.

neighborhood_overview: Very quiet neighborhood, residential, walkable to Beach, The Bay for sunsets and walks. There are Metro trains and Express Bus to Manhattan and other areas in Brooklyn and Queens.  My place is close to Nathan's Famous, Gargiulo's Restaurant, Sideshows by the Seashore, Applebee's Coney Island, and Footprints Cafe.
notes: I request to see a valid ID on arrival and should match your profile in exchange for Keys.  Please be mindful after 10pm sound and traffic in the house must be respected as this is a residential home. A home Surveillance System is set up for everyones safety. My address can not be used for your mail or online orders unless your stay is 3 weeks/30 days or longer.
transit: South Metro trains near me are the N,F,Q,D which travel in and out of Brooklyn to Manhattan and Queens. Also Express Bus X28 and X38 are available few blocks from The Parachute Loft also travel to Manhattan. There are many ways to get to the Metro train station on Stillwell Avenue. It is the closest and last stop on the N,F,Q,D train lines.  One can get from Stillwell Station to the Loft, by making a straight walk on Mermaid Ave or Surf Ave or the Boardwalk. It is about a 10 to 15 min walk. The Boardwalk is the best to stroll through from the station to the Loft. This walk is about 20 min, since the Boardwalk is a little curved. Yet, another way getting around can be by taking the Green Taxis.  They can be seen lined up in front of the Train Station on Mermaid Avenue and are only 2 dollars per person to the Loft.  In addition, using a metro card can be purchased and used for public bus #74 or #36 they come with a free transfer from train to bus or bus to train.  Also bus to bus free tr
access: The Loft is on the second floor of the house.  Parking for one car is available on property in a Private Gated Driveway. There is always Street Parking available on my Block that is always FREE.
interaction: I am here if you need me, just text me anytime.
house_rules: Respect...we are all adults here. I request to see a valid ID on arrival...should match your profile and in exchange for Keys All Common Spaces...(Bathroom, Kitchen, & Living Room) Must be left CLEAN and PICKED UP after each person and use of that space.  Cleaning Equipment & Vacuum with First Aid Kit are located in the Hallway Closet.  Please be mindful after 10pm sound and traffic in the house must be respected as this is a residential home. A Home Surveillance System is set up for safety. No Sleepovers if they are not on reservation. Not suitable for infants or children under 18 years old. Smoke Free House. My address can not be used for your mail or online orders.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a Native New Yorker and an International Visual Artist sharing my comfortable loft in Coney Island.  The Parachute Loft is a lovely space for those who want a quiet yet breezy getaway from the Big Apple. Also sharing space for International Travelers and Adventurers this Summer/Autumn/Winter/Spring seasons.  The space is two blocks away to the Coney Island Beach, a short stroll away to The Luna Park, and Games on the Boardwalk.  There are Metro Trains as well as express bus to Manhattan available. Film or photo shoots are possible and fee are to be negotiated.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The place is very nice, clean, and quiet. Looks just like the pictures. Unfortunately, I cannot say my stay was pleasant. The room gets HOT in the summer. It does not have windows, and air conditioning was not installed until June 23rd (I moved in on May 7th). I left the air on overnight because I didn't know I was supposed to turn it off (I've had central air my whole life, and from my discussions with other people, I don't think turning off a window unit at night is necessarily normal either). When Anna realized I was leaving it on, instead of having a civil adult conversation with me, she screamed at me and insulted me, calling me immature and telling me I didn't have any common sense (because in her opinion turning AC off at night, even when it is 100 degrees outside, is "common sense"). After this incident, I turned the AC off and didn't touch it again. Someone else moved in to the other airbnb room she has listed, and started using the AC. This new guest also left it on overnight. Instead of speaking with the new guest, Anna waited for me at the front door until I left for work, and followed me out of the house screaming at me and calling me stupid and immature again. So yes the place is nice, but definitely not worth what I had to deal with. Also, the neighborhood is definitely not the safest, especially for a young woman.
Lovely.  Very nice place.  Super nice hostess
Excellent place and service

Anna's place is only a couple blocks from the boardwalk, which makes for a lovely walk (about 20 mins) to Coney Island's rides and attractions. The kitchen came in handy and there was even an espresso machine! The loft is artful, clean, and comfortable with a common space. The two bedrooms are next to each other so it's a great place to stay with friends! Anna was communicative and helpful. I would definitely recommend staying here!

Anna is a very welcoming host. She has an outgoing personality and is a very helpful local guide. The place is very clean and quite. I enjoyed my stay there and would recommend her place to my friends.

Anna was great. She walked us to the boardwalk and gave us a tour. She was super cool. The room gets really hot but there is a lot of fans to help out with that. The place is bigger than what I expected and beautiful! I really loved the place.

Anna's place in Coney Island is a beautiful and quite large home. I stayed at her home while visiting a friend in brooklyn. Anna was very helpful during every moment of the trip. I planned the trip two days before arriving and all of the accomodations were clean and ready to go. The house is in a quiet neighborhood, and the house was very quiet at all hours. The room has its own doors with locks, a comfortable bed, clean linens, and enough space to feel comfortable. I would not worry at all about staying here.

I have been to beautiful homes in San Francisco and Yosemite, this house is on par if not better than the ones I stayed at. I understand why Anna is a Superhost and I look forward to staying again next time I return. Thanks for a no hassel weekend.
It is worthwhile to stay here.
The service that Anne provides is incredibly nice, very warm, attentive and understanding person. The room is very cozy, clean and well equipped.

Beautiful home; very convenient location; amazing amenities; Anna is a great hostess. She also made plenty of information available about fun things to do in Coney Island and places to eat. Very quiet; I got great sleep!

Chambre spacieuse et bien √©quip√©e, mais effectivement en colocation avec 2 autres chambres donc un peu compliqu√© si les centres d'int√©r√™t ne sont pas les m√™mes! Autrement tr√®s bon emplacement proche du centre ville et dans un quartier calme et safe.
Do not park on the street "rua de maternidade", our car was robbed there. Host was great, I just advise people not to park on the street, we lost a fortune because of that.
You share the floor with others but you have your own room. The "Terrasse" is pretty cool. Bath was a bit shabby but all in all it was a nice stay!

Cerca del centro, fuimos caminando a todos los sitios, la habitaci√≥n y el ba√±o limpio, no hab√≠a ruidos, cocina limpia, la se√±ora que nos recibi√≥ muy atenciosa, nos ofreci√≥ s√°banas, toalhas y mantas. Seguro que volveremos, passamos genial.
It's in the heart of Porto
Great localisation, great pleace to discover Porto by walk.

Nice place. You can get anywhere in just 20 mins or so. It's clean and well-located. 
The only bad thing about our stay is that Nuno never replied us. He never gave us the number of the building. Fortunately, asking local people, we found the it, but we list some valuable time.
Good location and cheap room, but it was a mouldy room and the contact with Nuno was bad.

Tard√≥ mucho en responder- un par de dias y habiamos llegado a la puerta tras dias sin correspondencia y tuvimos que esperar media hora afuera. Tambien habia otros quedando en el piso al mismo tiempo que nosotras y ellos fumaban- aun dir√≠a que no podr√≠amos fumar
Great location! Close to everything

It was OK for this money.
But the sofa was broken. It is possible to sleep there but not so comfortable as it could be.
The area is good - quite, without tourists. 
There are about 30-40 minutes on food to go to the bridge. We liked this walking )
And also housekeeper don't speak English. Guests should be ready to use voice translator.
Chill place to stay
Quato muito bom! Grande e aconchegante. Nao conhecemos Nuno, porem tudo estava muito bem explicado para a chegada. Gostamos muito!

Le num√©ro de l‚Äôimmeuble n‚Äô√©tait pas indiqu√© , nous avons tourn√© en rond en tentant de joindre l‚Äôh√¥te , avant de tomber sur du voisinage tr√®s agr√©able. 
La dame qui s‚Äôoccupe du m√©nage dans l‚Äôimmeuble a √©t√© adorable , et nous a accompagn√© jusqu‚Äô√† l‚Äôappartement .

Loved Nunos place! The room was spacious, had a futon and a double bed, both comfy, had a nice big tv as well and the amenities were always clean! The housekeeper was lovely and very helpful and Nuno communicated quickly with whatever enquiry we had. We were able to leave our luggage there at 10am and we came back at 1.30pm to check in. Also walking distance to the Ribeira and local supermarkets and transport. The only thing that was a negative is that the room is next to a terrace and the roof above it was occupied by seagulls and every so often it would get loud, even at night you can here them walking and making noises. Still on that note, would recommend the place!
