The house had everything which is needed and is pretty well located in Porto. You can get anywhere in just 20/30 min. Communication with host was a bit slow, but apart from that the room is suitable for a short period stay.
Ottimo

Pros: Nice room, good price, and the location is walking distance to most attractions in Porto. Host allowed us to store our bags in the complex past checkout on our last day.

Cons: The host's information for check in was inaccurate, which caused problems on the front end. When we called him for the building address, he was very short with us and insisted that it was in the messages - it was not. Once we found the building, there was incorrect information about which floor and room we were staying in (he rents out multiple rooms within the same building). We had to sort this out with the housekeeper, which took a while due to a language barrier. The host is not actually on-site at any point during your stay.

Great room and location. Excellent value for money. The room was what we expected, and the cleaner was cleaning the place regularly which was great also. The room could do with a fan because it can get a bit warm at night, but otherwise excellent.

Watch out travelers!!
I had never felt so humiliating in a trip, we write on the host 2 day before the arrival to know the whole address, but he never answered, we call to the customer service and they call him to advice him to tell us the address or cancel our reservation, he give us the address. We ask for leave the luggage at the place before check-in but he didn't answer until was so late, we had to do the check in at night and the key os the house and de room wasn't in the key box, he didn't give us keys until the next day afternoon.
The room was OK, but it's moho near the bed and in the bathroom, is too noisy because there are so many seagull on the roof.

Very nice room. We were very satisfied with everything. When we arrived our room wasn't ready for 3 people, but only for two, but I call the owner and a housekeeper been there in 5 minutes! I can recommend!
Everything fine ;). Nice contact, clean place in very good location.
The stay at this place was very nice! The apartement is located in the city center.
Appartement bien plac√© ,

Great place.
Very good location , close to all main sites.
bien, nuno r√©agit vite !

Good choice, cosy and very near to the center, parking in front of the building but payable and only maximum 2 hours. Still you can use telpark app and after 2h parking make another parking in the same area without coming back to the car.
Great location

Abbiamo avuto problemi a trovare il luogo, le coordinate su (Hidden by Airbnb) maps indicavano una zona differente non molto distante, ma comunque solo grazie alla Signora delle pulizie, che ci ha accolto (gentilissima e cordiale) che si era accorta di noi sulla strada e ci ha fatto un cenno per farci entrare. 
Alloggio carino e stanza pulita. 
Il bagno essendo in comune rischia di sporcarsi in fretta e forse un bagno solo per tante persone che vengono accolte nell‚Äôappartamento √® poco, se tutti si svegliano la mattina bisogna attendere. 
Mancava la Tv nella nostra stanza, mentre nelle foto era presente. 
La maniglia della nostra porta non era ben fissata e rischiava di staccarsi.

A parte queste note, per chi ha spirito di adattamento il soggiorno √® piacevole e sicuramente la posizione √® buonissima, il centro √® a due passi.

Appartement tr√®s peu propre (moisissures dans presque toutes les pi√®ces) les photos ne correspondent pas (pas de t√©l√©, pas de pelouse synth√©tique dehors ...). Nous ne voyons jamais l‚Äôh√¥te. Juste un appartement o√π on loue seulement une chambre et non un logement entier, juste pour faire de l‚Äôargent. Seul point positif, assez bien plac√©.
Cancelled on us literally hours before check in.

The apartment is in an old building that doesn‚Äôt have an elevator. They use a practical system for the keys. The apartment has been very well renovated, has 3 rooms for each type of guest, with a single shared bathroom, a good kitchen with basic utensils and a terrace. The bedroom for three people was very spacious, with a comfortable bed and sofa bed. It was a short stay of one night and without major inconvenience.

Creo que no fue una experiencia tan agradable pues nunca tuve comunicaci√≥n con el anfitri√≥n me atendi√≥ una se√±ora que por suerte estaba en la puerta esperando a alguien pero con quien fue dif√≠cil comunicarse ya que no hablaba espa√±ol pero intento ayudarme con la instalaci√≥n.En la habitaci√≥n habia presencia de moho y el ruido de las gaviotas por la ma√±ana no me quedo claro habia alg√∫n nido o era propio del la zona.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am Marcelo a latin  native, and living n the US for about 20 years. I am interior designer and painter. I am very open-minded and love cross-cultural exchanges. I hope to provide travelers a pleasant stay at my home and am always interested in meeting new people. Feel encouraged to reach out to me with any question concerning your stay.

reviews.comments: Murilo was polite and well informed on the area. The apartment was quiet and perfectly located in the city. This was my first AirBnB, and it was a great experience. Thanks Murilo!
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Murilo is a wonderful host, he told about some usefull places and always was in touch. The apartment is situated in a very good place near riversedie park which I love a lot (I'm already missing this park). This studio has all that you need, shared bathroom was free almost all the time. Not so clean, but it's ok.

The room was nice and felt clean. The shared bathroom wasn't very pleasant to use. 

Murilo was great with communication. He had me worried a little with all his insistence not to speak to anyone but I didn't have any time problems. 

The location is great, only two blocks from the subway.

Murilo is very nice and made 101 NY crash course for me upon my arrival. :)
He was very nice and explained me on the map where to find all of the places I was interested. 

Apartment is very small but cosy and definitely very good for its price. One thing which slightly disappointed me - some scratchings and monotone noise at night (seems that it is conditioning system of the neighbors). Need to say that I am very sensitive sleeper.

For how incredibly affordable Murilo's place is, it can't be beat. You're in a beautiful area of the Upper West Side. There is a shared bathroom but it was never a problem. Not once did I find the other person who uses it using it when I wanted to. And while the amenities in the bathroom are old, I found them to be quite clean. Otherwise, the bed is comfy and the table area large enough to do laptop work. The building itself has a (very cheap) laundry room in the basement should you need it. Murilo makes every effort to make sure you're doing well, and even will have a cup of coffee with you if you're so inclined to have him show you the city a bit. My only complaint would be that the WiFi is a bit slow, but that's really it. I felt safe and secure in this cozy studio. Would recommend to anyone looking for a great deal.

The host was very easy to communicate with and the apartment is in a wonderful area, HOWEVER, if you're sensitive to cigarette smoke or smell DO NOT stay here. The entire floor smells like years of cigarettes and really made the stay less enjoyable.  I hardly wanted to use the communal bathroom because it smells so potently.  Murilo is a good host and it's a good place to rest your head in a pinch, but I would not recommend for long-term stay.

Murilo had excellent communication. He gave me a lot of useful information upfront and checked on me throughout my trip to ensure everything was going well.

This listing had a shared bathroom which was clearly posted in the listing i must have just missed it. The bathroom was clean and i never ran into issues with it being occupied. I did not like the shared bathroom situation though. It was a tad uncomfortable having to leave the apartment to use the restroom. I felt like i needed to lock up the apartment everytime i used the bathroom just in case. Not only was my stuff in the apartment but Murilos as well. Again, this was clearly posted in the listing so this was not Murilos fault. 

I didn't bother using the elevator after the first day. There is only one covering the whole building and its very slow so i just took the stairs. The common hallway area smelled really bad like food and cigarettes at all times. Murilos apartment smells just fine so no worries there!!

The best part about this unit is the location!!! You are walking distance to anything you may need (market, dining, shopping, Central Park, etc). Its a short walk to Central Park which is amazing and its also walking distance to Midtown. There is a subway station right next to the unit so you can take the subway as well. 

Overall i enjoyed my experience at Murilos. The only thing keeping me from booking again is the bathroom.
O espa√ßo √© excelente, limpo, organizado e bem localizado. O Murilo deu toda assist√™ncia, para eu aproveitasse ao maximo a minha estadia em NY.

I stayed in Marcelo flat for one week together with a friend. For 2 people the apartment is quite small but if you plan to do a lot of sightseeing it is okay, as we did not spent too much time in the flat. 
The communication with Marcelo was excellent! He gave us good ideas what to see in New York!

The apartment is exactly as described and Marcelo was very prompt and helpful in all communication. I would happily stay here again. As the ad clearly states the studio uses a shared bathroom but in a two week stay I only had to wait for it once. It is usually free.
Everything was as advertised. For price/location, this apt. can't be beat. Host was pretty helpful and gave me some pointers on NYC. Would come back again.

This is a nice apartment ideal for single person or couple. There are two parks, subway station, shops, etc in that district. Marcelo is very polite and helpful person. I recommend this variant - it will be your best choice for these money.

Marcelo's studio is fine and situated in a quiet neighborhood close to Central Park, the Museum of Natural History and a bit of walk from teh Metropolitan. 

Marcelo provided me good information on the surroundings and help me to navigate with the various groceries and shops of the area. 

i appareciated this trip a lot.
Muy buen lugar quedarse, por la ubicaci√≥n y porque todo es como lo describe. Marcelo es muy atento y est√° disponible para atender cualquier consulta.
The host is good on communication and providing info for your stay. Easy check-in.

Marcelo jest osobƒÖ kontaktowƒÖ. Lokalizacja mieszkania jest idealna, je≈õli kto≈õ chce zwiedzaƒá wy≈ÇƒÖcznie Manhattan. Mieszkanie ma oko≈Ço 10 metr√≥w kwadratowych, w≈Ça≈õciwie jest to pok√≥j, okna wychodzƒÖ na niewielkie podw√≥rze w pokoju jest wiƒôc ca≈Çy czas bardzo ciemno. W zwiƒÖzku z tym, ≈ºe o wynajmie mieszkania nie wiedzƒÖ sƒÖsiedzi, w≈Ça≈õciciel jest bardzo uczulony na kontakt z nimi, co skutkowa≈Ço tym, ≈ºe praktycznie codziennie wysy≈Ça≈Ç smsy z pytaniem czy wszystko w porzƒÖdku. Generalnie ok.
Marcelo's house is nice, it's small, but you don't go to New York to stay in your room. The bed is pretty comfortable, and I never had to wait for the communal bathroom.
Great location to use as a basecamp to explore the city
Goede locatie en alles goed bereisbaar! Zoals ook aangegeven.
Marcelo was a great host, friendly and quick to respond. Apartment as advertised. Great location and amenities.
I highly recommend staying here. Not only was it clean but it was close to everything. There were great bars and restaurants close by and the metro was 3 minutes away
Perfect location in manhatten only 15 mins to Time Square on the subway. Apartment was great and cosy.
Tidy apartment, excellent location, 5-10 mins walk to subway then just a couple stops to everywhere in Manhattan. Recommend!
Nice cozy area. Short distances to a few areas as well as access to public transportation if heading any farther into the city. Quick responses. Would definitely recommend!
A great area next to a nice park for early morning jogging.
Es tal y como se describe en el anuncio. Para mi lo mejor la ubicaci√≥n, a 10 minutos en metro de Broadway. La parada metro a 5 minutos. Muy buena respuesta por parte del anfitri√≥n

Getting to the place was smooth. Location is UNREAL! Heading only a few blocks over there is access to many great bars and restaurants. Head a little further and there is an amazing amount of shops, Central Park, etc.

Maurillo was very communicative and helpful setting things up. Definitely wanted to make sure everything was OK and I felt right at home. Had a good time.

Everything was as you can see in the pictures. Additionally, the place is within 2 blocks of the subway which makes it highly accessible to the whole city.

Marcelo was an exceptional host. Always willing to help out. Always responded very quickly.
Great host, very reactive. I had no problem during my stay. I recommend it/him !
Excellent location, easy to get to, Marcelo is available for anything you need.

The location is great. PLEASE be aware that there is no private bathroom (not even a sink in the room)..its shared with the floor. Marcelo likes to communicate over (Hidden by Airbnb) and not the Airbnb app. He texts so much!! He was texting me weeks before I went to New York, days before AND while I was there. It was a little bit stressful! He was annoying in wanting to know the exact time I wanted to check in and check out. The building is old and smelly but Marcelo‚Äôs room doesn‚Äôt smell. It was neat! The hallway smells like cigarettes. He left towels in a rack for me to use. Once I checked out - he sent me a long paragraph telling me how disappointed he was that I used his towels. Proposing that I should‚Äôve left money for him to wash them! RUDE! I don‚Äôt recommend this place if you want privacy and I don‚Äôt recommend this place if you have kids.

I had a very nice stay at Marcelo‚Äôs place which happens to be my old neighborhood (actually the same street).  He was very easy to communicate with and made me feel comfortable in his home. Great value in a wonderful part of Manhattan.

First, the listing is incorrect, either its Airbnb fault or the host's fault, the bathroom is shared, and when it is that way I'm not sure how Airbnb shows this apartment under 'Entire home'  category.

Second, the host insists on communicating via (Hidden by Airbnb) , and just keeps on messaging all the time, I had to block my notifications so that he doesn't bugs me. Do yourself a favor and just tell him you don't have a phone and save yourself

Marcelo's place is in a good building in a really safe neighbourhood and was really close to the 86th W subway station and the cross town buses so getting around was great. The shared bathroom is with an 'unrelated' apartment which I hadn't been expecting and there is no source of running water within the apartment but you get used to that. I found the bed too hard and had to improvise a softer mattress by using blankets under the sheets. Towels and sheets were supplied but with the shared bathroom situation it was hard to work out who was responsible for replenishing soap and toilet paper etc in the bathroom. These are all things that I think could be easily remedied and the location and safety aspects were good.
Great location to visit the city! Within walking distance from Central Park, and 2 blocks away from the subway.
Marcelo is very friendly, kind and accessible. The location is also. So close to 86th St so you can easily go to both side, uptown and downtown.

Fantastic location; easy walk to the 1 train. Marcelo was not too pushy or anything. What others said about the smell of cigarette smoke in the hallway leading up to the room was accurate, but the smoke never made it into the room itself. Do note that the shared bathroom is in the public hallway, not in any private area shared with another room.

The location is great and Marcelo is very quick and detailed in his responses. I didn‚Äôt have problem with sharing the bathroom and it was open every time I needed it. This place is great for a weekend trip to the city!
It‚Äôs a cozy small place. Great location the host is very attractive
Can‚Äôt beat the location, close to riverside park, Central Park, multiple subways stations, and tons of restaurants!
Marcelo is a nice person and gives you good instructions for everything. The location is perfect to explore New York. The shared bathroom was clean as well as the room. I can recommend this place.

Great small apartment. Marcelo was awsome und helpfull. It was my first trip to New York and my first trip with Air bnb too. 
He took away my fear about the trip alone and was always available for me by cellphone. 

F√ºr einen Trip nach New York genau das, was man braucht. Das Badezimmer befindet sich auf dem Gang. Bis auf ein paar kleine Ausnahmen war es immer sauber. F√ºr den Preis w√ºrde ich immer wieder diese kleine Wohnung buchen. Mikrowelle, Kaffeemaschine... alles vorhanden. 

Thanks to Marcelo for the great support.

Marcelo was very easy to communicate with, he made sure everything was planned ahead of time, and did everything he could to ensure my stay was as comfortable as possible. The place was clean and located in a very nice area. Especially in a place like NY where hotels charge up to $300/night, this was amazing for the amount I paid.

It is a nice room, that is well kept and clean. Marcelo is pleasant and easy to communicate with, he was very good about giving info about the area as well. It was a nice area and easy get around as well.
Das apartment war sehr sauber es war alles super erkl√§rt und marcelo hat immer schnell geantwortet

I had a great time! From the start, Marcelo provided all of the information needed to effectively navigate the train straight from the airport without issue. The apartment was in a great location right by the park and contained everything needed for a short stay. Would absolutely recommend to stay there, thanks Marcelo!
Spectacular location

name: VERY LARGE 5 Bedroom Home, free onsite parking
summary: This property has 5 bedrooms catering for 10 people in comfort.  You can travel from the ferry wharf to the city or Darling Harbour in two stops.   Onsite parking can be purchased at an additional cost.
space: This accommodation is just around the corner from a wide selection of restaurants, cafes and pub (please refer to our Guidebook for more information).   Amenities: * Free onsite parking for two cars (or 1 van) * 5 generous bedrooms (2 with ensuite, 1 with walk-in robe) * 2 outdoor areas (courtyards) * 1 office/media/TV room * 3 dining areas * Very large living room * 3 bathrooms  * Air-conditioning (mixture of split aircon units/ceiling fans/free standing fans/heaters throughout the property) * 1 full kitchen with induction cooking + 1 kitchenette * Dishwasher * Microwave and oven * External laundry (washing machine and dryer) * Residence is on 1 level (ground floor)  * No smoking is permitted (all areas internal and external including car port)   FREE unlimited calls to landlines and mobile numbers within Australia + the following 15 countries: Canada, China, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong, India, South Korea, Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, Taiwan, Thailand, UK and USA. Onsite parking can be purchased at an additional cost. This accommodation is just around the corner from a wide selection of restaurants, cafes and pub (please refer to our Guidebook for more information).   Amenities: * Free onsite parking for two cars (or 1 van) * 5 generous bedrooms (2 with ensuite, 1 with walk-in robe) * 2 outdoor areas (courtyards) * 1 office/media/TV room * 3 dining areas * Very large living room * 3 bathrooms  * Air-conditioning (mixture of split aircon units/ceiling fans/free standing fans/heaters throughout the property) * 1 full kitchen with induction cooking + 1 kitchenette * Dishwasher * Microwave and oven * External laundry (washing machine and dryer) * Residence is on 1 level (ground floor)  * No smoking is permitted (all areas internal and external including car port)   FREE unlimited calls to landlines and m
notes: EARLY CHECK-INS/LATE CHECK OUTS: If we can accomodate these requests we will, at no cost, but we can't confirm until 24 hours prior to check in/check out. If you need an early check-in but can't wait till 24 hrs before your booking commences to find out if this is possible, we recommend booking for an additional night prior to arrival so you can check in at your leisure on the day you arrive.  CONSUMABLES: As this is self-catering accommodation no consumables are provided as part of the booking.  This includes gas for the BBQ bottle. Please review the Guidebook section of our listing for info on local supermarkets. WASHING LINE ONSITE: There is a retractable washing line in the back courtyard area (attached to the wall).  Just pull out the washing line from the bracket on the wall and clip to the bracket on the opposite wall to hang up wet clothes.
transit: TRAVEL VIA FERRY: get the ferry into the city or Darling Harbour in two stops.   TRAVEL VIA TRAIN/BUS: the closest train station is North Sydney where you can get the train into the city in 2 stops, or catch one of the many buses to the city or the upper North Shore and beyond.
access: Guests have full access to all areas of the advertised property (ground floor only).
interaction: Please contact the Host via the Airbnb messaging system (as Airbnb require all Hosts to liaise with guests via this method).
house_rules: - Guests 25 years old or older can book this property. - Any noise complaints received from neighbours during your booking will result in the forfeiture of the entire bond and may result in the immediate termination of the booking. - No consumables are supplied for this booking.   - Guests are to ensure dirty dishes are all cleaned and put away in the cupboards (and dishwasher empty) prior to the end of the booking.  - All rubbish is to be removed from the interior of the property at the end of the booking and put into the council bins available onsite in the carport.   - Council rubbish bins must be taken out to the pavement on Sunday evenings each week as the council collect the rubbish early Monday mornings.   - No smoking  - No left luggage facility available - There is a key replacement fee of $50 per key for lost keys (or keys accidentally taken home at the end of the booking). - Personal items left behind at the end of the booking can picked up from the property at a time suitab

host.host_about: Hi,  we look forward to welcoming you to our beautiful home. Book today !

reviews.comments: Very happy with the house, beautifully decorated and very spacious. Only issue was there was no wifi.
Great location. Really close to city. Tidy and clean and absolutely artistic. Vanessa replied all questions on time and really helpful.
Vanessa very helpful, a great spot!

A botiuge place to stay, a little sparse in furnishings and would be a little cold in winter, lots of concrete. 
In general a nice place to stay and very convenient to restaurants and the city of Sydney. A short walk to the bottom of the hill and you are at the waterfront looking at the Opera House, Harbour Bridge and Luna Park.

Vanessa was extremely prompt in returning all emails.  The location was brilliant and close to many great places to eat, catch a ferry and public transport.  The kitchen was great with all you needed to make a great meal and serve.  I would definitely stay here again.

We loved the house! We came as 6 colleagues on a conference and had a great time. There was so much space and lots of places to sit, chill or catch up on work. The house was the most unique , modern and trendy place I have ever been to - like a 5* hotel. I might be wary if I had kids though as there its a lot of artwork that I would hate to damage.

The house was quirky with lots of lovely artwork, as well as being very large easily accommodating 6 adults. The house was fully equipped with anything you can imagine - and if there is anything you need, it is central to both North Sydney train station and Mcmahons Point ferry terminal.  Lots of local restaurants, pubs, shops (IGA, Aldi and Coles as well as the fantastic Mcmahons Grocers).  Vanessa was very quick with responses and accommodating us after some previous accommodation with another host ended up being double booked.  Her information and instructions were well written and documented.  The house was very quiet and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and didn't want to leave.

True to the pictures. The space was huge and more than enough for our family of seven. We loved that we could dine together when we liked in the roomy dining area. It was also a short walk down to a lovely Thai restaurant (Chet Thai), a little playground for kids, a small grocery store, and if you have time, walk down to the ferry point and you will be struck awe by the view of the harbour.
It is a nice place, our family enjoy the stay very much. The host is very helpful when we have some questions.
Great apartment and Vanessa was so nice. We loved staying here and we give it the best score that is possible.

Over all a good place to stay. Two rooms with their own shower /toilett was perfect, the third one needs some finishing... 
Wifi exist but slow.
Big house near Sydney center around 10 mins driving. Tidy, clean and wide space could accommodate almost 10 people. Most of restaurant, bar and groceries nearby.

We were a party of 8 and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Vanessa's place. 

There is more than ample room and you never feel you're in front of someone else's face. 

The location of the house is in a beautiful neighbourhood - under 10 mins walk to the North Sydney train station and another 10 mins walk to this fabulous look out point down Blues Point Road.

Recommended.

This place is perfect for few families and those with children! Plenty of space and not to mention many interest art pieces. Very Walkable to Luna Park, harbour bridge plus North Sydney train station and Greenwood plaza for all your grocery needs. Highly recommend for short or even long stay. :) do bring a clothes rack along if you have plenty of washing to do. Thank you Venessa!!!
Great location near parks, shops, ferries, buses and trains.  Extremely spacious and well appointed place with beautiful artwork. Quiet and peaceful for large family groups travelling together.

Great place to stay... everything was perfect. We had 5 people go over for a conference and it had plenty of space for everyone to have their own room and sitting areas. Vanessa was great to deal with too. Thanks for having us!

The house is absolutely beautiful and stylish! The location is great and close to public transport, cafe and restaurant. Every detail in the house is carefully designed. It represents a very good taste of the host. It is not only a house but a great piece of art. It is definitely enjoyable and lovely staying there. The host is warm-hearted and has very fast response. I would definitely recommend this place to stay in Sydney.
Recommended for family stay and great location for sydney visit

The place is very large, with very big common areas that could accommodate everyone twice over. The location is great with transport connections from the airport bring very simple with short walk and train ride. The surrounding cafes and parks. Given the look in photos I was concerned that my 1 and 3 year old might reek havoc this was not the case. The little outdoor areas and the nearby playground were great for them. Supermarket  cafes, pubs are 5mins walk away. Vanessa was helpful and quick to respond.
ÈùûÂ∏∏ÁæéÁöÑ‰ΩèÂÆÖÔΩ°‰Ω†ÈúÄË¶ÅËá™Â§áÊ¥óÊº±Áî®ÂìÅ,ÂêπÈ£éÊú∫ÔΩ°

Love the house it's really decorated nicely with thoughts. Kitchen utensils were equipped would be better to add a bigger pot for large consumptions. We asked for later check out and the host was able to help. Found a dirty underwear in one of the room lol but that's alright.  Overall a pleasant stay easy access to shop for food and drinks and crossing the harbour. The neighbourhood is really beautiful, enjoyed the walk to wharf everyday.

Vanessa's house was exactly as how it looks on photos or even better! The house is huge and the 8 of us had a great time during our stay. The house is beautifully decorated, and extremely spacious, and there was enough room for the 8 of us to move around without feeling castrophobic. There were very strict house rules from the owner on the rubbish management issue which may come off as very daunting but nothing unmanageable. Otherwise we had an absolute amazing time and will highly recommend this place to big groups looking for a beautiful house to stay in during your time in Sydney.

My family had a wonderful stay in Vanessa‚Äôs house ‚Äì it was the most charming houses we have ever stayed in! Everything is as depicted in the description and photos ‚Äì large house with lots of roaming spaces and a well-equipped kitchen. We spent most of our time at home admiring her decoration and her books collection. It‚Äôs a lovely, quiet neighbourhood with everything nearby ‚Äì cafes, restaurants, grocers, liquor shops, pharmacy etc. Short walk to the North Sydney train station, or you can also take the ferry from CBD/Darling Harbour to McMahons Point (then either a short uphill walk to the house, or a 2-min bus ride up to street if you manage to catch the half-hourly bus). Totally fuss-free check-in and check-out. As mentioned by other guests, don‚Äôt get too alarmed by the list of instructions ‚Äì just take your garbage out on time and you should be fine (no pun intended lol). I would highly recommend Vanessa‚Äôs home!
We stayed at Vanessa's as a company group, was just what we needed. A home away from home, perfect for our short stay.
Nice place and close to restaurants and ferry.

Great place to stay. Close to everything and was perfect for a family lay of 9 to be together and also have private spaces. We had 2 young children and the TV room was great for them also . Would love to stay again one day thanks

Everyone, everywhere Vanessa place is just a dream! The photos don't do it enough justices! Vanessa was so helpful, she welcome me and my family for my wedding in Sydney.

The house was perfect, Lots of space, enough bathroom space for all the ladies and my wedding photos will look amazing!

Seriously don't go pass this place!!! You need to stay here.
Close to everything, buses, trains everything. She is just amazing!!

Dont think twice, book!
it was nice stay at vanessa s place. really convient and close to everywhere.

This is a lovely home in a very central part of Sydney. The home has lots of personality and is beautiful. The only downside was that I left my Kindle behind by accident, and because I don't live in Sydney, and the owner lives overseas it wasn't very easy to organise to have it collected within the timeslots allocated to me by the owner. That can't be helped though. It was my own fault for forgetting it and the owner did the best she could.

We really enjoyed our stay at Vanessa's place! Such a great space - spacious, clean, close to public transport, great communication.
Highly recommended.

Artistic, inspirational space ideal for big group who drives (especially if tourists); who are punctual (cleaners do show up on the dot on the hour of your checkout); well prepared (remember to BYO amenities like hair dryers, body wash, tea/coffee); responsible (read the manual and follow all to-dos). Since we were such a group we had a lovely stay! Don't miss amazing view of harbour bridge from the end of Blue Points Road!
ÊàøÂ≠êÂæà‰∏çÈîô,ÊàøÈó¥Ë∂ÖÂ§öÔΩ°‰ΩçÁΩÆ‰πüËøòÂèØ‰ª•ÁöÑ,ÂéªÂì™ÈáåÈÉΩËøëÔΩ°Â∞±ÊòØÊî∂‰∫ÜËøô‰πàÂ§öÊ∏ÖÊ¥ÅË¥π,ÈÄÄÊàøÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄô ËøòËÆ©Êàë‰ª¨Ê¥óÁ¢ó,ÂìàÂìàÂìàÂìàÂìàÂìàÔΩ°

Amazing accommodation for 3 couples or a group. Roomy, stylish, convenient and curated beautifully. We loved the area, its proximity to the city, the opportunity to explore a unique area, and the generosity of space. Would definitely book this beautiful home again. A highlight was meeting a local 'Emma' who provided wonderful advice about shopping, drinking and walking in the area. Thanks Emma.

Wonderful large open spaces. Great location close to the city, good eat and takeaway and beautiful area for walking and wandering . Very quiet and comfy home for a large group. The host was very prompt with responses.
Cool space, great art.

Wow. That is what every said when they entered the place - stylish, huge, and can easily take ten people without feeling crowded.  Indeed we had a dinner of 15+ people with takeaway from the local Thai and the rooms had a great vibe for that kind of relaxed get together. We could walk to North Sydney station or down to Mc Masons Point ferry to give lots of flexible access. A very good neighbourhood with good restaurants and walks by the harbour - put the place itself is in a very quiet street.  And Vanessa was wonderfully responsive to any small issues we had or advice that was needed.  A wonderful place for a large group.

We loved the location of Vanessa's house. We traveled with our entire family and were so pleased when we walked in and realized how huge the place was! The decorations were great and the beds were comfy. You can walk down very easy to take the ferry. It is in a nice and safe neighborhood.

We had a great stay at Vanessa's Place! 
I'm from Regional NSW and we stayed with friends of ours who had come in from Denver Colorado. This was their first trip to Sydney and they were blown away by the location. We walked a few blocks down Blues Point Rd to catch the ferry and the view was spectacular. The iconic vistas of Sydney, being the Harbour Bridge, Opera House and Luna Park were just a stones throw away.
We didn't take cars with us and spent the entire trip using the readily accessible public transport for trips across the harbour to the CBD.
The best part about the location was NOT being in the CBD but still super close. A night ferry across to Darling Harbour for dinner was tourist perfection.
We started a game amongst the 9 of us to try and figure out 2 things...1) The original use of the building before it became accommodation and 2) getting to know our host by investigating the furnishings, artworks and books in the library. Although we'll never know the real answers, we had a great time discovering the eclectic array of furnishings, the amazing variety and quality of the art and sculptures as well as the interesting use of antiques and curios. 
I enjoyed time in the library combing through the broad spectrum of books and journals on hand. 
Overall, a wonderful stay in a truly imaginative residential space. Well done Vanessa.
Very spacious, design-forward home In a fabulous neighborhood.   Short walk to  restaurants, caf√©s, ferry in to town.  Lovely views of Sydney bridge and the city from several restaurants nearby.
Beautiful and spacious place in a great location.

This place is as good as it looks. 

Really cool style.

it's very nice place , we enjoy  and will come again .thanks ! Vanessa
This is such a wonderful space, really interesting house in a great location.  We'll definitely be back on our next visit.

Beautiful place close to public transport, restaurants, shops and cafes.
Perfect for a group of friends to stay together, with room for some privacy as well.

What a property - it's a great space and totally unique! Perfect for a large group of friends having a getaway or getting prepared for a special event, as we were! 
One annoyance is having to pay extra for parking on the driveway.

Really cool place in a great part of town. The space is ideal for small groups. Really comfy sofas and beds. You are also in a cool part of town v close to the northern working district, and also to nature - go for a morning jog along the coast!! Also recommend the great little deli on Union St just a stone's through away. Sydney living at its best!

I had my family stay here for 4 days due to my wedding. Location is great and the place is a good size for a large group.

When we arrived the place smelled of mould/mildew and very stuffy. It needed to be aired out for 2 days to be acceptable. There were dehumidifiers (3) in the rooms running when we arrived to remove moisture I assume. 

I opted not to stay there on the eve of my wedding (which I planned to) due to the mildew smell but they coped with it (being  from interstate ) and it was ok half way through their stay after they left the doors and windows open for 2 days. 

The host was very understanding, sent a property manager to inspect and offered me a partial refund however this ultimately isn‚Äôt a solution and it was too hard to move everyone.
Great location , large roomy spaces with eclectic furnishings and artwork to enjoy . A great house with easy walking to local restaurants and city ferry
Lovely house full of character as you can tell from the pictures. We never had a chance to meet Vanessa but everything worked very well, and communication was very clear.

This place is huge. Suitable for big family and friends. Kitchen equipment is so complete beyond expectation. The decoration is wonderful.. we have many photos inside the house. Every corner is instagramable . Near north sydney train station and some small groceries. Nice stay at all

What a place, it‚Äôs one of the best I have ever stayed at. If your with family or friends the place is cosy enough and big enough not to be on top of each other.
It‚Äôs a 10 out of 10 from me.

Great space with multiple living areas. Plenty of room for everyone to spread out. The location was perfect. We walked over the bridge to the Opera House. It was close to trains and ferries. Easy walking access to restaurants and shops. It was a bit damp but the multiple dehumidifiers helped. Only suggestion would be to put doors on the bathrooms. Two bathrooms had no doors and the third didn‚Äôt lock. 
We really enjoyed our stay in Sidney and this home made it even better. Thanks

Victoria's Place is a very unusual accommodation.  It is a conversion of a workshop and is very well done.  The place is filled with quirky decorations. It is very roomy. It can be a touch cold in winter.
It is very quiet but also a great location with access to many local restaurants and pubs as well as Luna Park and ferries to the city (about 1km away).

What a fabulous space. This was a great warehouse conversion home. Victoria was great and communicated well. I stayed here with some work colleagues and it was a perfect space for us to have our own space and also socialise. Everyone said their beds and stay was good, there were just a couple of things that they were uncomfortable with and that's a couple of open windows and see-through curtains that looked straight onto the street, one of the rooms was clearly damp and the person who stayed there was sensitive to damp and mould, unfortunately. The common share bathroom facilities didn't have a lock on the door and the toilet door didn't have a separate lock so a few were uncomfortable with that.

We've had a great stay in McMahons Point and the amazing space which was very well considered and curated. Everything was as described and there is plenty of space for a large group. The quirky decoration makes for many talking points. Communication was easy, clear and quick. Great location too with easy access to anywhere as it's close to the brigde with plenty of local shops also. A memorable space!
Amazing value and amazing place... Love the quirky furniture great for photo shoots!

Beautiful place, good value, great location and close to North Sydney station, very clean! Thank you Victoria. Warm reminder for next guests- please bring your own shampoo, conditioner, body wash, dish washer tablets.

This house is special. We enjoyed the artwork and the quirky bits and pieces.  A great eat in kitchen worked well for us, as did the generous living area. There is plenty of crockery, glasses, pots and pans etc. The location is great. A short walk to coffee shops and restaurants and not far to the ferry.

Very spacious, convenient and a creative place to stay.  Easy commute and great local restaurants and cafe just a minute away.  Perfect for groups or large families wanting to stay in a stylish city pad.

We all enjoyed this beautiful home providing the perfect space for our family reunion!!! McMahons Point is also a great location for sightseeing Sydney. We loved the friendly atmosphere and variety of local cafes/restaurants too.
Great location near cafes, restaurants, train and ferries. Ample space in quirky home with loads of sitting areas.
If you want a large house for a group this is fantastic. Great space and location is easy walk to City over the Bridge
Superb location, funky artistic unique huge space...  makes you want to come back... again and again..

This property was in a great location, close to a gym, coffee shops, restaurants and a lovely walk to the ferry.
Great views of the harbour were only a short walk away.
Close to the train line and ferry point.
Victoria was very accomodating with our check in & out times as my son was arriving earlier and we were given the opportunity for a later check out time.
I particularly enjoyed the book shelf (library) with many wonderful topics and subjects that kept me busy.
There was 7 of us staying there and the property gave us all our own space to unwind as well as space to come together as a family to play board games and connect.
The stylish layout and the art pieces were also part of the experience in staying at this property.
We would definitely recommend this property for families or a group of couples wanting to share the experience.

A most stylish house to spend the few days prior to our daughters wedding.  Great for photos.  Feel like we were living in a classy antique warehouse with all the mod cons that were needed!  Great location too.

The house is a lot more run down than it looks on the photographs provided. Beds were dusty which resulted in my developing hives on my first night there. Air-conditioning is only available in the kitchen and in one of the toilets. There is a step near the kitchen which can be quite dangerous because its not clearly marked. Both my grandparents missed the step and they nearly fell. Do be prepared to walk uphill from the train station to the home.

Victoria's place in North Sydney is at a fantastic location, with close proximity to Lavender Bay Park and Blues Point Park that offer you fantastic views of the Harbour Bridge and the Opera House. Great for NYE fireworks. Other than that, the house is very well kept, with all basic amenities provided.

Exceptional property in a wonderful location. Extremely spacious and well thought out, with a great mix of modern and eclectic styles. Victoria is very responsive and helpful. The property has plenty of natural light and would be the perfect location to get ready for a wedding. I will definitely be staying again!

There is no doubt that this is the best in our entire journey home, our whole team are very, very love the family, the traffic is very convenient, shopping is not convenient to cook, and most important, the house was so beautiful, the owner was a great artist, even if any one corner of the sitting at home, you can also feel the rich cultural charm. The nine of us are sure to be back

A spacious accommodation great for a large group. Except some improvements required for air conditioning, all are well.
Worth considering!

host.host_about: Bonjour, je m'appelle Thea.   33 ans. Fran√ßaise d'origine Cambodgienne, je vis au Qu√©bec depuis 6 ans. Sociable, j'aime me m√©langer √† d'autres cultures, explorer de nouveaux endroits. Voyager, rire, danser, manger. Tout √ßa dans le respect et la bonne humeur :)
